courses.description:
W kursie poruszane są tematy i zagadnienia, które pomogą Wam poradzić sobie ze stresem i trudno współpracującymi modelami. Będą też niespodzianki… Kurs nie skupia się na technicznej stronie fotografii, ale na psychologicznych zagadnieniach oraz emocjach, które spowodowały, że większość z fotografów sięgnęła po raz pierwszy po aparat. Stres często jest pomijany w fotografii, a jego poznanie pozwala nam sięgnąć głębiej oraz bardziej świadomie i efektywnie współpracować z trudnymi klientami, ale nie tylko…
Program i tematy omawiane w kursie online:

* Jak pokonać stres:
-> Podejście asymilacyjne
-> Podejście akomodacyjne do stresu
-> Podejście czasowe – czy zadziała na sesji zdjęciowej?
* Jak poradzić sobie z brakiem emocji na sesji?
* Metody szybkich relaksacji przed sesją zdjęciową

* Szybkie sposoby na rozluźnienie mięśni par podczas pozowania.

courses.title: Learn Image Restoration
courses.bio: Editing the image using Photoshop
requirements: Adobe Photoshop
Interest to learn photo editing
courses.description: Image Restoration is the operation of taking a corrupt/noisy image and estimating the clean, original image. The purpose of image restoration is to "compensate for" or "undo" defects which degrade an image. In this course you will learn the different tools which can be used to restore image , clean the image , edit the image etc. With image restoration you can enhance the image and convert black and white image to colored image.
target_audience: Students who want to learn editing images and enhancing it
People who wants to learn new methods of editing the video

courses.title: Video Gear for Any Budget
courses.bio: Receive a gear list for your budget
requirements: No prior knowledge of video gear is necessary for enrolling in this course. However it will be helpful if you have an idea of what your gear budget is or will be.
courses.description:
To first make a video you are going to at least need a camera. To make a good video you will most likely need some type of audio and lighting gear as well. But what kind? With so many brands out there and each offering their own version of the same tool it can be overwhelming trying to figure out what you need. So let us help! We break down exactly what to get no matter how small the budget.
Whether you have $150 or up to $10,000 to spend on video gear, this free 7-part video course covers what cameras, lenses, microphones, & lighting are best at all kinds of budget ranges.

Figure out what gear you need, what gear you don't, and what's worth the money!
target_audience: Anyone who is interested in video gear should take this course! We have something for you whether your budget is $150 or $10,000.

Ustin Kompaniets & Rostyslav Gudz

courses.title: Produktfotografie (Teil 2): Photoshop Freisteller + Montage
courses.bio: Lerne Produktfotos für Amazon (FBA), eBay oder den eigenen Webshop mit Photoshop (CC / CS6) zu bearbeiten
objectives: Photoshop Freisteller auf verschiedene Arten für die Produktfotografie
Flache, spiegelnde Objekte mit einem Trick sauber fotografieren und nachbearbeiten
Komplexe Freisteller weisser Kanten mit der Greenscreen-Technik
Retusche in der Produktfotografie (Beispiel: ein Metall-Objekt)

Profitechniken in der Bildbearbeitung mi: Feinarbeiten in der Maske mit Lightroom wie in Photoshop
Leichtes Zusammenspiel von Lightroom und Photoshop
Photoshop: Grundprinzipien von Masken und Ebenen
Der Trick mit der inversen Maske
Tricks zum Fotografieren und Freistellen: Ein schwieriges Motiv: es spiegelt und hat weiße Kanten
Schneller Zauberstab + grüne Ränder am Motiv loswerden
Zwei Objekte auf einem Bild einfach montieren

requirements: Du solltest Photoshop (und Lightroom) lizensiert haben (Trial Version reicht) und idealerweise auch ein wenig Erfahrung darin haben.
Idealerweise kannst Du Bildmaterial selbst fotografieren (z.B. in einem einfachen Lichtwürfel).
Hinweis: Ein guter Einstieg ist mein Teil 1 "Produktfotografie von Low Budget bis Profilösung" (darin geht es auch um die Fotografie selbst).
courses.description:
Wenn Du bereits Deine eigenen Produktfotos erstellst, aber auch die komplette Nachbearbeitung in Photoshop meistern willst, dann ist dies der ideale Kurs für Dich!
Gerade bei schwierigen Objekten (spiegelnde Oberfläche, kleinteilige helle Kante, etc.) reicht Lightroom alleine nicht mehr aus zur Bearbeitung.
Ich zeige Dir, wie Du in Photoshop freistellst auf verschiedene Arten - auch Dinge, die ich selbst noch in keinem YouTube Video gesehen hab!
Insbesondere die Greenscreen-Technik kann für komplexe, helle Objekte sehr nützlich sein.
Zum Abschluss zeig ich Dir noch einen Trick, wie Du freigestellte Objekte super einfach zusammen montierst.
Tipp: Der Kurs baut sehr gut auf meinem ersten Teil auf "Produktfotografie von Low Budget bis Profilösung" (auch hier auf Udemy).
target_audience: Wenn Du Dinge im Internet verkaufst (neu oder gebraucht) und gute Produktfotos selbst bearbeiten willst bist Du hier richtig.
Besonders interessant ist der Kurs für alle Verkäufer auf Amazon (FBA), ebay oder mit eigenen Webshops.

courses.title: Photoshop CC - Komplettkurs für Einsteiger
courses.bio: Lerne die Funktionen der Bildbearbeitung mit Adobe Photoshop CC
objectives: Programmoberfläche verstehen

Personen oder Objekte vom Hintergrund freistellen

Farbliche Anpassung von Bildern

Filter & Smartfilter-Ebenen
Collagen erstellen
LUTs erstellen & anwenden
Porträt Retusche
Neurale Filter verstehen

Camera Raw: Raw Dateien entwickeln und arbeiten im Camera Raw Bereich
Generative Füllung: mit Künstlicher Intelligenz Bilder generieren, Bilder erweitern & Elemente korrigieren

Ebenen, Masken & Schnittmasken: Gelerntes anwenden: Bild in Text Effekt
Korrekturen (Farbliche Anpassungen): Umfärben ohne Auswahl - Farbton Sättigung Teil 2

requirements: Photoshop CC sollte auf deinem PC installiert sein
courses.description:
Bildbearbeitung mit Photoshop
In diesem Komplettkurs, wirst du alles wichtige lernen, um die vielfältigen Funktionen der Bildbearbeitungssoftware verstehen & anwenden zu können.
Starten werden wir bei den Grundlagen und entwickeln Stück für Stück ein Verständnis für die gesamte Benutzeroberfläche.
Wir lernen alle wichtigen Werkzeuge kennen und schauen uns deren Funktionen an vielen interessanten Beispielen an.
Wir gehen Grundlegende Themen durch, wie die Ebenen & Masken und werden unser neu erlerntes Wissen immer wieder an praktischen Beispielprojekten ausprobieren.

Du erhältst hier keinen eintönigen Theorie-Kurs sondern wirst durch die Zahlreichen Praktischen Beispiele die Möglichkeiten von Photoshop kennenlernen.
Dabei schauen wir uns die Funktionen an um ungewünschte Dinge aus unseren Bildern zu entfernen, wir werden die vielen Werkzeuge kennenlernen, die es uns ermöglichen Objekte oder Personen auszuschneiden & vom Hintergrund freizustellen.

Du wirst lernen deine Bilder durch unterschiedliche Möglichkeiten Farblich anzupassen, und verschiedene Herangehensweisen sehen, zum erstellen von Collagen.
Da man bekanntlich am Besten lernt, durch das Praktische mitmachen, darfst du dich auf viele interessante Bildeffekte und Fotomanipulationen freuen, die wir gemeinsam, Schritt für Schritt erstellen werden.


Photoshop bietet extrem viele Möglichkeiten. In diesem Kurs, lernst du sie zu nutzen.

Natürlich stehen alle Bilder die in diesem Kurs bearbeitet werden, auch für dich zum Download zur Verfügung.




In einzelnen Lektionen werden wir in in folgenden zusammengefassten Kapiteln, alle wichtige Themen zu der Software durchgehen:


Grundlagen
wichtige Grundlagen um mit der Programmoberfläche vertraut zu werden


Werkzeuge & Funktionen
in einzelnen Lektionen alle wichtigen Werkzeuge und deren Anwendung anhand von Beispielen kennenlernen


Ebenen, Masken & Schnittmasken
die Funktionen der Ebenen sind essentiell für die Bildbearbeitung. Hier erfährst du wie sie funktionieren


Ausbessern, Reparieren & Kopieren
ungewünschte Dinge aus Bildern entfernen oder auch Motive an andere Stellen kopieren


Auswahlwerkzeuge
lerne die verschiedenen Möglichkeiten kennen, um Dinge aus Bildern auszuschneiden


Der Zeichenstift
das Zeichenstift-Werkzeug ist vielfältig einsetzbar. Hier lernst du damit umzugehen


Korrekturen
die verschiedenen Möglichkeiten um Bilder farblich anzupassen, werden hier erklärt


Die Filter
filter & Smartfilter auf Bilder anwenden


Weitere Funktionen
hierbei geht um u.a. um Themen wie das Exportieren oder auch die Mischmodi


Bild Effekte erstellen
einige interessante Effekte, die wir gemeinsam Schritt für Schritt erstellen werden


Collagen erstellen
layouts für Collagen erstellen & verschiedene Formen von Collagen kennenlernen


LUTs
erfahre was LUTs sind, wie Du sie auf deine Bilder anwendest und wie Du selbst welche erstellen kannst


Neurale Filter
besondere Filter die auf Künstlicher Intelligenz basieren


Porträt Retusche
techniken zum retuschieren von Porträts, z.B. Haut glätten oder Augenfarbe ändern


Color Grading
spezielle Methoden zur gezielten Farb- und Kontrastanpassung


Camera Raw
Bildbearbeitung und Entwicklung von RAW Dateien im Camera Raw Arbeitsbereich von Photoshop


Generative Füllung
mit Künstlicher Intelligenz Bilder generieren, Bilder erweitern und Bildelemente korrigieren
target_audience: Photoshop Einsteiger und alle die ihr Wissen ausbauen oder auffrischen möchten

Überblick: Module - Part 2 | Farbbereiche, Farb-Equalizer & Lokaler Kontrast
Überblick: Module - Part 3 | Farbbalance, Schärfen & Primärfarben

requirements: Es gibt keine besonderen Anforderungen - lediglich Darktable sollte auf deinem PC installiert sein
courses.description:
Der Darktable Komplettkurs
Lerne in diesem Kurs die kostenlose Lightroom alternative zu verstehen und zu nutzen. Mit Darktable kannst du deine RAW-Bilder professionell bearbeiten, organisieren und kreativ gestalten.
Dieser Kurs richtet sich an alle, die das Programm kennenlernen oder besser verstehen und sicher anwenden möchten – egal ob du gerade erst einsteigst oder von einer anderen Software umsteigst. Du lernst die Benutzeroberfläche von Grund auf kennen, erfährst, wie du deine Bildverwaltung effizient organisierst und bekommst einen strukturierten Überblick über die wichtigsten Module zur Belichtung, Farbkorrektur, kreativen Gestaltung, und mehr.
Du entwickelst ein Verständnis für die kreative Seite der Bildbearbeitung – wir gestalten gemeinsam verschiedene Looks, passen Farben gezielt an und holen mit Maskenbearbeitung das Beste aus den Fotos heraus. Schritt für Schritt zeige ich dir, wie du Darktable nicht nur bedienen, sondern gezielt einsetzen kannst – für Ergebnisse, die überzeugen.
Wenn du lernen willst, wie du mit diesem mächtigen, kostenlosen Tool tolle Ergebnisse erzielen kannst, dann ist dieser Kurs dein perfekter Einstieg in die Welt von Darktable


Was dich erwartet:
Benutzeroberfläche verständlich erklärt – keine Überforderung durch komplexe Panels
Effiziente Bildverwaltung – importiere, sortiere und organisiere deine Fotos
Modulüberblick – lerne die wichtigsten Werkzeuge kennen: Belichtung, Farbkorrektur, Schärfung, u. v. m.
Kreative Looks entwickeln – Farbstile, Kontraste & individuelle Looks gestalten
Gezielte Bearbeitung mit Masken – lokale Anpassungen mit Parametrischen & Handgezeichneten Masken und Verläufen
target_audience: Alle die Darktable näher kennenlernen möchten
Darktable Einsteiger sowie alle die bereits mit der Software arbeiten und etwas dazu lernen möchten
Umsteiger von ähnlichen Programmen wie z.B. Lightroom

courses.title: The Art of Seeing Photography training for the Artist in you
courses.bio: Discover how to see like an artist & take the best photos of your life.
objectives: Each episode contains 45 minutes of lecture and an assignment to practice the new concepts so you can build a personal library of resources.
You will learn how to spot light like an artist.
Step by step guide to seeing a photograph before it happens, so you don't miss the decisive moment.
An introduction into composition beyond the Rule of Thirds and leading lines.
Each episode has tips for training the sensitivity of your eyes and how to use your camera to capture incredible images that you simply were not seeing before.
After the first episode you will begin to see things you had not noticed before and know how to bring them into your images.
Develop the skills to evaluate any photograph as a success or failure based on its design.
By the end of this course you will have a new found appreciation for master artists and never run out of material for your own projects.

A Room For Improvement: How to we see.
The Art Of Seeing: Borrow from the success of famous artists.
Three techniques for spotting flaws in pictures.
A critical technique for finding light.

requirements: A camera (any kind will do, from iPhone to Medium Format) trust me, it does not matter.
A notebook, we cover a lot of material.  Its easier to write down your thoughts as you go along.
A desire and passion to dive head first into photography.
The curiosity to understand what separates a good image from a great image.
courses.description:
Why can we spot a great photo but find it difficult to capture one?
Why do we over complicate a process that can be summed up with a push of button? The key to taking a good photo isn't the subject matter, it's not in the type of equipment you use or the location setup for the shot. The key to taking a good photo is the discovering your personal point of view and identifying the 'thing' that hides in plain sight; this is the 'artist eye'. A Room for Improvement will teach you how to see like an artist and further your exploration into the art form of photography.
To shoot a world-class photo, your eyes must be familiar with the elements that make a photo world-class. Great musicians can hear the rhythm in everyday life. Great writers know that everyone has a story to tell. Great photos are happening all around you, and you're missing them because you haven't trained your eye.
I've spent the last 20 years working in photography, painting, sculpting and architecture - having a multidisciplinary approach allows for better photo taking. The more curious you are, the more things you learn and experience, the better the eye becomes. You have experiences that will aid you in your artistic journey with this program.
Using my work as reference we will discuss vision, approach, tools and techniques of photography. I will teach you how to take great pictures with any camera, from your cell phone to your Leica. Armed with a camera, a pen, a pad, and your desire to improve – I will transform your photography by changing the way you see the world around you.
COURSE STRUCTURE
This course is divided into 5 Lectures that are a Master Class in Learning to See like an Artist.
Lecture 1: How we see. Understanding how artists see differently.
Lecture 2: Borrow success from famous artists.
Lecture 3: Three techniques for spotting flaws.
Lecture 4: A critical technique for finding light.
Lecture 5: Why pictures succeed or fail and the assignment.
The lectures are designed to be watched in order, but you are free to skip around.
Each course is made up of a set of lectures (about 45min long), with downloadable images from the lecture, and an final assignment designed to highlight the tools from each lecture.
EXPECT RESULTS
By the end of this program, you will understand why photographers always say that "the equipment doesn't matter." Learning to see like an artist is one of the single most fulfilling steps on the way to becoming a better photographer. In addition to improving your own work, you will be able to walk into any gallery or museum in the world and know, with full certainty, whether you are looking at a great piece of art or not.
target_audience: Photographers who want to see like artists, from beginners to intermediate.
This course will apply to Street Photography, Portraiture, Landscape, and Still Life photography.
No previous education in art or photography is needed.

courses.title: Mastering the modelshoot : The Lightmeter
courses.bio: For a faster more accurate workflow
objectives: The student will have a better understanding about how to meter light and setup killer lighting.

The course itself: what is the lightmeter and how is it used
How to make sure there are details in black
Setting up the lightmeter for outside use
Why should I calibrate the meter? plus about the Colorchecker

requirements: Basic knowledge about photography
courses.description:
The first video in the “Mastering the model shoot” video range based on the best selling book.
In today’s world of Digital Photography, the Light Meter is without doubt one of the most discussed topics.  It’s also one of the most understated tools that can really speed up your workflow by helping you to achieve accurate and consistent exposures…FAST!
In this video, best selling author Frank Doorhof covers everything you’ll ever need to know about the use of the Light Meter in easy to understand examples and demonstrations.
Topics include :
Light meter vs the histogram, using the meter to keep detail in whites and shadows, reflective vs incident, calibrating the meter, where to point the meter, using the meter outside, day to night setups in a flash, shooting film and using alternative apps, how to read the meter, how to setup the meter, calculations for black and white, light in light setup, high contrast setups, moving around the model with proper exposure, how to trigger the meter and much much more.
Run time well over 70 minutes, filmed in 4K video is 1080P.
target_audience: Everyone who wants to know more about the lightmeter in photography and wants to be able to solve lighting problems

With Udemy’s 30-day money-back guarantee, you can start learning today with zero risk.
Join now and begin your journey into the world of Photoshop.
The Elite Team Group

requirements: Download and Install Lightroom CC, 6, 5, or 4
Purchasing VSCO Film 01 Pack is required to take the course (Install process is covered in tutorials)
courses.description:
This course is designed with a hands-on approach. We feel the best way to learn how to edit in Lightroom is to follow along with the process yourself. However every other course we could find online shows you techniques but gives you no way to practice them. That's why we put together a professional styled shoot so we can PROVIDE YOU WITH ACTUAL RAW IMAGES! These images are still under our copyright, meaning they are for tutorial purposes only but they will give you a chance to practice on real professional RAW photographs and produce the same results that you see in the tutorials.
We use VSCO(Visual Supply Co.) film in this course because it allows us to translate our digital RAW data into color profiles that are then able to be edited. In short this is not a pack of "film look-a-like presets" but rather digital film stocks that translate your image data into film. This is only the very first step, in this course we take you much farther than simple presets teaching you to develop an eye for beautiful skin tones which are the very cornerstone of good portrait and wedding photographs.
What cameras does this course work for?
The raw images provided in this course are from Canon 5d Mark III cameras but once you have learned the methods we teach they can be easily applied to Nikon, Fuji, Leica, Olympus, or Sony images as these are all supported by Lightroom and VSCO film.
What will you learn?
How to install VSCO film to be used with Lightroom
How to import photos into your Lightroom catalog with ease
How to rate your images which is also known as culling
How to select a good starting preset for an image
How to tone an image based on the subjects skin
How to make custom adjustments
How to retouch skin imperfections with the healing spot removal tool
How to refine an image with sharpening & grain
How to use virtual copies to develop your personal style
How to make a personal preset for batch processing
How to fix lens warping with lens corrections
How to remove foreground objects with the clone tool
How to crop or re-align images
Bonus: How to make a tilt-shift effect by sending an image to Photoshop
How to export images for print or web!
How will these skills help you?
Everything we will be teaching you in this course is the result of many years of practicing and tweaking our process to develop compelling images. We use the very techniques in this tutorial to do all of our post processing as a profitable wedding photography business. By learning to create high quality images you are developing a product that you can sell and create a sustainable business. Even as a hobbyist these skills will help you document your own life in a way that is as timeless as film.
target_audience: People getting starting in editing who have basic knowledge of editing.
Photographers who have been shooting for years but see their work as becoming outdated and are looking for a refresh.
Hobbyists who seek to take their photography to the next level.
Photographers to have mastered taking "good" images but want to see their images come alive and really draw the viewer into the subject.
Wedding photographers looking to make fine art styled images

requirements: Nie potrzebujesz żadnego doświadczenia z programem

courses.description:
Chcesz by Twoje zdjęcia wyróżniały się z tłumu?
Lightroom jest najpopularniejszym programem do edycji zdjęć używanym przez miliony fotografów na całym świecie. Zrozumienie tego programu jest często kluczem do ponadprzeciętnych zdjęć. W tym momencie jesteś w najlepszym miejscu by zacząć, mając profesjonalnego retuszera jako instruktora.
W ciągu kilku dni będziesz w stanie zrozumieć główne elementy programu Lightroom i co najważniejsze będziesz w stanie zrozumieć bardziej artystyczną stronę fotografii co pozwoli Tobie edytować zdjęcia w takim sposób by były naprawdę piękne!
Nie ważne czy jesteś amatorem lub już masz trochę doświadczenia na tym polu. W tym kursie upewnię się, że potrafisz zrozumieć swoje zdjęcia, ich światło i kolory, co pozwoli Tobie być o wiele lepszym fotografem!
Dlaczego jestem tego pewny?
W mojej profesjonalnej pracy od ponad 5 lat zajmuję się profesjonalnym retuszem dla światowel klasy fotografów. Miałem bliskie doświadczenie przy pracy nad każdym detalem zdjęć, śledząc harmonie kolorów i ich artystyczną prezencję.
Główne tematy w tym kursie to:
Zrozumienie panelu biblioteki (library)
Importowanie zdjęć - ich wybór, flagowanie, ocenianie oraz dodawanie słów kluczy
Zrozumienie modułu Develop
Podstawowe ustawnienia - ekspozycja, kontrasty, światła i cienie
Praca z kolorem - krzywe, barwa, nasycenie, jasność koloru oraz dzielona tonacja
Kalibrowanie koloru
Wyostrzanie zdjęcia i redukcja szumu
Korekta szkła i perspektywy
Narzędzia - Cropp, Pędzel Korygujący, Filtry oraz Pędzel Dopasowań
Exportowanie Zdjęć
Retusz Skóry w Lightroomie i Photoshopie
Tworzenie Presetów i Profili kolorystycznych
Edycja krajobrazów
Edycja zdjęć nocnych
Edycja zachodów słońca
Edycja portretów
Naucz się jak edytować zdjęcia śledząc główne kroki post produkcji.
Dopasuj światła i cienie - podstawowy ale niezwykle ważny krok przy edycji zdjęć, zawsze musisz się upewnić, że Twoje zdjęcie ma idealne światła zanim przejdziesz do kolejnego kroku.
Gradowanie koloru - inne kursy nigdy nie przwywiązują wystarczająco uwagi do procesu gradacji. Co ja robię odmiennie to uczę Ciebie jak edytować kolor w odpowiedni sposób - kierując się zasadami harmonii kolorów.
Retusz Skóry - Praca z portretami! Pokażę Tobie jak retuszować skórę w Lightroomie jak i Photoshopie który jest lepszym programem do retuszu skóry!
Finałowe kroki - Wszystko co powinieneś wiedzieć przed exportowaniem!
Presety i Profile - Co najlepsze w tym kursie to fakt, że daję Tobie dostę do moich profili kolorystycznych które pomogą Tobie w osiągnięcie fantastycznych rezultatów!
Ten kurs zawiera lekcje z pełną edycją zdjęć od początku do końca dzięki czemu możesz zobaczyć moje wszystkie kroki w programie Lightroom które robię na codzień z moimi zdjęciami!
Powodzenia!
Marcin

courses.title: Curso de Inspección con Drones para Estructuras
courses.bio: Fotogrametría Vertical
objectives: Aprenderás a realizar de manera segura planes de vuelo y el levantamiento de datos para estructuras usando la fotogrametría vertical.
Adquirirás conocimientos sobre los diferentes tipos de estructuras, como edificios, turbinas eólicas, torres de telecomunicaciones, antenas eléctricas.
También te formarás en el uso de los equipos y sensores adecuados, aplicaciones de vuelo vertical.
Procesamiento de imágenes y plataformas de informes detallados para generar información valiosa que permita el análisis completo de tu proyecto.

Módulo I: Introducción: Alcances de la inspección con drones
Módulo II: Sensores, Equipamiento y Apli: Tipos de drones según el área de inspección

requirements: Conocimientos básicos en pilotaje de drones.
courses.description:
¿Qué aprenderé?

En este curso de Inspección con Drones, aprenderás las habilidades necesarias para realizar de manera segura planes de vuelo y el levantamiento de datos para estructuras usando la fotogrametría vertical. Adquirirás conocimientos sobre los diferentes tipos de estructuras, como edificios, turbinas eólicas, torres de telecomunicaciones, antenas eléctricas, entre otras.

ambién te formarás en el uso de los equipos y sensores adecuados, aplicaciones de vuelo vertical, procesamiento de imágenes y plataformas de informes detallados para generar información valiosa que permita el análisis completo de tu proyecto. Al finalizar el curso, estarás capacitado para aplicar estas tecnologías de drones en la inspección de estructuras y tomar decisiones fundamentadas en base a la información recopilada.

Objetivo del curso

Este curso tiene como objetivo brindar conocimientos y habilidades en el uso de tecnologías de drones para inspección de estructuras. Los participantes aprenderán el flujo de trabajo necesario para recopilar datos con drones, incluyendo técnicas de fotogrametría vertical, así como el manejo de diferentes equipos, plataformas y aplicaciones. Al final del curso, los participantes estarán en capacidad de generar información valiosa para el análisis completo de proyectos, lo que permitirá la toma de decisiones más precisas y eficientes en el ámbito de la inspección de estructuras.


La inspección con drones ofrece ventajas en la inspección de torres de telecomunicación al permitir acceso seguro y rápido a áreas de difícil acceso, reduciendo el riesgo de accidentes para inspectores humanos.
Los drones proporcionan imágenes de alta calidad para una inspección más detallada y eficiente.
Se pueden contabilizar los sensores y verificar su estado, identificar daños y oxido, y recopilar datos para detectar problemas de seguridad, planificar el mantenimiento y optimizar la eficiencia.
La inspección con drones también ahorra tiempo y costos en comparación con los métodos de inspección tradicionales.

La inspección de edificios con drones es una técnica cada vez más utilizada en el mundo de la construcción.
Los drones permiten inspeccionar de manera segura y eficiente áreas de difícil acceso, como las fachadas, tejados y estructuras elevadas.
Además, los drones pueden recopilar información de manera detallada, como imágenes de alta resolución, que permiten a los expertos evaluar el estado del edificio y detectar cualquier problema de forma rápida y precisa.
Esto no solo ahorra tiempo y reduce costos, sino que también mejora la seguridad de los trabajadores al evitar el acceso a áreas peligrosas.


Además de permitir una inspección más detallada y eficiente, los drones equipados con LIDAR pueden detectar con precisión cualquier deformación o desalineación en la estructura de la torre eléctrica.
Esto permite recopilar datos para detectar daños, identificar problemas de seguridad, planificar el mantenimiento y optimizar la eficiencia de la torre.
Además, los drones también pueden detectar cableados cercanos a árboles, lo que es especialmente útil en áreas rurales donde las líneas eléctricas pueden ser difíciles de acceder.
La inspección con drones ahorra tiempo y costos en comparación con los métodos de inspección tradicionales y garantiza una inspección más segura y eficiente de las torres eléctricas.
target_audience: Pilotos de drones

courses.bio: Bring out the best in your RAW files and create high quality, beautifully color graded artwork with Capture One 12
objectives: How to take advantage of the benefits of shooting in a RAW format

Edit 1: Fine art portrait - Charles: Edit 1 - Color grading with Curve (RGB , Luma)

requirements: No prior knowledge of Capture One 12 is necessary, I will explain all the techniques in a simple way

We will work with NIKON Raw files (.NEF) provided as supplementary materials to help you move on even faster!

courses.description:
Capture One 12 is a high end, complete image editing software solution: you can use it to import your RAW files from the camera, organise them, perform lens corrections, make luminosity adjustments and color grade your images. Using real-life examples, you’ll learn how to put Capture One 12 to work solving common photo editing issues, including exposure correction, shadow and highlight detail recovery, midtone contrast enhancement and color correction. By experimenting with this intuitive software, you’ll discover a variety of fresh ideas and achieve gorgeous, unexpected results in no time. Best of all, the whole process is non-destructive, as you’re developing a RAW file — a digital negative.


Sharpen Your Skills
Shadow And Highlight Detail Recovery
You’ll learn how to easily and effectively create pixel-precise masks based on luminosity range with the Luma Range tool. You’ll then take it to the next level by combining these masks with the High Dynamic Range tool and Curves to precisely recover lost detail in over or underexposed areas.


Powerful Luminosity Adjustments With Levels
Correct luminosity range with one click using the underrated auto functionality of the Levels tool. Learn remapping black, grey and white points to achieve the perfect balance of lights and shadows in your artwork.


Effortless Color Grading
Turn color grading into an intuitive and insightful process using Capture One 12. You’ll get expert insight into making color adjustments with Curves, the Color Balance tool and the powerful and super precise Color Editor. You’ll also marvel at the results you’ll get by working with Layers and Color Editor in concert for optimised control and flexibility.


Localised Texture Enhancements And Sharpening
Add depth to your images through the skilful structure enhancements using the incredibly versatile and flexible Clarity tool. You’ll also learn how to add definition to your photos by enhancing contrast within a specific tonal range.
target_audience: Anyone who is curious about professional techniques behind successful images
Anyone who wants to learn how to effectively color grade images with Capture's One 12 Color Editor
Aspiring photographers who want to improve their photo editing skills starting with digital negatives development
Anyone who wants to develop artistic skills in fields of creative photo processing
Anyone wanting to take their artwork to the next level with stunning results, specifically in terms of clear, beautiful color

courses.title: Drone Flight Planning 101 - A Practical Guide!
courses.bio: Plan a legal drone mission for any purpose using the correct standards and the appropriate drone flight parameters!
objectives: Safely and legally plan a drone flight for anywhere in the world.
Plan drone flights according to regulations, equipment limitations, and airspace restrictions.
Navigate different sources of information to help establish the boundaries of the mission.
Plan a flight using information that is often overlooked or disregarded in schools or government training facilities.
Identify and know how to execute a drone mission from start to finish.

Using The Right Drone: What Drone To Use And Why

requirements: No previous flight or drone handling experience needed. You will learn where to find all the information you need for planning your flight.
Recommended: have a laptop, tablet, or desktop computer on-hand with you to do the course in the most efficient way possible.
Needed: decent wifi connectivity to download and/or use the websites, apps, and software that are taught about through the course
courses.description:
Learn to plan your drone missions properly - not the way the schools teach and not the way that you might be thinking!


This course teaches you everything that proper flight planning entails: how to find legal documents, where to learn about regulations, how to read aeronautical charts, and even more. In this course, we dive into everything to do with drone planning that you could possibly imagine, right down to the very basics.


Some of the topics that will be looked at include technical drone information, aviation documentation, air law, airspaces, aeronautical charts, risk assessment, emergency response, and so much more - and it's done to an international standard.


My name is Josh. I am an internationally accredited, CAA approved Drone Operator and Instructor. Having worked in the industry for over 4 years, going through various training and examination procedures, I know what information is lacking in the industry and I know that it's the most important information for overall drone operation. It is also worth mentioning that my ratings come from the South African CAA, which is the highest rated drone pilot license in the world, and I am the known South African drone instructor.


If you want to plan a drone mission safely and efficiently, do this course. If you want to protect yourself and your team from the law, do this course. If you want to prevent drone accidents and fly with confidence, do. this. course. Bottom line, if you fly drones, you should do this course. Give me your money :) and complete this course ;)
target_audience: Anyone looking to join the drone industry who wants to fly safely and legally.
RPL holders who feel ill-equipped or unprepared to plan a proper drone flight.
Drone students who want help in passing their next skills test DFE.
Anyone who is new to the drone industry, whether professionally or otherwise, and wants to know what proper drone flying entails.

courses.description:
Welcome to “The ultimate guide for beginners in photo editing” course on Skylum’s Udemy Channel.


Designed for aspiring photographers and editing enthusiasts, this course is your gateway to the fascinating world of photo editing. Whether you're a complete novice or have some basic knowledge, this course will equip you with the essential skills to transform your photo into stunning works of art.


Throughout the course, you will gain a comprehensive theoretical background on editing, learning about its different stages, exploring the main existing software and applications, and discovering various editing styles. By the end of the course, you will have a solid understanding of the editing process and be able to apply different techniques to enhance your photos.




THE COURSE WILL FOCUS ON 4 KEY AREAS:


Fundamentals of Photo Editing
In this section, you will learn the essential skills and concepts that form the foundation of photo editing. You will explore all the basic points of photo editing, main techniques, stages, and principles. The main ways your business can benefit from photo editing are also covered in this section.


Software for Editing Photos
This section will cover the main features and functions of Photoshop, Lightroom, Snapseed, and Picsart, thus helping you select the best option for your specific needs. In this section, we will also focus on Luminar Neo and tell you why it’s worth using if you want to level up your photo-editing skills.


Most Popular Photo-Editing Styles
In this section, we'll introduce you to the most popular photo-editing software programs and mobile apps. You'll learn how to choose the right tools for your needs, and we'll take a deep dive into the next level of photo editing with Luminar Neo.


Photo Editing Practice
Your chance to apply previously acquired photo-editing skills, as it contains some practical lessons on how to perform basic editing tasks, such as cropping, adjusting exposure, and so on. Separate lessons in this section focus on portrait and landscape editing.




WHO IS THE INSTRUCTOR?
Vanelli — is a working sports and portrait photographer, educator, and author living in Florida. As an experienced educator, Vanelli has created videos for LinkedIn Learn, has written hundreds of articles, taught at major photography conferences and has developed many photography and digital workflow programs including Click for Kids. Currently, he is the Director of Education at Skylum Software, teaching workshops, writing for Photofocus and creating tutorials for the Vanelli and Friends series.


YOU’LL HAVE THE OPPORTUNITY TO LEARN PHOTO EDITING FROM TOP PROFESSIONALS:


We make world-renowned photo editing software since 2009 that helps elevate the creativity of photo artists. Since then, Skylum won many industry awards, and, what's more important — the trust of thousands of customers.


Skylum thrives for innovation, and has won industry awards, including Best Mac App of 2017, EISA Best Product 2019-2020, Outdoor Photographer Editors’ Picks, The LUCIE Technical Awards for Best Software Plugin 2019, TIPA World Awards for Best Imaging Software 2019.2020 Editor’s Choice by Macworld for Luminar 4.
Luminar Neo is the latest AI photo editing software from Skylum. Editing photos in Luminar Neo has made photography post-processing easier than ever. In this course, we'll show you how to use Luminar Neo and how to edit photos in Luminar Neo to achieve stunning results.


Our instructors have years of experience not only in editing but also in teaching, and the syllabus of this course has been meticulously developed to be both easy to follow and comprehensive.




OUR PHOTO EDITING TRAINING INCLUDES:


Theory: 2+ hours of lectures with plenty of hands-on examples. Lessons range from 3 to 15 minutes and are easy to follow

SHOULD YOU BE WORRIED?

We hope you enjoy discovering the Magic of Photo Editing with us!
Click the "Buy now" button to learn how to edit photos to achieve stunning results today!

*NOTE: This course teaches you how to work with Lightroom Classic, not Lightroom CC.
Some of the bad reviews and ratings are from people who thought this course was about Lightroom CC. They got confused because it looked different than in the course, and thus they gave a bad rating.
The difference between Lightroom Classic and Lightroom CC: Lightroom CC is the new cloud-based photo service of Adobe that works across desktop, mobile, and web. Lightroom Classic is the desktop-focused digital photography product.
In many ways, Lightroom CC is more user-friendly, but it also has fewer tools at its disposal. While this course teaches you how to work with Lightroom Classic and Photoshop, you will have no problem using Lightroom CC if you know how to use all the tools in Lightroom Classic. Both versions have the same tools. Lightroom Classic simply offers more in-depth editing possibilities and tools.
Therefore, Lightroom Classic is also a recommended program for a photographer to know how to use.*
_______________________________________

I’ve combined all of that information into a well-presented package that not only looks good, but is good - guaranteed.
My mission here with this course is to guide you step by step, slowly but surely through the myriad of possibilities that post processing and editing offers you and your photography.
And don’t worry, for those who are new to Lightroom or Photoshop, there are lectures to help you understand all the necessary tools, and if you have any further questions at all at any stage, you just have to ask, I am here with you on this journey.
Now, brace yourself and get ready to be blown away by just how much better your photos will start to look when using the numerous easy to advanced techniques and skills you are about to learn.
It’s going to be a lot of fun, so please enjoy the course!
An honest review and rating is always appreciated and will help me to make any necessary improvements for the course, as well helping to get more people involved so they too can benefit from the beauty of photography. Many thanks!

courses.description:
This course offers a comprehensive guide for students interested in learning how to effectively use the Lightroom develop module to perform enhancements on individual photos or image collections. The course starts from the foundations, where we explore the Lightroom Classic CC interface, and setting up an image catalog. Here, students will learn to configure a catalog and a number of other application preferences, such as import file handling and metadata. From there, we dive into image file formats where students are introduced to a number of key terms relevant to both photography and image retouching. Students will learn the importance of file formats, color spaces, image resolution, pixel density, and the notorious RAW file. We also explore file handling options, interface preferences, identity plate setup and watermarking with both text and graphics.

Once students are familiar with accessing the various interface components to perform a multitude of image sorting and organization tasks, we dive into one of the most powerful features of Lightroom: The Develop Module. Here students will start with exploring the Develop module interface along with the preset, and history panel. From there we will visit the collections panel before exploring a number of view options such as Loupe View and Compare view, for the ultimate in versatility when performing professional image enhancements. Students will learn to copy and paste image adjustments across a number of different images, while exploring a variety of image enhancement tools such as exposure correction, cloning, spot removal, red eye reduction, graduated filters, and white balance correction. In addition to simple adjustments, we also demonstrate how to perform intermediate enhancements using retouching techniques that are used in studios. This includes Tone curve adjustments, noise reduction, split toning, image sharpening, lens corrections, artistic vignetting and dehazing.

As you can see this course covers a number of topics that are essential to anyone starting off in the digital image enhancement arena. It’s also a great resource for both professional and aspiring photographers that are looking to take their existing shots to the next level. If you’re as exciting as we are about this course, hit the enroll but and let’s get started.
target_audience: Students interested in performing image adjustments using Adobe Lightroom Classic CC.
Students specifically interested in the Lightroom Classic CC Develop Module for Image Enhancements.

courses.description:
Hola, soy Juan Pablo Aquila, Licenciado en Comunicación y fotógrafo especializado en bodas y sesiones.
Estoy muy contento de traerte esta serie de dos cursos (básico y avanzado), que finalmente me decidí a dar donde revelo todos mis secretos:


En este curso básico vamos a:
- Revelar imágenes de forma global, orientado al estilo de fotografía Rusa, ese que tanto se destaca en sesiones y lo utilizan reconocidas fotógrafas rusas, con los colores e iluminación tan peculiares que los caracterizan.
- Aprender todo lo relacionado a flujo de trabajo de eventos sociales, para que puedas organizar grandes cantidades de imágenes, de una forma muy ágil y metódica.
- Entender como funciona la luz a través de un histograma.
- Dominar el color en detalle. Armaremos nuestra propia paleta de color y nunca más vas a tener problemas con esas fotos que tanto te lían los colores.
- Aprender a hacer un fotolibro en pocos minutos con Smart Album, para que tengas una excelente presentacion de tus trabajos, y no pierdas demasiado tiempo en ello.
- Finalmente, hablaremos de como yo hago las fotos: Que equipos utilizo, por qué, que tengo en cuanta a la hora de captar una imagen, donde y cómo me situo, y muchos tips más.


Sin mucho más que decir, pero por muchísimo más por ver.


¡Bienvenid@!


Lic. Juan Pablo Aquila
target_audience: Cualquier estudiante o fotógrafo aficionado o profesional, que se desarrolle o quiera desarrollarse en el ámbito de bodas y sesiones fotográficas.
Amantes del estilo fotográfico Ruso.

courses.title: Formation Lightroom, développer ses photographies numériques
courses.bio: Une formation sur les bases de Lightroom pour importer, trier, sélectionner, développer et exporter ses photographies
objectives: Sélectionner rapidement les photographies réalisées lors d'une séance
Développer une photographie numérique en couleurs ou noir et blanc (format RAW)
Exporter sa photographie dans le format désiré pour une impression ou une publication sur internet

Importer et trier vos photographies dans: Présentation générale de l'ergonomie du logiciel Lightroom
Importer ses fichiers dans Lightroom (le module Bibliothèque)
Trier et sélectionner rapidement ses photographies (le module Bibliothèque)
Développer ses photographies numérique (: Développer ses photographies, présentation des curseurs et outils
Exporter ses photographies en différents formats
Bonus: Le mode capture connectée de Lightroom
Corriger les yeux rouges avec Lighroom

requirements: Brancher leur appareil photo en USB à leur ordinateur ou leur carte SD
courses.description:
Ce cours permet à toutes personnes désireuses de développer et exploiter le potentiel de ses photographies numériques de le faire. Avec une approche simple, expliqué pas à pas, vous saurez importer vos photographies dans le logiciel, trier et sélectionner les meilleurs clichés (pratique quand on a un gros volume de photographies), développer vos photographies en couleurs ou en noir et blanc (recadrer, corriger l'exposition, les hautes lumières, le contrastes, la clarté, etc...) et les exporter dans un format JPEG pour l'impression ou la parution sur internet.
Un chapitre est également consacré à l'utilisation du format RAW et explique les caractéristiques techniques de ce format de fichier dont vous ne saurez plus vous passer !
target_audience: Ce cours est destiné aux débutants souhaitant utiliser pleinement les fichiers de leurs appareils photo numérique
Toutes les personnes souhaitant développer leurs photographies numériques (et oui, il faut les développer comme pour l'argentique)

courses.title: Introduction to Photoshop | Beginner to Master
courses.bio: Everything you need to know to get started with the world's most powerful photo editing program.
objectives: You'll learn the core fundamentals of Photoshop
You'll learn everything you need to know to get up and running in Photoshop
You'll learn professional-level tips and tricks you can use in your Photoshop projects

Course Introduction: Getting the project files for this course
Working with Photoshop Documents: Panning, zooming, and the navigator panel
Understanding Digital Images: Common file formats you'll use in Photoshop
Common Utilities You'll Need to Know in: Mini project: Using guides to slice a multi-image panorama for Instagram
Mini project: Using auto-align to create a panorama
Undo, redo and the history panel
Layers and Masks in Photoshop: Understanding the concept of layer masks
Creating, duplicating and deleting layer masks
Mini project: Tips and tricks for painting layer masks
Mastering Photoshop's Selection Tools: Mini project: Selection tips and tricks
Select subject and select and mask
Working with Smart Objects: Understanding the concept of smart objects

requirements: We'll use Photoshop CC in this course, so you'll need access to a Creative Cloud subscription with Photoshop
courses.description:
This Introduction to Photoshop tutorial will get you up to speed on all the tools you'll need to know inside of Photoshop. With over 14 hours of content, we'll cover the wide range of tools that Photoshop has to offer.
We'll start by getting familiar with the user interface and how to move around inside of Photoshop. From there, we'll go beyond the what and learn the why behind digital images. There's no one-size-fits-all digital image file type, so you'll need to know the benefits of using one over the other in different situations. Why should you pick JPG images over GIF images over TIFF images? What's the difference between 8-bit and 16-bit or pixel-based images and vector shapes? We'll break down the technical stuff into a simple and easy to understand way.
No matter what challenges you'll come across in Photoshop, there are tools to help you tackle them. You don't always need to use every tool, but you always need to know what tool will work best for your project. This course will walk you through all the different features, tools and operations you need to add to your tool belt to conquer whatever projects come your way.
target_audience: Beginner creative artists looking to learn Photoshop
Developers and IT professionals looking to add Photoshop to their skillset
Intermediate artists looking to take full advantage of Photoshop's capabilities

courses.description:
Want to learn how to properly edit your photos using the popular and FREE RAW Processing Software Darktable? Want to know how to properly set up your camera for RAW photography? Looking to finally learn the Darktable layout, panels, and modules so you aren't "stabbing in the dark" when making image adjustments?
I'm Mike Davies, photographer, course instructor, and owner of Davies Media Design. I'm here to introduce you to one of the most powerful pieces of RAW processing software on the planet. The best part? It's totally free! (Don't worry - if your camera can't take RAW photos, this software works with JPEGs, too!)
You'll quickly find out in this useful course that Darktable is an amazing free alternative to premium software like Adobe Lightroom.
In this course, I provide:
An introduction to Darktable and RAW Photography
Instructions on how to take RAW photos with your camera
An overview of importing RAW images to your computer and opening them in Darktable
An in-depth look at the Darktable layout, including updates to the layout in Darktable 3.4 and 3.6.
A demonstration of all the Panels found in Darktable
An introduction to modules, as well as an in-depth look at my favorite modules for photo editing
An overview of how Darktable's "pixelpipe," or module order, works to help you get the most out of your editing
Definitions for photo editing and Darktable concepts
Insight into why certain modules/image adjustments are used for RAW editing
Step-by-step instruction on how to edit/remove/add your photo's:
Exposure
Shadows and Highlights
Tone Curve
Color Balance
White Balance
Noise
Sharpening
Vignette
Exporting guidelines and recommendations
Whether you're a casual photographer familiar with photo editing, or someone looking to learn professional editing or RAW image processing for the first time, this course is perfect for you! My lectures are easy for beginners to follow, but in-depth enough for anyone to walk away knowing more about Darktable and image editing than they previously did.
As an instructor on Udemy, my courses have over 17,000 students and a 4.8 star rating. Plus, I personally answer your questions about Darktable and photo editing, and encourage feedback to improve the course.
What Students Say About the Course
"I am a beginner in photo editing, and I chose Darktable for raw processing, because the "industry standard" LR's [Lightroom] pricing for me is just too expensive. When I first opened DT, I had no clue how to start, I needed some help. This course provided exactly what I needed for my first project. Of course, I did not become a master overnight, but it I am heading to the right direction now."
-Gergely L. | 5-star rating
"I'm working on nighttime photography and found this to be very helpful."
-Yvonne J. | 5-star rating
"Excellent clear presentation."
-Guy W. | 5-star rating
Lifetime Access
It's time you finally mastered RAW photo editing and Darktable! Join over 600 students and enroll today for lifetime access - including access to future content added to the course.

courses.title: Capture One Pro – vom Einsteiger zum Experten
courses.bio: Schritt für Schritt zur professionellen RAW-Entwicklung
objectives: Was ist ein RAW-Konverter?
Was unterscheidet Sitzungen von Katalogen?
Alles über die Arbeitsumgebung, Register und Werkzeuge
Automatische Anpassung

Belichtung, Kontrast, Klarheit und Struktur
HDR-Werkzeug und echtes HDR
Tonwerte und Kurven einstellen
Farben korrigieren und manipulieren
Schwarzweißbilder entwickeln
Zuschneiden, drehen und spiegeln
Trapezkorrektur
Schärfung und Rauschreduzierung
Fleckentfernung und Retusche
Lokale Anpassungen, Pinsel, Ebenen und Masken
Stile und Stilpinsel
Schlüsselwörter
Bilder mit externen Programmen bearbeiten
requirements: Keine Vorkenntnisse erforderlich. Der Kurs führt von Grund auf in die Arbeit mit Capture One ein.
courses.description:
Mein Name ist Markus Wäger. Ich bin Autor und Dozent für Fotografie und Gestaltung und habe Bücher über Photoshop, InDesign, Grafikdesign, Fotografie, Kameras und Farbe geschrieben – viele waren oder sind Bestseller in ihrem Bereich. Mit Capture One arbeite ich seit 2009 und habe Einsteiger wie auch Experten in der Anwendung unterrichtet. Dieser Kurs überträgt meinen Offline-Unterricht in die Online-Welt.
Du erfährst hier alles Wissenswerte über Benutzeroberfläche und Arbeitsumgebung, Register und Werkzeuge, was eine Sitzung ist und was sie von einem Katalog unterschiedet, welche Vor- und Nachteile beides hat, alles rund um Import und Export, du lernst Histogramme zu verstehen und zu interpretieren, was es über Belichtung, Kontrast, Klarheit, Struktur und HDR zu wissen gibt, Einstellungen und Auswirkungen von Tonwerten und Kurven, es gibt einen Abschnitt über Farbkorrekturen und Farbmanipulationen, ich zeige den Umgang mit den Werkzeugen für das Zuschneiden, Drehen und die Trapezkorrektur ebenso, wie mit Rauschreduzierung, Schärfung und Fleckentfernung, sowie lokalen Anpassungen mit Ebenen, Masken, Pinseln und Retuschewerkzeugen. Das letzte Kapitel nimmt sich schließlich noch Stilen, Voreinstellungen und Schlüsselwörtern an.
Natürlich kann ein Kurs kaum absolut jede Funktion eines so umfangreichen Programmes wie Capture One Pro beschreiben. Einiges ist so speziell, dass es für kaum einen Anwender von Bedeutung ist, manches würde dermaßen ins »klein klein« hineinführen, dass es die Geduld der Zuseher:innen mehr strapazieren würde, als es für sie von Nutzen wäre. Abgesehen von einigen Details habe ich außerdem das Thema tethered Shooting ausgespart, bei dem die Kamera via Kabel oder Bluetooth mit Capture One verbunden wird, sich vom Programm aus steuern lässt und Aufnahmen direkt auf den Computer übertragen werden. Das liegt nicht zuletzt daran, dass Capture One diese Funktion für meine Kameras nicht unterstützt. Da das Thema aber ohnehin nur für die wenigsten Anwender von Bedeutung sein wird, sollte es den Nutzen des Lehrgangs nicht schmälern.
Eine detaillierte Auflistung aller Themen die in den Lektionen des Kurses besprochen werden findest du auf der Kurs-Landing-Page unter Kursbeschreibung. Bei den jeweiligen Stichworten erfährst du auch in welchen Lektionen das Thema erklärt wird. Eine direkte verlinkung zwischen Thema und Lektion erlaubt Udemy leider nicht.
Ich habe mir für diesen Kurs auch die Mühe gemacht Untertitel zu erstellen, um den Kurs barrierefrei zu machen. Aktivieren kannst du die Untertitel über das CC-Icon, wo du neben Deutsch auch Übersetzungen in Englisch, Portugiesisch und Spanisch findest.
Auch wer Untertitel an und für sich nicht benötigt oder nutzen möchte, kann einen Nutzen daraus ziehen: Wenn du auf das Notizblatt-Icon klickst werden die Untertitel als Transkript eingeblendet, so dass du mit der Suchen-Funktion deines Browsers rasch die Stelle im Video findest, an der der Begriff vorkommt. Zusammen mit dem Stichwortverzeichnis auf der Landing-Page kannst du den Kurs somit nicht nur zum Lernen, sondern auch effizient zum Nachschlagen nutzen.
Für all jene, die nicht Deutsch sprechen und in Betracht ziehen am Kurs auf Basis der übersetzten Transkiptionen teilzunehmen, sei erwähnt, dass es sich um automatische Übersetzungen handelt und ich deren Qualität nicht beurteilen kann. Ich empfehle deshalb erst anhand der sechs kostenlosen Vorschau-Videos zu prüfen, ob sie geeignet sind Nutzen aus dem Lehrgang zu ziehen.
So viel zur Beschreibung meines Kurses »Capture One Pro – vom Einsteiger zum Experten«. Ich hoffe sie hat dich neugierig gemacht und lade dich ein mit ihm Schritt für Schritt die professionelle RAW-Entwicklung mit dem Programm zu erlernen. Sollten im Verlauf des Kurses Fragen auftreten, bitte ich dich sie über die Kommentar-Funktionen zu stellen – ich werde mich bemühen zeitnah zu antworten. Konstruktive Kritik ist stets willkommen. Mein Ziel mit dem Kurs ist es dir den Umgang mit dem RAW-Konverter verständlich näher zu bringen und sowohl deine Arbeitseffizienz als auch die Qualität deiner Arbeiten zu verbessern und natürlich auch, dass du gerne eine gute Bewertung dafür abgibst.
Ich wünsche dir nun viel Vergnügen und einen großartigen Lernerfolg.

requirements: パソコン (Windows PC or MAC)

courses.description:
せっかく撮った写真、まだ眠っていませんか。
RAW画像で写真を撮影したけれど、RAW現像の方法に悩んでいませんか？このコースでは、Adobe Lightroom Classic CCを用いて、本格的なRAW現像方法を誰でも学ぶことができます。私は、RAW現像は、写真の本当の色を引き出してあげる作業だと思っています。世界で一番優れたレンズは、人間の瞳です。そのレンズを通して見ている風景に少しでも近づける作業・・・それがRAW現像だと思っています。そして、その先には、作品作りという写真の醍醐味とも言えるステップが待ち構えています。
2021年 Adobe Lightroom Classic CCの評価は？
メジャーなAdobe Photoshopソフトウェアは非常に素晴らしいソフトウェアだと思います。ではなぜ、わざわざLightroomの方を使わなければいけないのか？それは、Lightroomが写真管理に優れているだけでなく、写真プレビュー能力にも優れ、独自に作成した色調補正プリセットを複数の写真に適用できるからです。プロのカメラマンの世界では、1日に1000枚の写真を撮影するなんてこともよくあります。撮影した写真を確実に管理し、最善の状態でアウトプットすることまでがカメラマンの能力として測られます。Adobe Lightroom Classic CCはそんなプロだけでなく、個人レベルでも写真ライフを助ける強力なツールと言えるでしょう。
RAW現像と写真管理
このコースでは、RAW現像のためのツールの解説をしながら講師が実際にRAW現像を行います。それに用いる多くの写真のRAWデータがコース内で支給されます。各現像ツールの強みやポイントなど実際に手で触りながら実践し、身体でソフトウェアを覚えることができます。また、写真管理機能もしっかりと学べます。コース修了の頃には、写真との向き合い方・写真の考え方に至るまで変化が生まれるかもしれません。
最後に
このコースでは、Adobe Lightroom Classic CCを初めて使う人でも安心して学ぶことができるコースとなっております。写真管理やRAW現像というのは一見難しそうですが、コツさえ掴んでしまえば、とても簡単です。ぜひ、写真編集の扉を一緒に開きませんか。
target_audience: 写真初心者の方
RAW現像を学んでみたい方
写真の効果的な管理方法を学び効率化を図りたい方
撮影したRAW画像を触れずに眠らせてしまっている方
これから写真を始めてみたいと思っている方
Lightroom Classic CCソフトウェアを学ぶ意欲のある方

courses.description:
Bildbearbeitung mit Gimp 2.10.30


Sie interessieren sich für die Bearbeitung von Bildern und Grafiken, möchten aber nicht viel Geld für teure Software oder monatliche Abonnements ausgeben? Dann ist Gimp, eine kostenlose OpenSource Lösung, vielleicht das Richtige für Sie. Denn mit dieser können Anfänger und Fortgeschrittene gleichermaßen schnelle Erfolge erzielen.


In diesem Video-Kurs zeigen wir Ihnen Klick-für-Klick welche Stellschrauben Sie drehen müssen, um die Qualität Ihrer Bilder in Windeseile zu verbessen. Dazu gehen wir neben klassischen Grundeinstellungen, vorgefertigten Kunstfiltern und Möglichkeiten der Retusche insbesondere auf die Arbeit mit Ebenen ein, welche die Erstellung von einfachen Collagen und Fotomontagen begünstigen.


Kursinhalte


1. Software installieren & Benutzeroberfläche anpassen
2. Fotos öffnen & importieren, speichern & exportieren
3. Fotografien verbessern
4. Bilder zuschneiden & skalieren
5. Auswahlwerkzeuge & Farben
6. Textelemente erstellen & bearbeiten
7. Ebenen erstellen & einsetzen
8. Elemente retuschieren & freistellen
9. Tipps & Tricks


Ablauf


Der Kurs ist in einzelne Lernvideos unterteilt, welche Sie orts- und zeitunabhängig abrufen können. Dazu erhalten Sie eine Reihe von Lernmaterialien, welche Sie mit wachsendem Lernfortschritt bearbeiten und auf Wunsch Ihrem Kursleiter für Feedback senden können. Dieser steht Ihnen während des gesamten Kurses für Rückfragen zur Verfügung.


Über die Kühe im Netz GmbH


Wir – das ist ein junges, dynamisches Team aus dem schönen Allgäu. Unter bayerisch‘ blauem Himmel und auf grünen Wiesen aufgewachsen, bringen wir eine große Liebe für unsere Heimat in unsere tägliche Arbeit ein, weshalb uns besonders kleine Betriebe und Selbständige aus der Region ihr Vertrauen schenken. Für Sie kümmern wir uns nicht nur um die Konzeption, Gestaltung und Umsetzung individueller WEBSEITEN, sondern begleiten unsere Kunden auch nach der Fertigstellung in allen MARKETING Fragen, angefangen von SCHULUNGEN zur Selbstorganisation, über Wartungsarbeiten und Neugestaltungen, bis hin zur vollständigen Homepage-Verwaltung sofern dies gewünscht wird.
target_audience: Unternehmer, Marketingfachkräfte, Blogger, Hobbyfotografen...

courses.description:
Photoshop CC: Digital Art Pro Techniques - Become an Artist!
I have designed this course to teach you how to use Photoshop to create your own unique digital artwork. If you want to learn how to create digital illustrations that you can sell with great profit on image stocks like Shutterstock, Istock or Alamy - take this course!

I strongly encourage you to experiment with your own ideas and to modify techniques that you are going to learn to create workflow that suits best your artistic needs.
In Sections 3-7 of the course I will walk you through all basic Photoshop tools that are useful while working on a digital artwork - you will have clear understanding of layers, layers blending modes, masks and adjustments.
By the end of the 7th section you will feel confident with image manipulation in Photoshop using various creative techniques. You will be able to enhance the desired artistic effect by using the Adjustment Layers in flexible way.
In the Section 8 I will show you full creative process, clearly explaining step by step all the applied techniques. You will have lifetime access to complete set of high quality assets used to create the digital artwork. The tutorial is meant to give you a comprehensive introduction to creative digital photo manipulation while following along with my process.

In this course I am going to share with you the techniques and tips I am using to create my artistic prints. During the few hours of my workflow you will get the skills that allow you to fully express your creativity.
Enrollment in this course includes access to hours of follow-along lectures where you will learn the most effective way: in practice.
Joining for the course also includes

Access to the discussion forums
Access to all future lectures that are added to this course (that may be a result of questions from the discussions forums) or new techniques related to portrait photography
Besides over 3,5 hours of lectures, I also include quizzes to assess your learning, and some helpful handouts on Photoshop Keyboard Shortcuts, RGB Color Mode and Layer Blend Modes.
See my bio on this page for more of my educational and professional background. Links to my portfolio are available in the last Lecture of the course.
What else?

Except the knowledge, You are going to get the lifetime access to all the high quality Supplementary Materials used in Sections 3-7.
Enjoy the Course!

Kasia Zmokla

courses.bio: learn dynamic film theory that will make the most of your aerial photography

requirements: Have access to a DJI Mavic Air or Mini 2 drone
courses.description:
Learn how to master your DJI drone, start to finish.
We'll start by examining the body of the DJI Mini 2 (an update from the DJI Mavic Mini) and the Remote Controller (same one used on the Mavic Air), going over every single button. From there we will learn how to fly using the mobile touchscreen interface and pertinent menu settings. We'll learn how to properly expose your image, adjust its color temperature, set the resolution to 4K and the framerate to 30 per videography standards.
Then we will do a deep dive into various drone shots and aerial angles and analye what makes a shot truly cinematic. Bird's Eye View, Circling, Liftoff, Dronie, Rocket, Epic Grow and Reverse. I've even included a list of 34 different drone shots for you to learn. We'll learn how to master DJI's preprogrammed QuickShots. We'll ease any concerns you have about drone flying. Then we'll discuss filming on location versus having footage focused on a single subject. We'll even learn how to make the most of your static aerial tripod shots with tilts and pans.
Finally, we will learn how to color correct and export your drone footage so that it is seen in the highest possible quality. I've included a free custom DJI Mini 2 LUT to make the process even easier. You'll become a professional drone pilot in no time.
Time to take your aerial cinematography to the next level.
target_audience: Anyone who wants to learn more about aerial photography and videography

courses.description:
Lightroom is an intuitive photo editing application used by both enthusiasts and professional photographers. This course offers a comprehensive beginners guide for those interested in the foundations of Lightroom, with an emphasis on the Map and Book Module. The course starts off with a refresher on navigating the Lightroom interface, along with creating image catalogs and importing photo collections. From there we explore the import dialog, import file handling, file renaming, and metadata presets. These are all instrumental building blocks when it comes to building proficiency in navigating the Lightroom workspace. Once we’ve explored the foundations, we transition over to exploring the map module. Here we explore navigating the map module, with an overview of its use cases. From there we dive into geotagging both single photos and collection sets. Students also learn to filter images by location and use saved locations for enhanced sorting and tagging.

After completion of the map module, we transition to the book module. Here students will learn to create stunning, customized photo books using their image collections. We start with demonstrating how to navigate the book module interface. From there we explore book settings and layout options. This includes customized pages, page numbers, cell padding, and text formatting. We also cover background effects, before concluding with book publication using both third party services, or simply saving as PDF or JPEG files.

As you can see this course covers a number of topics that are essential to anyone starting off with Lightroom. It’s also a great resource for both professional and aspiring photographers that are looking to take their existing photos to the next level. If you’re as excited as we are about this course, hit the enroll button and let’s get started.
target_audience: Students interested in working with the Map and Book Module in Lightroom Classic CC
Students interested in Geotagging their Photos
Students interested in making Photo Albums
Students interested in publishing professional Photo Books using Lightroom Classic CC

courses.description:
If you love to capture amazing views, and moments. But constantly feel something could be improved in your images, whether they’re landscapes, cityscapes, portraits, or fashion images. This courses is the best place to be.
I am Marcin, phtoshop educator, with 6 milion views on my photoshop free educational videos, and over 100 000 students who watched purchased my premium courses. Except that, i am professional internationaly published retoucher and post production arist, working with magazines, tv, websites, fashion designers and top hairdressers.
I am here, to explain you photoshop in the easiest possible way. I designed this course as I would explain photoshop to my friend who just want to start adventure with photoshop, and become pro.
So i deliver you, all you need to know to become one, i give you tips and techniques that you want to use, and also, save your time by removing useless, tools and techniques that could only teach you wrong habits.
In this course - you will learn everything you need about camera row, how to proces and edit your images, how to fix them, and how to give them extra punch.
In photoshop you will learn how to clean background, signs, skin and hair.
You will learn to edit landscape and cityscape images, work with masks, adjust and master contrasts, shadows and highlights. You will learn basics of color harmony, and how to apply it to your photoshop work. How to color grade you image and how to work selectively with each color.
You will also learn basics of composing - just to make sure your images will be always impressive, you will learn how to combine two average images into one outstanding image. You will learn how to create great panoramic images - even without wide lenses by combining and adjusting images!
After all, we will be focused on portraits, on cleaning up, retouching with curves, working with etails, adjusting colors.
You will get everything you want to know about photoshop for your photography. After training lessons, we will practice together on a lot of images, starting from landscape edititing on a few different image examples! Then we will be working on few different portraits which you can follow along. Because I am not only giving you knowledge - I train it with You!
See you in the first lesson!

Everyone who wants to improve their social media images

This course is design to teach you by doing real work. What does it mean? Except the fact I am telling you what the tools do, and explaining my steps, I am also sharing with you all of the images I am working with - so you can follow and copy my steps, and even better - apply your own changes.
I believe this way of learning is most effective - ecause theory doesnt matter if we cannot apply it to reality.

Marcin

requirements: Du benötigst die professional-Version eines Franzis projects-Programmes.
courses.description:
Was ist die Franzis projects-Reihe?
Bei den projects-Programmen handelt es sich um eine Reihe von Programmen zur Bildbearbeitung, die den logischen Ablauf einer Bildentwicklung nachvollziehen:
Originalbild entrauschen
Bildaussage optimieren
Ergebnisbild nachschärfen
Für die Bildentrauschung und die Bildschärfung stehen separate "Spezialisten"-Programme zur Verfügung, für die Bildoptimierung kann aus verschiedenen Programmen gemäß des Bildmotivs oder des Darstellungsziels gewählt werden, z.B. für Farb- oder Schwarzweißbilder, Naturbilder, emotionale Aufnahmen, aber auch HDR-Fusionen, Focus Stacking und sogar ein Programm zur Elimination störender Elemente in einem Bild.
Wofür steht das "professional" im Kurstitel?
(Fast) alle Programme stehen in einer Standard- und einer Professional-Version zur Verfügung. Der große Mehrwert der "professionals" besteht im RAW-Modul, also einem Rohbild-Entwicklungsmodul. Dies lässt sich nicht nur auf Bilder im RAW-Format, sondern auf Bilder in nahezu jedem beliebigen Bildformat anwenden.
Was leistet das RAW-Modul, um das es in diesem Kurs geht?
Es ist bei Bildern wie mit dem Backen: Der Kuchen wird nur so gut, wie seine Zutaten es erlauben. Aus Fotos, bei denen die Voraussetzungen wie z.B. Farbtemperatur, Farbbalancen, Horizontausrichtung o.a. nicht stimmen, wird niemals ein Eyecatcher. All diese Korrekturen lassen sich im RAW-Modul durchführen.
Wie ist es zu diesem Kurs gekommen?
Vor kurzem ist mein Buch mit dem gleichnamigen Titel erschienen. Es lag also nahe, ergänzend dazu einen Videokurs zu gestalten. Naja, und hier ist er. ;-)
Muss ich das Buch zum Kurs kaufen?
Hm, nein, eigentlich nicht. Natürlich würde ich mich freuen, wenn Du auch das Buch kaufst. Zum Nachschlagen ist so ein Buch sowieso viel geeigneter als ein Online-Videokurs, aber es ist wirklich keine Voraussetzung, um erfolgreich an diesem Kurs teilnehmen zu können. Apropos: Das Buch heißt sehr ähnlich wie dieser Videokurs. ;-)
Und wann geht es endlich los?
Sobald Du Dich in meinen Kurs eingeschrieben hast, also ... jetzt sofort? Ich würde mich freuen! :-)
Wie geht es danach weiter?
Dieser Kurs (und das zugrunde liegende Buch) ist der erste Teil einer Kurs- (bzw. Buch-)reihe. In Band 2 wird es um das Programm COLOR projects, in Band 3 um SHARPEN projects, in Band 4 um HDR projects und in Band 5 um das Experten-Modul in all diesen Programmen gehen. Nach Band 5 ist aber noch nicht Schluss ...
target_audience: Anwender der Franzis projects-Reihe.

courses.description:
Gereksinimler
Öğrenciler takip edebilmek için bilgisayarlarında Adobe Photoshop CC yüklü olmalıdır. İndirilebilir uygulama klibi ile bu kurs boyunca bir çok uygulama alıştırması var. Eğitimi izlerken uygulamalı pratik yapmanızı istiyoruz.
Bu kursu Adobe Premiere Pro CC'nin (creative bulut) en son sürümünü kullanarak öğretiyoruz, bu yüzden CC'yi kullanıyorsanız en iyisi budur. Ancak daha önceki bir sürümü varsa (CS6, CS5, CS4, CS3 - Mac veya PC), bir profesyonel gibi düzenleme yapmayı hala öğrenebilirsiniz.


Açıklama
Bu fotoğrafçılık kursu Doğum, Bebek ve Yenidoğan Fotoğrafçısı olmak isteyenler için özel tasarlanmış Photoshop CC eğitimidir. Doğum fotoğraf çekimlerini profesyonel düzenleme işlemi yapabilmeniz için bu kursa katılmalısınız.
Türkiye’nin en kapsamlı Yenidoğan Fotoğrafçılığı Eğitim Setidir ve sürekli güncellenmektedir.
Online Doğum Fotoğrafçılığı Kursu olduğu için ister Bilgisayar, isterse de Mobil uygulama üzerinden eğitimleri izleyebilirsiniz.
** Tek sefer ödeme yapmanız yeterlidir. Aylık ödeme alınmaz. Bir defa ödeme yaptıktan sonra tüm eklenecek yeni videolara ücretsiz ulaşırsınız.
* En iyi fiyat garantisi
* En kapsamlı ders içeriği
* Özel soru sorma imkanı
* Başarı ve Eğitim Sertifikası
* Tek ödeme ile ömür boyu erişim
* Mobil ve bilgisayardan izleme imkanı
* Yeni eklenen videolara ücretsiz erişim


Yenidoğan fotoğraflarını profesyonelce düzenlemeye başlayın! Hızlı öğrenme dersleri ile hemen uygulamaya başlayacaksınız!
Yeni doğan bebek fotoğraflarını düzenlemek istiyorsanız Adobe Photoshop CC en iyi uygulamadır. Photoshop CC programı globalde tüm amatör ve profesyonel fotoğrafçı ve sanatçılar tarafından kullanılır.
Dünya genelinde profesyonellerin kullandığı teknikleri uygulamalı olarak öğrenmeni sağlayacaktır.


Yenidoğan fotoğrafları istediğiniz ettiğiniz gibi düzenleyin!
Fotoğraf düzenleme yaparken uygulamalarla alıştırma yapın. Bu kurs egzersiz, pratik video dosyalarını içerir, böylece bir taraftan videoları izlerken diğer taraftan pratik yapabilirsiniz.


Kursun sonunda, bir profesyonel gibi fotoğraf düzenleme öğreneceksiniz!
Doğum, bebek ve yenidoğan fotoğrafçılığı kursu ile sıfırdan hiç bilginiz olmadan profesyonel fotoğraf düzenleme tekniklerini öğreneceksiniz.


Kursun İşleyişi
Ders online video şeklindedir. Eğitmen videoda konu konu anlatacaklarını anlatır. Katılımcılar akıllarına takılan soruları Soru&Cevap bölümünde sorabilirler. Eğitmen, bu soruları da yanıtlayacaktır.

Bu Fotoğraf Düzenleme Kursu Sayesinde Neler Öğreneceksiniz
A'dan Z'ye yenidoğan fotoğrafı düzenleme ile ilgili her detayı öğreneceksiniz
Photoshop CC ile Doğum Fotoğrafı düzenleme tekniklerini ve püf noktaları göreceksiniz
Çektiğiniz yenidoğan fotoğraflarında profesyonellerin kullandıkları yöntemleri ve nasıl işlemeniz gerektiğini öğreneceksiniz


Afgan Rasulov kimdir ve onu farklı kılan nedir?
Afgan Rasulov hem Adobe Photoshop hem de YouTube Sertifikalı Uzman YouTube'da 250.000'den fazla abonesiyle Afgan Rasulov kendi adıyla açtığı Türkiye’nin en büyük YouTube ve Photoshop dersleri video eğitimlerini paylaşan YouTube kanalının sahibidir. Eğitimlerini 21 milyondan fazla kişi izledi!
Yıllardır insanlara kendileri geliştirmeleri için uzmanlaştığı konularda online eğitimler hazırlıyor ve işini çok iyi yapıyor. Tüm bu zaman boyunca binlerce güzel yorum aldı. Ekşisözlük'te hakkında yazılmış yorumlar için adını aratabilirsiniz.
Eğitimleri 22,000+ Öğrenci ve yüzlerce güzel yorum aldı ve “EN POPÜLER EĞİTMEN” statüsünü kazandı!
Afgan Rasulov hakkında yapılan Ekşisözlük yorumlardan bazıları:
Eğitimlerini severek takip ettiğim kişi. Anlatım tarzı, uslübü gerçekten güzel. Ayrıca Photoshop’a yeni başlayanlar için iyi bir rehber, umarız devam eder eğitimlere… - suyuarayanadam
Gerçekten gayet kaliteli ve öğretici dersleri var. Umarım hep devam eder. Şu Dünya'da en çok saygı duyulması gereken işlerden birini yapıyor. - cokoprens
Azerbaycan uyruklu olmasına rağmen düzgün diksiyonu ve Türkçe'siyle sıkmadan, kafaları karıştırmadan Photoshop eğitimi veren güzel insan. Kendisinden öğrenilecek çok şey var. - kafkasorcun


Bu Doğum, Bebek ve Yenidoğan Fotoğraf Düzenleme kursu ne hakkında?
Adobe Photoshop CC fotoğraf düzenleme kursuna yönelik yeni başlayanlara özel bu eksiksiz kılavuzda, yalnızca Photoshop CC'de bulunan düzenleme araçlarını değil, aynı zamanda profesyonel bir yenidoğan fotoğrafçısı zihniyetiyle düzenlemeyi de öğreneceksiniz.


Bu kurs aşağıdakiler de dahil olmak üzere bebek fotoğrafı düzenlemeye başlamak için bilmeniz gereken her şeyi kapsayacaktır:
Pratik ve hızlı doğum, yenidoğan ve bebek fotoğraf düzenleme teknikleri
Yenidoğan fotoğraf rötuş işlemleri ile ilgili en detaylı bilgiler
Camera RAW kullanarak bebek fotoğraflarına ışık ekleme tekniklerini
Yenidoğan profesyonel fotoğrafçıların kullandığı renk ekleme tekniklerini
Yenidoğan fotoğraf zemin değiştirme işlemi
LUT kullanarak bebek fotoğraflarına renk ekleme
Doğum fotoğraflarında bebek modellere boyut kazandırma tekniklerini
Photoshop CC programını profesyonel kullanmanız için notlar
Bonus videolar ve gelişmiş verimlilik ipuçları
Çok daha fazlası!


Şu anda sektörde çalışan, en güncel Photoshop CC tekniklerini bilen ve Türkiye’nin en büyük grafik ve tasarım kanalına sahip bir kişiden öğrenin.


BONUS: Bonus olarak, siz öğrenirken uygulamaları pratik yapmanız için indirilebilir ek fotoğraf dosyalarını indirebileceksiniz.


Bu kursun sonunda, bir video editörü olarak olan güveniniz artacak. İster hobi isterse de profesyonel sektörde Adobe Premiere Pro'nun kariyer fırsatı olarak nasıl kullanılacağını tam olarak anlayacaksınız.


Eğitimi şimdi satın alın ve indirimi kaçırmayın!
Bu kurs kimler için uygun:
Sıfırdan doğum, yenidoğan ve bebek fotoğraf düzenlemeyi öğrenmek isteyenler
Çok hızlı ve pratik yoldan fotoğraf düzenleme öğrenmek isteyenler
Profesyonel yenidoğan fotoğrafçılarının kullandıkları teknikleri öğrenmek isteyenler
Photoshop CC programını verimli şekilde kullanmak isteyenler
A'dan Z'ye yenidoğan fotoğrafı düzenleme ile ilgili her detayı öğrenmek isteyenler
Yenidoğan fotoğrafı renk efektlerini ve püf noktalarını öğrenmek isteyenler
Profesyonel yenidoğan fotoğraf işleme sürecini merak edenler

requirements: Conhecimento básico do Photoshop

Neste curso você dominará as principais técnicas de recorte de imagem para ter controle total nas suas fusões utilizando Photoshop CC 2018 dos recursos mais simples até os mais avançados.

IMPORTANTE:
Este curso é compatível com o Photoshop para MAC e para PC. Ministrado utilizando OSX (MAC).
O curso é em português mas as ferramentas estão em  inglês
Se você está começando agora, e não conhece nada de Photoshop CC 2018 mas gostaria de iniciar, conte comigo, eu Thiago Christo sou seu instrutor e vou te ajudar nessa jornada.

Máscaras

Vejo você dentro do curso!
Abraços Thiago Christo
