courses.description:
Welcome to our detailed step-by-step guide on landscape photo editing on Skylum’s Udemy Channel.


Whether you're a beginning photographer or have been in the field for some time, our course will come in handy! It's full of editing insights, tips, and practice. On top of that, it will equip you with a great photo editing tool and show you how to make various landscape photo adjustments with its help.


Throughout the course, you will learn some fundamentals of landscape editing - from different types of landscape to the main mistakes you need to avoid while editing photos. You'll also practice a lot, following the guidelines of our instructor and taking all the best practices. By the end of the course, you will not only learn how to make basic photo adjustments but also try using AI-powered, creative, and advanced editing tools to make your landscape photos stand out.




THE COURSE WILL FOCUS ON 4 KEY AREAS:


Basic landscape photo editing
This section is about making basic adjustments to your images with Luminar Neo, so we’ll guide you through the whole process - from setting it up to enhancing basic settings. Here you'll also learn how to use special landscape editing tools to change images in a clear and easy way.


Editing with AI-powered tools
Those of you who want to keep up with the trends and make the best of cutting-edge technologies will particularly like this section since it describes the main AI tools of Luminar Neo and shows how they work in practice. Make sure you don’t miss it.


Developing artistic vision with creative tools
In this section, you will gain even more opportunities to express yourself with photos by using creative tools for editing your landscapes. You'll also learn how to change the mood and the emotion of the photos, unleashing your creative potential.


Follow professional editing tips
Actually, here you'll get more than just editing tips - they are all given by real professionals in the field and illustrated by examples. This section contains some practical editing lessons, including how to work with contrast, harmonize colors, and control the viewer's eye.




WHO IS THE INSTRUCTOR?
Vanelli — is a working sports and portrait photographer, educator, and author living in Florida. As an experienced educator, Vanelli has created videos for LinkedIn Learn, has written hundreds of articles, taught at major photography conferences and has developed many photography and digital workflow programs including Click for Kids. Currently, he is the Director of Education at Skylum Software, teaching workshops, writing for Photofocus, and creating tutorials for the Vanelli and Friends series.


YOU’LL HAVE THE OPPORTUNITY TO LEARN PHOTO EDITING FROM TOP PROFESSIONALS:


We make world-renowned photo editing software since 2009 that helps elevate the creativity of photo artists. Since then, Skylum won many industry awards, and, what's more important — the trust of thousands of customers.


Skylum thrives for innovation, and has won industry awards, including Best Mac App of 2017, EISA Best Product 2019-2020, Outdoor Photographer Editors’ Picks, The LUCIE Technical Awards for Best Software Plugin 2019, TIPA World Awards for Best Imaging Software 2019.2020 Editor’s Choice by Macworld for Luminar 4.
Luminar Neo is the latest AI photo editing software from Skylum. Editing photos in Luminar Neo has made photography post-processing easier than ever. In this course, we'll show you how to use Luminar Neo and how to edit photos in Luminar Neo to achieve stunning results.


Our instructors have years of experience not only in editing but also in teaching, and the syllabus of this course has been meticulously developed to be both easy to follow and comprehensive.




OUR PHOTO EDITING TRAINING INCLUDES:


Theory: 2+ hours of lectures with plenty of hands-on examples. Lessons range from 3 to 20 minutes and are easy to follow
Practice Materials: detailed step-by-step checklists, an archive of photos, and some practical lessons to make the course more interactive and valuable
Lifetime access to the course and any future updates
Students' Support: If you have questions, we will be willing to answer
Complete the course and receive an Udemy certificate


SHOULD YOU BE WORRIED?
This course comes with a 30-day money-back guarantee.


We hope you'll enjoy mastering landscape photo editing with us!
Click the "Buy now" button to gain your first hands-on experience and turn your landscapes into masterpieces!

requirements: 必要な経験やスキルはありません。
ドローンを持っていなくても受講することが可能です。
courses.description:
ドローンに関する規制などを理解して、正しくドローンを飛ばす方法を紹介するコースです。


日本国内においてドローンを飛行させるのには機体登録は必須ですが、必ずしも資格が必要という訳ではありません。
機体登録を行うことで、特定飛行でなければ誰でも飛行させることは可能です。
しかし、飛行させる場所（エリア）や飛行方法によっては特定飛行となり、許可申請等が必要な場合があります。（もちろん飛行禁止の場所もあります）
このコースでは、ドローンに関する規制などを正しく理解して、合法的にドローンを飛行させる方法を紹介しています。


コース内では、


・ドローンの定義
・機体登録とリモートIDについて
・ドローンに関する規制（特定飛行や飛行形態など）
・飛行カテゴリー
・特定飛行をする方法（飛行申請）
・第二種無人航空機操縦士技能証明の紹介
・飛行通報の方法


などについて学び、ルールを正しく理解して、誰でもドローンを飛行させることができるようになっています。


ドローンには興味あるけど資格などが必要で敷居が高いと思っていた方、これから空撮にチャレンジしてみたい方などの初心者向けのコースとなっています。
なお、すでにルールなどを理解していて、実際にドローンを飛行させているような方は受講する必要はありません。


それでは、正しく、楽しく、空に向かって飛び出しましょう！
target_audience: ドローンに興味があってこれから始めてみたい人
空撮にチャレンジしてみたい人
ドローンに関する規制がよくわからなくて初心者が飛行させて良いかわからない人

Featured Review:
"Very easy to follow and very informative. So far this is the best instructional class I have purchased from UDEMY!" - Mathew Yudell
Hi and Welcome to our tutorial “Easy Portrait Retouching With Lightroom Classic And Adobe Photoshop”.
***Includes 45 Lightroom Presets and All Practice Images*** (Lecture 99)
Fully retouched images are now expected by clients and models. But most likely you don’t want to spend hours working in Photoshop but rather develop an efficient workflow that will enable you to finish your images quicker, meaning you can get back to shooting your next project.
This course is for photographers who want to improve their portrait retouching in Lightroom and Photoshop with a quick and easy workflow. If you would love to bring out the best in your images whilst working creative and time efficient, then this course is for you!
In this course, I will show you step-by-step the most important functionalities in Lightroom Classic and Photoshop, so you can develop your images to their highest potential. You will learn to enhance your photos with the right adjustments of white balance, color grading, tonality and exposure, you will understand important methods to fix skin blemishes and apply softening (without destroying pores) but we will also look at tricky situations like fixing your backgrounds and how you can create actions to work super fast. And even better - in the course materials you will find all the presets that we develop in this course - so you just download those and apply them to your images - easy as that!
So at the end of the course, you will be able to use and develop Lightroom presets that guarantee you a quick, easy and creative retouching workflow. You will also know how to edit your images further in Photoshop efficiently.
If you want to know how to edit beautiful portraits that will blow your clients away every time - go ahead and watch some previews or if you’re ready to learn the tricks of the trade - enroll now!
See you soon!

courses.description:
**This bundle includes downloadable course instructor files to work and follow along with, plus LIFETIME access!


This amazing-value two-course bundle gets you full access to our Adobe Photoshop CC courses that all you'll need to learn how to edit and enhance your photos, images, and graphics like a pro.


We start with the basics of navigating the program and customizing the workspace. We quickly get into creating documents, importing your images, drawing and transforming shapes, and using cropping tools. We then explore the various selection tools, including the amazing Lasso, Marquee, Magic Wand, and Quick Selection tools. Next, we do a deep dive into the ever-important layers and layer management functions within Photoshop. We continue with more advanced tools like masking, adjustments layers, special effects, and filters.


From personalizing your workspace and fine-tuning keyboard shortcuts to mastering advanced image manipulation filters like Vanishing, Sharpening, and Blur, you'll acquire the expertise to reshape and enhance your visual creations. Gain an in-depth understanding of Photoshop Artboards, leveraging them for intricate design variations and streamlined content exporting. Explore the advantages of Neural Filters, effortlessly crafting complex AI-generated designs. Harness the power of Creative Cloud Libraries and Adobe Stock to manage assets effectively and infuse your projects with high-quality elements. Dive into advanced techniques such as precise shape manipulation with the Pen Tool, selecting intricate details like hair, and transforming text into dynamic shapes. With insights into Character and Paragraph Styles and the creation and application of Patterns and Graphic Styles, you can refine your designs for a consistent and polished outcome.


What's included?


Adobe Photoshop CC for Beginners:
Understanding and customizing the Photoshop workspace
Object transformation fundamentals—moving and transforming objects, changing document properties, and cropping basics
An introduction to layers
Using selection tools such as the Marquee, Lasso, Magic Wand, Quick Selection, Object Selection, Background Removal, and Sky Replacement tools
Using eraser tools and the warping tool
Understanding colors and swatches and creating custom shapes
Working with masks
Using adjustment layers for photo enhancement—levels, curves, black and white, vibrance, and hue and saturation adjustment layers
Using photo touch-up tools such as the Patch, Healing, and Clone Stamp tools

Exporting and saving options and Photoshop preferences.


Adobe Photoshop CC Intermediate:
Customize Photoshop with personalized workspaces, keyboards, and menus.
Grasp artboard concepts and their advantages for diverse design projects.
Utilize Creative Cloud libraries for organized collaboration and asset management.
Refine and execute design variations by developing and controlling layer comps.
Explore advanced Photoshop filters like vanishing, sharpening, and blur for impact.
Create intricate AI-generated designs with ease using neural filter tools.
Master Bezier curves and anchor points for precise shape manipulation.
Construct accurate shapes and custom paths using expert pen tool techniques.
Enhance element isolation and accuracy through advanced selection methods.
Create and implement patterns and pattern overlays to elevate your designs.


This course bundle includes:
8+ hours of video tutorials
70+ individual video lectures
Course files to follow along
Certificate of completion

requirements: No se necesitan requisitos previos ni conocimientos de fotografía
Material necesario para construir la cámara: una lata, cinta aislante, cinta de aluminio, aguja, taladro con broca del 4
Material necesario para revelar: líquido revelador y fijador, papel fotosensible, luz roja, dos cristales, cuatro cubetas y pinzas
courses.description:
En el curso de Fotografía Estenopeica, aprenderás a construir tu propia cámara utilizando únicamente una lata, papel fotosensible y material de revelado.
En un mundo excesivamente tecnológico, ávido por obtener resultados instantaneos a golpes de clic, recuperar las técnicas más antiguas de la fotografía se convierte en un sorbo de agua en el desierto. Basándonos en el principio de la cámara oscura, una simple lata se puede convertir en una cámara de fotos, sin necesidad de utilizar cámaras Reflex, móviles ni programas de edición.
Al finalizar el curso serás capaz de construirte tu propia cámara y sacar unas fotos únicas e irrepetibles, revosantes de personalidad, en blanco y negro y con efecto vintage.
¿Qué serás capaz de hacer realizando este curso?
1- Conocerás los materiales necesarios para construir y revelar tus fotos, precios y dónde puedes conseguirlos
2- Aprenderás a construir tu propia cámara
3- Conocerás los distintos efectos que pueden tomar tus fotos según la lata que elijas
4- Aprenderás a cargar la lata con el papel fotosensible y a sacar fotos en el exterior
5- Aprenderás a revelar el negatigo y el positivo en el interior del cuarto oscuro
6- Te recomendaré algunas aplicaciones de teléfono móvil para mejorar tu Instagram
7- Extra: te enseñaré la sorprendente técnica de la estampación con luz por Fotogramas
¿Me acompañas en esta aventura?
Juan Ferrete
target_audience: Apasionados por la fotografía antigua, los métodos artesanales y la fotografía vintage en blanco y negro
Profesores y profesoras que quieran impartir esta técnica en sus clases de tecnología o en talleres de fotografía

requirements: Fujifilm X-T4 fotoğraf makinası sahibi olmak veya sahip olmayı düşünmek
Temel fotoğrafçılık seviyesinde bilgi sahibi olmak
courses.description:
Merhaba arkadaşlar;
Bu eğitimi incelediğinize göre ya Fujifilm X-T4 ile ilgileniyor, onu almayı düşünüyorsunuz ya da halihazırda almış durumdasınız.
Alanların içini rahatlatacak, almayı düşünenlerinin kararını kolaylaştıracak bir cümle ile başlayayım:
“Çok doğru karar...”
Evet, Fujifilm X-T4 çok iyi bir makine birçok üstün özellikleri var.
Ancak şunu unutmamanızı rica ediyorum. Dünyanın en iyi fotoğraf makinasına dahi sahip olsanız, eğer makinanızı sizin elinizin, gözünüzün bir parçası olmamışsa hiçbir işe yaramaz.
Neden mi? Açıklayalım:
Fotoğraf çekme süreci içerisinde fotoğrafçının beyni, birçok konu için aynı anda düşünmek zorundadır. Bunlar,
ışık, diyafram, enstantane, ISO, makine ayarları, lens ve açı seçimi gibi teknik konular;
Kompozisyon kurgusu ve diğer estetik kaygılar
Anlatım dili ve içerik ile kaygılar
O birkaç saniye hatta zaman zaman milisaniye içerisine bu kadar çok konu ve bir o kadar çok karar sığdırmak gerçekten hiç kolay bir şey olmasa gerek.
İşte bu konu ve kaygılar içerisinde en kolay elimine edilebilecek, değişkenliği en az şey, makine ile ilgili ayarlar bölümüdür.
Siz makinanıza hakim iseniz, makinanızdan ne istediğinizi biliyorsanız, makinanızın size ne verebileceğini biliyorsanız ve istediklerinizi makinanızdan nasıl alacağınızı biliyorsanız artık önemli konulardan birisini halletmişsiniz demektir.
Diğer konulara, kompozisyona ve fotoğrafın içeriğine, anlatım dilinizi oluşturmaya konsantre olabilirsiniz.
Ancak, makinanızı tanımıyorsanız, fotoğraf çekme süreci sizin için makine ile boğuşma serüveni haline gelir ve bu sırada fotoğraflar uçar, gider.
Makinanıza çok ciddi bir maddi yatırım yaptınız. Şimdi de kendinize küçük bir yatırım yapın ve makinanızla bütünleşmenize yardımcı olacak “Fujifilm X-T4’te Ustalaşmak Video Eğitim Serisini” izleyin. Kendinize yapacağınız bu küçük yatırımın, makinanıza yaptığınız o büyük yatırımı nasıl değerli kıldığını göreceksiniz.
Toplamda 65 ders, 6.5 saate yakın eğitimi kapsayan “X-T4’te Ustalaşmak Video Eğitim Serisi”nde, çok yetenekli ve üstün özelliklere sahip olan makinanızı, doğru tanımanız ve ona hakim olmanız için en ufak detaydan en karmaşık konulara kadar hemen her şeyi vermeye çalıştım.
Bu eğitimi bitirdiğinizde bir kenara bırakmayacak, takıldığınız her şeyde tekrar tekrar gelip izleyeceksiniz. Gerekiyorsa baştan sona tekrar izlemelisiniz. Ne zaman ki makinanız sizin eliniz, gözünüz oldu o zaman gönül rahatlığı ile bir kenara bırakabilirsiniz.
Ayrıca ne zaman ihtiyacınız olursa, soru, görüş, yorum ve önerilerinize açık olacağım. Bana Udemy üzerinden veya sosyal medya hesaplarımdan her zaman ulaşabileceksiniz.
Fotoğraf serüveninizde; makinanızla boğuşmadan diğer konulara konsantre olmanız için size “Fujifilm X-T4'te Ustalaşmak” video eğitim serisini şiddetle öneriyorum.
target_audience: Fujifilm X sistem kullanıcıları, Fujifilm X-T4 kullanıcıları veya satın almayı düşünenler

courses.title: Adobe Photoshop CC Intermediate
courses.bio: Expand your creative horizons and elevate your Photoshop Creative Cloud expertise with our intermediate course!
objectives: Customize Photoshop with personalized workspaces, keyboards, and menus.
Grasp artboard concepts and their advantages for diverse design projects.
Utilize Creative Cloud libraries for organized collaboration and asset management.
Refine and execute design variations by developing and controlling layer comps.
Explore advanced Photoshop filters like vanishing, sharpening, and blur for impact.
Create intricate AI-generated designs with ease using neural filter tools.
Master Bezier curves and anchor points for precise shape manipulation.
Construct accurate shapes and custom paths using expert pen tool techniques.
Enhance element isolation and accuracy through advanced selection methods.
Create and implement patterns and pattern overlays to elevate your designs.

Photoshop Customization Tools: WATCH ME: Essential Information for a Successful Training Experience
Arrange Multiple Documents and Match Zoom Location

requirements: A working copy of Adobe Photoshop CC
Basic knowledge of Photoshop CC is required as this is an intermediate course
courses.description:
**This course includes downloadable instructor files to work with and follow along.


Elevate your Photoshop expertise with this Adobe Photoshop CC Intermediate course, tailored to empower you with indispensable tools and techniques favored by photographers and designers of diverse backgrounds and levels. Embark on a transformative journey that unveils the potential of this dynamic software.


Throughout this course, you'll delve into a comprehensive curriculum that covers a spectrum of skills. From personalizing your workspace and fine-tuning keyboard shortcuts to mastering advanced image manipulation filters like Vanishing, Sharpening, and Blur, you'll acquire the expertise to reshape and enhance your visual creations.


Gain an in-depth understanding of Photoshop Artboards, leveraging them for intricate design variations and streamlined content exporting. Explore the advantages of Neural Filters, effortlessly crafting complex AI-generated designs. Harness the power of Creative Cloud Libraries and Adobe Stock to manage assets effectively and infuse your projects with high-quality elements.


Dive into advanced techniques such as precise shape manipulation with the Pen Tool, selecting intricate details like hair, and transforming text into dynamic shapes. With insights into Character and Paragraph Styles and the creation and application of Patterns and Graphic Styles, you can refine your designs for a consistent and polished outcome.


By the end of the course, you'll have the knowledge and confidence to enhance photos, craft stunning designs, create illustrations, and design marketing materials. Take advantage of this opportunity to advance your skills and broaden your horizons with Adobe Photoshop CC.


In this course, you will learn to:
Customize Photoshop with personalized workspaces, keyboards, and menus.
Grasp artboard concepts and their advantages for diverse design projects.
Utilize Creative Cloud libraries for organized collaboration and asset management.
Refine and execute design variations by developing and controlling layer comps.
Explore advanced Photoshop filters like vanishing, sharpening, and blur for impact.
Create intricate AI-generated designs with ease using neural filter tools.
Master Bezier curves and anchor points for precise shape manipulation.
Construct accurate shapes and custom paths using expert pen tool techniques.
Enhance element isolation and accuracy through advanced selection methods.
Create and implement patterns and pattern overlays to elevate your designs.


This course includes:
4+ hours of video tutorials
37 individual video lectures
Course files to follow along
Certificate of completion
target_audience: Adobe Photoshop CC users who want to learn more than just the basics and expand their knowledge
Those who are looking to manipulate and retouch images using the leading software package

courses.title: Adobe Lightroom 4 & 5 post-processing work flow for everyone
courses.bio: Spend more time shooting by learning to efficiently import, rate, correct, edit, and output your photos with Lightroom.
objectives: Learn how to quickly process digital images in Adobe Lightroom 4 or 5 and turn good images in to great photographs
Learn how to Import images into Lightroom in an efficient and organized manner
Learn how to output digital images in an efficient manner for delivery to family, friends, or clients

Individual Image Adjustments: Initial adjustments of the selected images
Cropping and image rotation and straightening
Course Review and Wrap Up: Review, wrap up, and next steps

requirements: Have a copy of Lightroom 4 or 5 installed on thier computer
Have a mouse or other pointing device
Have the ability to import images in to their computer
courses.description:
This course is for anyone who has Lightroom or is interested in using Lightroom as part of their post processing work flow for their digital photos. If you take a lot of photos then you know how important a organized work flow is. The quicker you can finish turning good images in to great photographs the more time you can spend on other things.
This course will cover:
Importing your photos into Lightroom
Narrowing your photos down to the ones that need to be worked on
Quickly processing the photos in Adobe Lightroom
Outputting the photos for delivery to family, friends, or clients
Time is everything and this course covers the work flow that I developed over the years. When I was doing event photography I would often shoot 6,000+ images in a day and have to process and post them within 5 days for client purchase. Due to these requirements I developed a work flow to meet the objective of being able to quickly process and post my images.I was initially using Photoshop and then moved to Lightroom. I saw an immediate improvement in the time needed to complete my image processing. As I moved from using Lightroom version 1 to now Lightroom version 5 it has evolved in to what I am presenting in this course. I now do over 90% of my image processing in Lightroom
target_audience: Anyone who has Lightroom 4 or 5 or is thinking about using it.
Anyone who is interested in how using Lightroom can speed up thier post processing and output workflow
Anyone who wants to improve their work flow and spend more time taking pictures and less time processing them.
Anyone who has problems with getting great results from their portraits of people and wants to see how to quickly turn a good image into a great photograph

courses.title: Lightroom 5 Photographer Workflow
courses.bio: Master Lightroom 5. Learn how to bring your photos into Lightroom 5, get them organized, edit them and export your work.

Editing: Syncing Settings & Adjustments Across Multiple Images

requirements: Adobe Photoshop Lightroom 5 Beta
Adobe Photoshop Lightroom 5
courses.description:
Learn the latest techniques made possible in Lightroom 5 while learning a fast workflow from import to export. In this course, I teach you my complete process which includes importing photos, organization, editing and exporting images for print.
This course is an in-depth look at my post production workflow with an additional look at basic Lightroom features and new Lightroom 5 features. Learn how to process your images in a fraction of the time it would take you to process them in Photoshop.
The first step is importing and organizing your photos. A good workflow starts with organization. The next step is editing your photos. This is where most of your time gets consumed. In this course you are taught how to manage your photos quickly. If you are like me, you want to get back to shooting or better yet, your life. Lightroom was created to enhance the post production process.
Lightroom 5 is just one more step toward freedom from the lengthly post production process. Join me as I share what I have learned since I started with Photoshop Lightroom when it reased in Beta in 2006.
target_audience: Photographers
Editors
Hobbiests
Anybody who wants to use Lightroom faster and more effectively

courses.title: 【한글자막】 Adobe Lightroom 사진 편집: Lightroom 마스터클래스
courses.bio: 이 Adobe Lightroom Classic CC 및 Lightroom CC 사진 편집 과정을 통해 사진을 어떻게 더 영향력 있고 멋지게 만드는지 모두 알려드리겠습니다.
objectives: 어느 때보다도 사진을 멋지게 만들어 보세요!
전문가처럼 Lightroom 편집 워크플로를 숙달
노출, 화이트 밸런스, 자르기 등의 기본적인 문제 해결
Lightroom에서 사진을 구성하고 쉽게 찾기
브러시와 필터로 사진의 일부분만 편집
선명 효과 및 노이즈 감소를 사용하여 사진을 더 멋지게 만들기
자체적인 Lightroom 사전 설정을 사용하고 만들어 더 빠르게 편집
인쇄하거나 온라인에 게시할 고품질 사진으로 내보내기

Lightroom 강의 소개: Adobe Lightroom CC 사진 편집 강의에 오신 것을 환영합니다!
강의 로드맵: 이 Lightroom 강의에 대한 도움말
중요: Lightroom Classic vs Lightroom CC 차이
Lightroom 속성 강의 - 25분 만에 배우기!: 속성 강의: Lightroom Classic을 20분 만에 배우기!
속성 강의: Lightroom CC 을 25분 만에 배우기!
사진 가져오기, 정리하기, 필터링하기: 신규 사용자를 위한 Lightroom Classic 빠른 둘러보기
정리를 위한 사진 등급, 플래그 및 라벨 지정
간단 팁: 메타데이터 보기, 키워드 추가 및 빠른 개발
고급 팁: 스마트 컬렉션 만들기 및 사용하기
사람별 얼굴 태그 지정 및 정리
고급 팁: 가져오기 중 컬렉션에 사진 추가하기
간단 팁: 메모리 카드에서 직접 가져오기
간단 팁: 비교 및 서베이 뷰
사진 편집하기 - 개발 모듈: 간단 팁: 편집 전과 후를 확인하는 방법
실재감: 질감, 선명도, 안개 제거, 생동감 + 채도
사진 내보내기(저장): 내보내기: 고화질 사진을 빠르게 저장하여 전 세계와 공유하기
인쇄, 웹 등을 위한 고급 내보내기
마스크: 사진의 일부만 선택적으로 편집하기: 마스크에서 더하기 + 빼기 및 하늘 선택 마스크
마스크 프리셋: 마스크 프리셋 생성 및 사용방법
마스크: 한 장의 사진에 모든 것을 담다
스팟 힐링, 클론 + 콘텐츠 인식 채우기 브러시
인물사진 편집하기: 고급 팁: 얼굴 윤곽을 위한 닷징 (Dodging) + 버닝 (Burning)
전체 사진 편집 세션: Lightroom Classic에서 A부터 Z까지: 빈티지 필름 스타일의 인물 사진 편집
Lightroom CC 클라우드 버전 - 기본 편집: Lightroom CC에서 사진 등급 지정, 플래그 지정 + 필터링하기
Lightroom CC의 얼굴 태그 + 인물 모드

requirements: Lightroom이나 사진 편집 경험이 필요하지 않습니다
강의를 따라 하려면 Lightroom Classic CC 및/또는 Lightroom CC가 필요합니다
courses.description:
Adobe Lightroom CC 마스터!
다양한 기능으로 사진을 보정하기!
과정별 프로젝트 파일 포함!


Adobe Lightroom CC 사진 편집: Lightroom 마스터클래스 강의를 선택해야 하는 이유
2개의 과정을 한 번에 - Lightroom Classic CC + 클라우드 기반 Lightroom CC!
사진을 더 낫게 만들거나 멋지게 만들고 싶으신가요?
전문 사진작가가 사용하는 세계에서 가장 강력하고 효과적인 편집 애플리케이션을 배우고 싶으신가요?


그렇다면 잘 찾아오셨습니다. 여러분을 환영합니다!
바로 지금 Adobe Lightroom Classic CC(이전에는 Lightroom CC)와 새로운 클라우드 기반 Lightroom CC 앱에서 사진 편집을 시작하세요!
이 과정을 찾으셨다면 사진 편집 경력이 많지 않거나 사진 편집 경력이 조금 있는 아마추어 사진작가이실 수 있습니다. 어느 쪽이든 이 과정은 여러분이 영향력 있는 이미지를 만드는 데 도움이 되도록 만들었습니다.


이 Lightroom CC 과정의 핵심 주제:
Adobe Lightroom Classic CC 및 Lightroom CC 애플리케이션 내비게이션
사진 가져오기 및 구성
화이트 밸런스, 자르기, 노출 수정
색조, 채도 및 휘도 조정
선명 및 노이즈 감소
비네팅, 그레인, 안개 현상 제거 필터
사전 설정 사용하기 및 만들기
렌즈 교정
잡티 제거
점진적, 방사형, 브러시 조정
인물 사진 개선
사진 내보내기 및 워터마크 추가
Lightroom CC에서 똑같이 위와 같은 작업
그 외 다양한 주제가 있습니다!
Adobe Lightroom으로 더 멋진 사진 만들기 - 노출, 화이트 밸런스, 자르기 및 회전과 같은 기본적인 사항을 해결하세요.
Adobe Lightroom으로 사진의 수준 높이기 - 부분 조정, 선명 및 노이즈 제거, 효과, 비네팅 등을 사용하세요.
전체 사진 편집 과정에서 따라 할 수 있는 10개 이상의 전체 편집 세션이 준비되어 있습니다. 이 강의는 전문 편집자가 멋진 사진을 만들 때 사용하는 기술을 배우는 데 아주 좋습니다.


이 Adobe Lightroom 과정에서 무엇을 배울 수 있나요?
쉽게 따라 할 수 있는 비디오 자습서
과정을 따라 하기 위한 다운로드할 수 있는 프로젝트 파일
주의 깊은 강사의 프리미엄 지원


이 Lightroom 과정은 누구를 위한 것인가요?
Lightroom Classic CC를 사용하거나 이전 버전의 Lightroom 또는 새로운 클라우드 기반 Lightroom CC 앱 등 어떤 것을 사용하든 이 과정에서는 프로그램을 최대한 활용하는 방법을 교육합니다. 이 과정은 초보 사진작가와 처음부터 사진을 편집하는 배우고자 하는 전문 사진작가를 위해 제작되었습니다.


다음과 같은 내용을 배우실 수 있습니다!
과정의 모든 단계를 알아가실 수 있게 도와드리겠습니다. 과정 콘텐츠나 이 주제와 관련된 질문이 있으신 경우 언제든 과정에 질문을 게시하거나 직접 메시지를 보내시면 됩니다.
강의를 들으시고 강의와 관련하여 궁금하신 점은 무엇이든 Q&A에 남기실 수 있지만, 꼭 영어로 남겨주세요. 그래야 답변을 드릴 수 있습니다. :)


30일 100% 환불 보장이 준비되어 있으니 지금 바로 시작하여 과정을 수강해 보세요.
강의에서 만나요!
-Phil
target_audience: 이전에 Adobe Lightroom CC를 사용해 본 적이 없는 사람
전 세계 최고의 사진작가가 사용하는 최고의 사진 편집 애플리케이션을 배우고자 하는 사진작가
Lightroom이나 사진 편집에 대한 기존 지식 필요 없음

courses.title: Safe Drone Flight - Procedures & Practices for New Pilots
courses.bio: All things you need to know as a new drone pilot that aren't a part of the Part 107 Exam
objectives: Safe Drone Flight Techniques
Standard Procedures that Professional Drone Pilots Use
Practice Exercises to Increase Your Skills
Pre-Flight Planning Procedures
requirements: No drone experience is needed, but all will benefit.
courses.description:
Despite what some drone manufacturer marketing materials may claim, flying a drone is a complicated thing. While drones may be able to "fly themselves" using Artificial Intelligence and collision avoidance sensors, relying on them to keep you and those around you safe is a poor strategy. Experienced drone pilots understand the many variables that flying entails. There is no substitute for experience, but we need to walk before we run (or fly). Mastering these drone skills takes time and thought, and that is where this course comes in.
I have been a licensed drone pilot since September of 2016. I have been teaching drone courses at the University level for 5 years. I have logged hundreds of flight hours, both recreationally and professionally. In short, I'm an experienced drone pilot who loves the technology and thoroughly enjoys the technical and creative nature of the game.
In this course, we walk through the basics of flying your drone with a focus on safety. As noted above, there is no substitute for experience. Yet we are all inexperienced pilots when we first begin. This doesn't mean that we are being reckless or are doomed to crash our new drones a few times. However, it does mean that we need to rely on planning, research and patience more than we normally might. This class is designed to give you a lot to think about and introduce you to concepts that you might not have otherwise considered. It's better to think about common situations prior to a flight than during a flight, even more so when things get hairy (and they will eventually).
My aim here is to teach you to hone your craft as you go down the road to becoming a professional drone pilot. Through careful planning, intentional practice and sticking to proper procedures, you will be flying high in no time!
target_audience: Beginner drone pilots looking to make their hobby a Professional endeavor

courses.description:
Award winning instructor and professional wedding photographer Michael Andrew takes us on a step-by-step tour of the Nikon D500 in this training video. Michael Andrew’s unique approach simplifies SLR digital photography and shows students how to use simple techniques to take amazing photographs. Michael blends technical competence with artistic fundamentals in this truly unique training video.
When Michael started in 2003, before the youtube age, he learned by trial and error. It took him 2 years to fully master his camera. In 2008, after many years of shooting weddings, Michael was convinced he could develop a teaching system to help new students learn their cameras over a weekend. He's been teaching new photographers ever since! Michael's unique approach focuses on simplicity, clarity, and synthesis, which has helped thousands of beginning students learn their cameras in just a few hours.
If you own a Nikon D500 and are looking to improve your photographic skills or aren’t exactly sure how everything works….this is the tutorial for you!

courses.title: Utilizza al meglio il tuo esposimetro Sekonic L-858D
courses.bio: Impara a leggere correttamente l'esposizione di una scena e a sfruttare l'enorme potenziale di questo strumento
objectives: Imparerai a utilizzare l'esposimetro Sekonic L-858D al massimo delle sue possibilità
Imparerai a personalizzare il tuo strumento di misura
Imparerai come controllare la potenza del flash direttamente dall'esposimetro L-858D
Imparerai a costruire il profilo esposimetrico della tua fotocamera e a trasferirlo dentro il tuo strumento

Introduzione: La famiglia degli esposimetri Litemaster PRO L-478D
L'esposimetro L-858D Speedmaster e i moduli radio
Che misura ci fornisce L'esposimetro?: L'esposizione corretta e il grigio medio
La misura della luce riflessa e della luce incidente
Aspetto esterno, pulsanti e funzioni bas: Ripristino dei default e blocco del touch screen
Le misure \"speciali\": Analisi della durata del lampo FDA (Flash Duration Analysys)
La misura del flash in HSS (High Speed Sync)
La gestione delle memorie di misura
Il calcolo del valore medio, la funzione AVE
Misuriamo il rapporto di contrasto di illuminazione
Il Menù Toolbox: Impostare e modificare il Mid Tone
Il Tasto Menu: Esploriamo il primo livello delle funzioni accessibili dal tasto menu
Realizzare il profilo esposimetrico e il: Realizziamo gli scatti per calcolare il profilo esposimetrico.
Creazione del profilo in modalità rapida
Creazione del profilo in modalità avanzata
Compariamo più profili e vediamo come stamparli
Modifichiamo il profilo e l'indicazione della gamma dinamica
Trasferiamo il profilo nell'esposimetro e interpretiamone il significato

requirements: E' opportuno, anche se non obbligatorio, possedere l'esposimetro L-858D
E' bene possedere una buona conoscenza dei concetti fotografici di base (correlazione tempi/diaframmi/iso)
courses.description:
In questo corso ti parlerò dei concetti base relativi all'esposizione nella fotografia e nel video. Esaminerò quindi tutte le funzionalità dello strumento di Sekonic sia nel caso del suo utilizzo in luce naturale che con il flash.
Imparerai la differenza che esiste tra misura della luce incidente e quella riflessa e capirai con quale criterio l'esposimetro ti fornisce la sua lettura.
Scoprirai come utilizzare le funzioni di memorizzazione delle letture, il calcolo del valore medio e come misurare il rapporto di contro di illuminazione.
Ci addentreremo quindi nello specifico esaminando dettagliatamente tutte le funzioni del Sekonic L-858D.
Vedremo come sia possibile personalizzare le funzioni dello strumento e ti fornirò qualche suggerimento basato sulla mia esperienza di utilizzo.
Esaminerò il funzionamento dell'esposimetro in abbinamento ai moduli radio per il controllo dei flash evidenziando le differenze di gestione a seconda del modulo utilizzato.

Sarai quindi in grado di misurare la latitudine di posa delle tue macchine e quindi fare scelte esposimetriche corrette che i permetteranno di acquisire immagini ricche di dettagli tonali e quindi perfettamente plasmabili in postproduzione.
il corso è pensato principalmente per un utilizzo fotografico ma ho comunque trattato anche gli aspetti riguardanti la lettura esposimetrica per le videocamere e il cinema professionale.

courses.description:
**This course includes downloadable instructor files to work with and follow along.


Welcome to the Adobe Photoshop CC Advanced course, where you can take your Photoshop skills to the next level!


This course will equip you with advanced tools and techniques to help ensure you can unleash the full potential of Adobe Photoshop CC. Whether you're a creative enthusiast, a budding designer, or someone seeking to enhance their digital editing skills, this course is for you.


Explore the latest Photoshop tools, from adjustment presets to the cutting-edge Parametric Filters (beta). Uncover the power of Generative AI with the Remove tool and Expand feature, making complex edits a breeze. Dive into the world of Neural Filters, where you'll discover techniques like Skin Smoothing, Smart Portrait, and Colorize, revolutionizing your photo editing capabilities.


Master advanced filters like Polar Coordinates and Pixel Bending and tools like Liquify and Puppet Warp. Learn creative tools that guide you through creating a neon effect on text and crafting vector-style illustrations.


Delve into GIFs and video editing, where you'll create dynamic animated GIFs and edit videos seamlessly. Unlock the efficiency of actions and automation, automating tasks, batch processing, and exporting PDFs effortlessly.


As you reach the course's end, you should emerge with advanced Photoshop skills, ready to tackle diverse creative projects. Join us on this Photoshop CC Advanced journey and elevate your digital artistry.


In the course, you will be able to:
Apply dynamic effects with Parametric Filters for versatile adjustments.
Use Neural Filters for tasks like Skin Smoothing and Smart Portraits.
Employ Liquify and Puppet Warp tools for precise pixel bending and distortion.
Create engaging animated GIFs for diverse digital platforms with ease.
Acquire essential video editing skills within Photoshop for seamless multimedia projects.
Streamline tasks with actions and batch actions, automating PDF exports and creating contact sheets.
Utilize creative tools like Neon Effects and Vector Style Illustrations to enhance visual projects.
Learn to restore old photos using Neural Filters and advanced techniques.


This course includes:
4+ hours of video tutorials
29 individual video lectures
Course files to follow along
Certificate of completion

Introduction: Welcome to 35mm Black and White Film Photography
The Canon F1: Canon F1: What You Will Learn
The Yashica MG-1: Yashica MG-1: What You Will Learn
The Canon AE-1: Canon AE1: What You Will Learn

requirements: Students should have a very basic understanding of using a digital camera, either a point and shoot or DSLR.

courses.description:
Do you love photography? Are you interested in expanding your knowledge and skill by diving into the world of film photography but don’t know were to start? This course may be for you.
Nothing is assumed in this class. If you’re an experienced digital photographer there are of course similarities, but there are a lot of things that feel really foreign too. After this course and some practice, they will feel like second nature to you.
My name is Jeff Stefan and I’m a professional photographer and I’ve been shooting for almost 40 years. I started learning photography with a 35mm film camera. From 35mm I moved up to 120 or medium format cameras. I shoot in digitally in my day to day work but I’ve never strayed away from film and I always still shoot with film.
So what will you learn in this class? At the end of this course you will:
- Know how to use 35mm film cameras
- Know what film to use in different shooting situations
- You will know how to measure light for proper exposure using a camera’s light metering system
- You will know how to measure light using hand held light meters
- You will know how to use filters and what their effect is on film
- You will learn how to compose shots for effective black and white images
- You will learn what developing chemicals to use and how to develop 35mm negatives
- You will know how to photograph negatives with a digital camera in preparation for processing positive images
- And finally you’ll learn the processes that I use in Lightroom and Photoshop to create my final images
target_audience: Photographers who are interested in trying out film cameras.
Photographers who want to increase their skills by mastering 35mm film photography.
Photographers who want to produce fine art black and white images from 35mm film.

Raw Entwicklung mit Affinity Photo:
In diesem Komplettkurs wirst du alles wichtige lernen um die Funktionen der Develop Persona richtig verstehen und nutzen zu können.

Dabei starten wir mit Grundlegenden Themen, wie dem Unterschied zwischen RAW & JPEG, schauen uns an wie wir überhaupt Dateien öffnen und gehen auf den Aufbau der Benutzeroberfläche ein.
Wir werden uns alle Funktionen im Detail ansehen, herausfinden welcher Einstellregler für was gut ist und anhand von vielen verschiedenen Beispielen lernen, wie wir mehr aus unseren Bildern herausholen , Farben kräftiger gestalten oder sogar die Stimmung eines Bildes komplett verändern können.

Anhand von mehreren Übungsprojekten lernen wir außerdem die ganzen Funktionen richtig einzusetzen.

Damit du alle Schritte in diesem Kurs immer richtig nachvollziehen und mitmachen kannst, stehen dir natürlich alle Bilder die hier verwendet werden, als RAW Dateien zum herunterladen zur Verfügung.

In der Develop Persona von Affinity Photo ist einiges Möglich. Lerne in diesem Kurs, noch mehr aus deinen Bildern rauszuholen.

courses.description:
________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________
Updated in 2021! New BONUS videos, PDFs, infographics and 53 NEW actions added!
________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________
ALL 142 PROFESSIONAL PHOTOSHOP ACTIONS ARE INCLUDED ($199 VALUE)!
Also you have access to 30+ RAW and JPEG images in resource files for your own practice.
You will enjoy this course on using ADOBE PHOTOSHOP ACTIONS no matter if you are one of the beginners or advanced users of Photoshop.
Course is divided into easy to follow sections which are structured to bring you step by step from essentials of using Photoshop actions to more advanced techniques.
You’re going to learn how to rocket speed your retouching workflow with Photoshop actions.
You’ll also see how to spend twice less time on retouching with “shortcut” examples.
But wait, there’s more!
I’ll also show you how to improve your photography retouching process & how to use Photoshop actions in the right way.
You will notice results in just 7 days or less.
Really, just in that short amount of time – trust me.
And in this course I’ll walk you through this strategy, step-by-step.


No matter what kind of photography you are interested in overall retouching and color correction process is almost the same every time and can be easily applied to:
Portrait photography
Wedding photography
Love-story
Newborn photography
Architecture photography
Landscape photography
Food photography
And you can continue this list…


HOW TO SPEND LESS TIME ON POST PRODUCTION AND RETOUCHING



You should automate all the steps that you use most often.
And the only possible way to achieve this is to use actions in Photoshop.
Even if you’re not producing a lot of images and took photography more like a hobby I can bet that you wish to acomplish your retouching process faster everytime you do it.



POST-PROCESSING STEPS IN PHOTOSHOP WE WILL FOLLOW IN THIS COURSE:
Crop your image to the right format
Straighten the horizon
Content-aware scale – here you can change proportions of your image
Liquify tool – better to use it in the beginning
Clean the skin and background with patch and stamp tool
Frequency separation – add this on skin + use a soft brush with the color of skin (3% opacity) to paint when needed
Dodge&burn – use it with big, middle and small strokes to achieve natural results. Brighten and darken different parts of the image to add dimension effect
Brighten eyes + add some sharpening, add extra contrast to eyebrows, brighten skin around eyes with big soft brush
Whiten teeth
Add tonal contrast by “Image-Apply Image”
Brighten overall highlights on skin
Color correction – levels, curves, color balance
Color toning – add color mood, remember about color harmonies
Light correction – local brush, vignetting, local background light
Local sharpening
Resize (if needed), save for print&web by different folders, save PSD and JPEG
Create before/after example (if needed)




HOW TO USE ACTIONS IN PHOTOSHOP
I divided all post-processing into 5 sections for better understanding.

Here are all the actions we're going to cover in this course:


BASIC ACTIONS
This section is completely for improving image after Camera Raw or Lightroom pre-processing.


Basic Correction

Temperature – changes the color temperature. You can use it when there are 2 or more different light sources in the shot. This is often seen in movies and music videos when background has “cold tint”, and the main objects are “warm”
Exposure – this actions helps to fix over- and underexposed areas locally
Vibrance – I use this to add vibrance to vivid objects such as flowers, grass, leaves. Or to reduce it
Contrast – enhance or reduce contrast in different parts
Sunlight – emphasize sun in images, where it already has place
Warm Shine – makes the skin glowing and frequently used with previous action
Fog – this action is dedicated to add some fog or smoke to your image. It is very handy to part foreground from background
Vignetting – this one adds a vignette

Basic Skin Retouching
Brighten Face – makes face brighter
Highlights & Shadows Recovery – this actions helps to recover lost details in highlights or shadows locally
Brighter highlights & Deeper Shadows (+Brush) – gives you the ability to paint on selected areas with a brush
Adding Contrast And Depth Just On Skin – this action works like magic adding more depth to skin

Final Basic correction
Color Noise – adds color noise
Film Grain – imitation of real 35mm film grain
Sharpen + Clarity – local pre-sharpening


ARTISTIC ACTIONS
This actions are not used on every single photo, but I like to add them sometimes to achieve more artistic look and feel on photo.
Anaglyph & Glitch – set of actions to achieve a look of the stereoscopic photograph in different colors, producing a stereo effect when the photograph is viewed through correspondingly colored filters
Particle dispersion – add particle dispersion to some parts of your image
Double Exposure – combines two images into one, producing “ghost images”
Cross-process – shifts different colors in RGB channels and produce a fairytale look and feel
Painting effect – creates a painty look with one click
Light leaks – this action adds light leaks on top of image
Double light – you can achieve a look similar to photographs taken with two different light sources (warm&cold)
Remove White – this action removes all the white color from image. Very handy to cut dark objects like text from white background


RETOUCH ACTIONS
These actions are used mostly for portraits, skin, and faces of people.
Quick Retouch 5-in-1 – I use this portrait action when don’t need to do a high-end retouching. So the approach is pretty simple – it have 5 main steps to follow to improve portraits
Skin color – this can help to shift color of skin. Very handy after global Raw conversion in Lightroom. Fine-tune the skin
Skin (4 actions) – actions dedicated to make skin look better
Eyes – this can brighten eyes and/or change their color
Teeth whitening – simply whitens teeth
Blusher – yes, sometimes I add a bit of blusher. It can be handy when model don’t use make-up
Frequency Separation – must have action in arsenal of every portrait photographer. One of my best photoshop actions for portraits and it will improve any portrait by making skin soft as silk and softening shadows
Dodge & Burn – number 2 in arsenal. This action is very universal for any kind photo, because you can use it to add extra dimension, soften skin, perfect vignetting and much more.


COLOR ACTIONS
Actions to create color mood on your photos, they are used to colorize and tone
Sepia & vintage photoshop actions – replicates the old polaroid look of vintage images
Pastel colors – adds soft pastel toning
Color fall – “indian summer” look – transform green vivid colors into autumn colors
Change color – helps you to replace colors on the image
Creative color toning – adds toning effects on top of your photograph


EXPORT ACTIONS


Sharpen+ (Method 1) – action for final sharpening of your image
Sharpen+ (Method 2) – advanced sharpen technique action to export and prepare the image for print
Sharpening + Resize – adds sharpness to images and then resizes them for web. You can choose different image sizes for your needs
Changing Color Space – simply converts the image to sRGB color space with one click and leave all your layers untouched (no flattering)
Batch Export – automated action to save stack of images to desired folder and file format
target_audience: Everyone who is using Adobe Photoshop (beginners to advanced)
Photographers
Designers & illustrators who want to save time on editing (mostly course is not about design)

Muchos fotógrafos hacen fotos increíbles, pero no tienen ni idea de cómo cobrar, a quién vendérselas o cómo dejar de trabajar a la deriva. Es frustrante ver fotógrafos, que son buenos y talentosos, pero no tienen los clientes que se merecen.

Este curso no se enfoca en técnicas fotográficas, sino en lo que de verdad te da dinero: estrategia, claridad comercial y un sistema de trabajo rentable.


Si estás cansado de sentirte invisible, de trabajar sin rumbo o de cobrar por debajo de lo que vales, este curso es tu punto de partida para ponerte serio con tu negocio.


Ideal para fotógrafos de retrato, bodas, producto, gastronomía o cualquier especialidad que quiera vivir de esto sin volverse loco en el intento.


Si estás pensando en construir un negocio de fotografía para poder dedicarte 100% a ser fotógrafo, este curso es para ti.
target_audience: Fotógrafos emergentes o intermedios que quieren convertir su talento en un negocio rentable.
Fotógrafos de retratos, bodas, gastronomía, producto o fotografía comercial, que no saben cómo conseguir clientes, estructurar su servicio o vender con confianza.

courses.title: Get 5 Presets free and learn implementing into lightroom
courses.bio: Lightroom presets
objectives: Have 5 presets available to download and use
20 Free lightroom settings
Learn how to implement preset into lightroom
Improve your pictures quality
major effect Moving from a beginner photographer to a professional photographer editor
Also if you are professional you will have chance to upgrade your pictures in this course

Advertisement of this course: Are you tired of taking photos not looking good?
Introduction: What you’ll learn from thi: Where can i use this presets

requirements: Must download lightroom
Absolutely suits for beginners and pro
courses.description:
Using Lightroom presets can significantly enhance your photo editing workflow and the quality of your final images. Here are several compelling reasons why you should use presets:


### 1. **Efficiency and Speed**
- **Save Time**: Applying a preset can instantly adjust a photo’s settings, saving you time compared to manually making each adjustment.
- **Batch Editing**: Presets allow you to apply the same adjustments to multiple photos at once, making batch editing much faster.


### 2. **Consistency**
- **Uniform Look**: Using presets helps maintain a consistent style across a series of photos, which is especially important for professional photographers working on projects like weddings, events, or branded content.
- **Brand Identity**: For photographers who want to establish a recognizable style or brand, presets ensure that their work has a consistent aesthetic.


### 3. **Learning and Skill Development**
- **Understanding Adjustments**: Applying different presets and analyzing their settings can help you learn how various adjustments affect an image, deepening your understanding of Lightroom’s tools.
- **Creative Inspiration**: Experimenting with presets can provide creative inspiration, showing you new ways to edit your photos that you might not have considered.


### 4. **Quality and Professionalism**
- **High-Quality Results**: Well-crafted presets can enhance the quality of your photos by applying sophisticated adjustments that improve color balance, exposure, contrast, and other critical aspects.
- **Professional Finish**: Using presets can give your photos a polished, professional look that can be difficult to achieve through manual adjustments alone, especially for beginners.


### 5. **Customization**
- **Starting Point**: Presets provide a strong starting point for editing. You can apply a preset and then fine-tune the settings to better suit each individual photo.
- **Personalization**: You can create and save your own presets tailored to your unique style, allowing you to quickly apply your signature look to any photo.


### 6. **Adaptability**
- **Versatility**: Presets can be used for a wide range of photographic styles and genres, from portraits and landscapes to street photography and product shots.
- **Adjustability**: Even after applying a preset, you have full control to adjust any of the settings, making presets a flexible tool rather than a rigid solution.


### 7. **Market and Community Resources**
- **Access to Professional Presets**: Many professional photographers and designers offer their presets for sale or free download, providing access to high-quality, tested adjustments.
- **Community Sharing**: Presets can be shared and exchanged within the photography community, allowing you to benefit from others’ expertise and creativity.


### 8. **Experimentation**
- **Exploration**: Presets encourage experimentation by allowing you to quickly try out different looks and styles without investing a lot of time.
- **Creative Freedom**: They offer the freedom to explore a variety of artistic directions and find new aesthetic preferences.


### 9. **Improved Workflow**
- **Streamlined Process**: Integrating presets into your workflow can make your editing process more streamlined and less tedious, allowing you to focus more on the creative aspects of photography.
- **Automation**: Automating repetitive adjustments through presets frees up time and mental energy for more creative decision-making.


### 10. **Client Satisfaction**
- **Quick Turnaround**: Faster editing times mean you can deliver finished photos to clients more quickly, improving client satisfaction and potentially leading to more business.
- **Consistent Quality**: Clients appreciate consistent quality in your work, which presets help ensure.


Using Lightroom presets can significantly enhance both the efficiency and quality of your photo editing process, making them an invaluable tool for photographers at any level.
target_audience: Lightroom users
Beginners and professionals
Learn how to improve your photos quality to be more professional
Be creative and use presets for all your photos

courses.title: Adobe Photoshop CC - Esencial: Colores, luces y sombras
courses.bio: Aprende a utilizar las capas de ajuste con este curso de Adobe Photoshop CC. Tus imágenes con un acabado visual perfecto
objectives: Aprenderás las ventajas del trabajo con capas de ajuste frente a los ajustes tradicionales.
Aplicarás "Niveles" ajustando la información de la imagen correctamente y sin deteriorarla.
Usarás "Curvas" logrando que la imagen tenga el aspecto deseado de forma detallada.
Modificarás la potencia del color mediante el ajuste "Intensidad".
Trabajarás con "Tono/saturación" para modificar los colores y generar monocromos.
Utilizarás "Brillo/contraste" en modificaciones sencillas de la gama tonal de una imagen.
Aprovecharás el ajuste "Sombras/iluminaciones" en imágenes con claroscuros.
Aprenderás a modificar los distintos sectores tonales de una imagen mediante el ajuste “Equilibrio de color”.
Obtendrás imágenes en blanco y negro con buen detalle y contraste.
Aprenderás a utilizar el ajuste “Corrección selectiva” modificando cada uno de los componentes de color primario de una imagen.
Modificarás las luces, sombras, y contrastes mediante el ajuste “Exposición”.
Tonalizarás imágenes mediante el ajuste “Filtro de fotografía”.
Combinarás distintos ajustes en una imagen.
requirements: Tener acceso a una versión reciente de Adobe Photoshop y principios básicos del programa.

Si no tienes conocimientos básicos del programa, te recomiendo que tomes mi curso "Adobe Photoshop CC - Esencial: Edición de imágenes digitales" antes de empezar con este. Puedes encontrarlo en mi perfil.
courses.description:
Aprende las ventajas del trabajo con capas de ajuste en Adobe Photoshop CC y aprovéchalas para dar a tus imágenes un acabado visual perfecto.
--
Comentarios destacados de los estudiantes:
"La pedagogía del profesor es genial, hace parecer fácil todos los procesos, y los explica de una forma clara, sencilla, pausada, haciéndolo paso a paso en un ejemplo práctico. Este curso no lo había hecho, pero vale la pena repetir cursos para embeberse de los diferentes temas."
Jordi Matamoros Iraola
"Excelente curso, muy bueno me ayudo bastante."
Emmanuel Tribiño
--
Aprenderás a:
Trabajar con capas de ajuste en lugar de utilizar los ajustes tradicionales.
Realizar modificaciones sencillas de la gama tonal.
Transformar imágenes con claroscuros de manera sencilla.
Modificar la información de la imagen correctamente sin deteriorarla.
Cambiar colores y generar monocromos.
Modificar independientemente los distintos sectores tonales de una imagen.
Alterar la potencia de los colores, dándoles mayor o menor fuerza.
Crear imágenes en blanco y negro con buen detalle y contraste.
Modificar cada uno de los componentes de color primario de una imagen.
Combinar diversos ajustes para obtener el resultado deseado.
Capas de ajuste de Curvas, Niveles, Exposición, Tono/saturación, Intensidad, Brillo/contraste, Filtro de fotografía, Equilibrio de color, Corrección selectiva, Blanco y negro, y el comando Sombras/iluminaciones, serán algunos de los temas que verás en el curso.
Finalizando con un trabajo práctico en el que aplicarás varios de los ajustes aprendidos sobre una imagen.
Si no tienes conocimientos básicos de Photoshop, te recomiendo que primeramente tomes mi curso "Adobe Photoshop CC - Esencial: Edición de imágenes digitales", que puedes encontrar en mi perfil, que te dará las bases necesarias para aprovechar este curso al máximo.
Este curso forma parte de una trilogía de cursos de Photoshop que te permitirán aprender desde lo más básico hasta manipulaciones complejas:
Con "Adobe Photoshop CC - Esencial: Edición de imágenes digitales" aprenderás los fundamentos para la edición y retoque digital de imágenes en Photoshop CC.
Con "Adobe Photoshop CC - Esencial: Retoques y manipulaciones" aprenderás a utilizar las herramientas de retoque, limpiar, reconstruir y mejorar tus imágenes.
Con "Adobe Photoshop CC - Esencial: Colores, luces y sombras" aprenderás a utilizar las capas de ajuste, generando imágenes con un acabado visual perfecto.
No se trata de un simple tutorial de Photoshop, ni de un rejuntado de tutoriales, sino de un curso de Photoshop estructurado como tal, e incluye las imágenes para realizar las prácticas y seguir las clases.
Por tratarse de un curso de Photoshop online, podrás acceder a él desde cualquier dispositivo (pc, Mac, tablet, celular, TV, etc.) con conexión a Internet... donde y cuando te resulte más cómodo; y no estarás solo, ya que yo estaré para ayudarte, para responder tus dudas, como una suerte de tutor online.

Was ist der Unterschied zwischen Katalogen und Sitzungen und wann nutze ich was?

Mit meinem Kurs „CAPTURE ONE IN 90 MINUTEN“
hole ich dich von Beginn an ab,
vermittel dir die wichtigsten Infos zur Bildverwaltung,
erkläre das Interface und Symbole,
gebe Tipps zur Grundbearbeitung,

Aunque este curso tiene como título “fotografía con el iPhone”, prácticamente todo lo que veremos en este curso es aplicable también para Android, la única diferencia son las opciones de configuración de la cámara, pero estas mismas configuraciones también las tiene el Android, solo que en otro lugar en las opciones de configuración.
En este curso vas a aprender exactamente cómo crear fotos increíbles. Sorprende a tus amigos y familiares con fotos espectaculares.

Cómo editarla
En general, este curso te servirá como base para mejorar sustantivamente como fotógrafo.
La fotografía es un arte, y por lo tanto es subjetiva; no hay una forma correcta o incorrecta de hacerla. Lo importante es las emociones que queremos transmitir con nuestras fotografías.
Te invito a que me acompañes en este curso para descubrir las técnicas de composición, que harán que tus fotos se vuelvan más interesantes y destaquen de las demás fotos. También veremos cómo configurar tu iPhone para sacarle el mejor provecho. Y finalmente veremos cómo usar una aplicación gratuita llamada Snapseed, para editar tus fotos de una forma muy sencilla.

Learn how to do edit images like a PRO by following this few major steps in post-production.
Adjust Lights and Contrasts - basic but a major step of every editing, you need to make sure your image has perfect lights before you will process to the next step. Luckly even though when you images are under exposed or slightly overexposed you are able to fix it in lightroom!

courses.title: Learn Adobe Lightroom
courses.bio: Learn the Basics and some intermediate editing skills in Lightroom

Lightroom Basics: Lightroom Basics: Comparing, Rating and Prioritising Images

requirements: No experience required - Start with the basics
courses.description:
As a photo editor, Adobe Lightroom includes a subset of Photoshop’s features that are custom tailored to the contemporary photographer. Lightroom covers the majority, if not all, of the image manipulation tools you’ll most likely need.
However, Lightroom is much more than a photo editor or image editing software. Lightroom helps you import, organise, manage, and find your images. In turn, Lightroom is photo management and photo editing, combined into a single tool.
Unlike Adobe Photoshop, Lightroom is a non-destructive photo editor, meaning that you don’t have to worry about that pesky “save as” button. In fact, Lightroom has no “save” button at all. All of the edits are automatically kept in your Lightroom catalog, which acts as your database of edits and history.
If you shoot raw photos (which you should), then I recommend that you first import your photos into Lightroom as the initial step of your image management process. Lightroom is a raw file editor so you don’t need Adobe Camera Raw. Also, because of the photo management capabilities of Lightroom, you’ll be organising your digital photography as you import.
Lightroom is perfect for most basic photo editing, including (but not limited to) cropping, white balance, exposure, histogram adjustments, tonal curves, black and white conversion, spot removal, red eye corrections, gradients, local adjustments, sharpening, noise reduction, lens profile corrections, vibrance, and saturation. If you’re comfortable in Adobe Camera Raw, then developing a photo in Lightroom will look very familiar. If you’re a beginning photographer, you’ll most likely be satisfied with these features. Lightroom is also much easier to use than Photoshop, which can have more of a steep learning curve.
Follow this free course and get started with Lightroom CC
target_audience: Anyone who would like to learn how to use Lightroom

courses.description:
Merhaba arkadaşlar;


Demek, internete haberleri düştüğünden beri çok ilgi gören, çok beğeni toplayan ve çok satan Fujifilm X-S10 sizin de radarınıza girdi. Öyle olmalı ki buradasınız ve bu videoyu izliyorsunuz.
Doğrusunu isterseniz, hiç de yadırgamadım. Çünkü X-S10 öylesine başarılı ve öylesine yetenekli bir makine ki dikkatleri üzerine çekmeyi başarıyor.
Evet, Fujifilm X-S10 çok iyi bir makine birçok üstün özellikleri var.
Ancak şunu unutmamanızı rica ediyorum. Dünyanın en iyi fotoğraf makinasına dahi sahip olsanız, eğer makinanızı sizin elinizin, gözünüzün bir parçası olmamışsa hiçbir işe yaramaz.
Neden mi? Açıklayalım:
Fotoğraf çekme süreci içerisinde fotoğrafçının beyni, birçok konu için aynı anda düşünmek zorundadır. Bunlar,
ışık, diyafram, enstantane, ISO, makine ayarları, lens ve açı seçimi gibi teknik konular;
Kompozisyon kurgusu ve diğer estetik kaygılar
Anlatım dili ve içerik ile kaygılar
O birkaç saniye hatta zaman zaman milisaniye içerisine bu kadar çok konu ve bir o kadar çok karar sığdırmak gerçekten hiç kolay bir şey olmasa gerek.
İşte bu konu ve kaygılar içerisinde en kolay elimine edilebilecek, değişkenliği en az şey, makine ile ilgili ayarlar bölümüdür.
Siz makinanıza hâkim iseniz, makinanızdan ne istediğinizi biliyorsanız, makinanızın size ne verebileceğini biliyorsanız ve istediklerinizi makinanızdan nasıl alacağınızı biliyorsanız artık önemli konulardan birisini halletmişsiniz demektir.
Diğer konulara, kompozisyona ve fotoğrafın içeriğine, anlatım dilinizi oluşturmaya konsantre olabilirsiniz.
Ancak, makinanızı tanımıyorsanız, fotoğraf çekme süreci sizin için makine ile boğuşma serüveni haline gelir ve bu sırada fotoğraflar uçar, gider.
Makinanıza çok ciddi bir maddi yatırım yaptınız. Şimdi de kendinize küçük bir yatırım yapın ve bu platformda yayınladığım makinanızla bütünleşmenize yardımcı olacak “Fujifilm X-S10'da Ustalaşmak Video Eğitim Serisini” izleyin. Kendinize yapacağınız bu küçük yatırımın, makinanıza yaptığınız o büyük yatırımı nasıl değerli kıldığını göreceksiniz.
Toplamda 76 ders, 6.5 saate yakın eğitimi kapsayan “Fujifilm X-S10’da Ustalaşmak Video Eğitim Serisi”nde, çok yetenekli ve üstün özelliklere sahip olan makinanızı, doğru tanımanız ve ona hakim olmanız için en ufak detaydan en karmaşık konulara kadar hemen her şeyi vermeye çalıştım.
Bu eğitimi bitirdiğinizde bir kenara bırakmayacak, takıldığınız her şeyde tekrar tekrar gelip izleyeceksiniz. Gerekiyorsa baştan sona tekrar izlemelisiniz. Ne zaman ki makinanız sizin eliniz, gözünüz oldu o zaman gönül rahatlığı ile bir kenara bırakabilirsiniz.
Ayrıca ne zaman ihtiyacınız olursa, soru, görüş, yorum ve önerilerinize açık olacağım. Bana Udemy üzerinden veya sosyal medya hesaplarımdan her zaman ulaşabileceksiniz.
Fotoğraf serüveninizde; makinanızla boğuşmadan diğer konulara konsantre olmanız için size “Fujifilm X-S10'da Ustalaşmak” video eğitim serisini şiddetle öneriyorum.

Designed for entry-level photographers, image editors and hobbyists, Photoshop Elements contains most of the features of the professional version but with simpler options and at a much lower cost. This gives you the freedom to benefit from the most essential and useful features of Photoshop without the hurdles of complex, elite features at a cost that is prohibitive to most of us.
Overview and Contents
Our course, Master Photoshop Elements 15 the Easy Way, gets you started right from the very beginning – showing you how to download the most recent version of this powerful software and get it up and running.  From there, you'll be guided every step of the way toward becoming a true Photoshop Elements power user.
Our practical tips and tricks will show you how to make quick edits, add artistic touches, or transform your photos into expressions of your vision and creativity. You’ll understand that to maximize your Photoshop Elements experience, you can organize pictures by importing them into a centralized catalog, where you can tag photos with keywords and insert them into albums for easy use in the future. This means you’re just a few steps away from creating beautiful books, cards, photographs and more that you can share with family and friends.
With easy-to-follow steps found in each video tutorial, you'll become a master of Photoshop Elements. The tutorials will teach you the core fundamentals of using this digital image editing software. By learning basic techniques in addition to more advanced skills, you'll be able to take these in-demand skills to your job, hobby, or even to start your own creative business.
As part of the course, you will receive exercise files so you can practice what you've learned and gain confidence as you go.
Get ready to make your photo memories magical!

Nauczysz się jak retuszować trądzik, blizny lub inne ekstremalne niedoskonałości skóry

Nauczysz się jak retuszować usta, oczy i make up
Nauczysz się jak retuszować paznokcie
Nauczysz się jak tworzyć i pracować z maskami
Nauczysz się jak retuszować włosy, sprawić by były miękkie i dodać im blasku

Retusz skóry: Poprawa nierówności światła z separacja częstotliwości

Retusz włosów: Oczyszczanie odstajacych włosów na tle - Technika 2

Usuwanie drobnych włosków z separacja częstotliwości II

requirements: Potrzebujesz Adobe Photoshop CC
Ten kurs sprawdza się rownież w starszych wersjach Photoshopa
courses.description:
Hej! Ja nazywam się Marcin i na codzień pracuję przy post produkcji zdjęć. Pracowałem z topowymi markami modowymi i fotografami, co daje mi przewagę nad innymi nauczycielami photoshopa! W moich kursach uczę wiedzy w oparciu o prawdziwe doświadczenie! Retuszowałem zdjęcie wielu marek modowych a moja praca była widoczna w takich magazynach jak Vogue, Numero, L'officiel, Nylon i wiele innych.
Poza retuszem, zajmuję się nauczaniem photoshopa od 2012 roku. Zaczałem od poradników na youtube, gdzie dodaję proste poradniki na temat retuszu i photoshopa.
Do tego dnia zaufało mi ponad 200 000 studentów którzy zdecydowali się na naukę z moich kursów. Teraz przychodzę do Ciebie z moim nowym kursem na temat technik retuszu, które pomogą Tobie rozwiązać każdy problem w photoshopie!
Zaprojektowałem ten kurs myśląc o każdej osobie zajmującej się fotografią którzy mają problemy przy retuszu zdjęć. Każdy z nas czasami stawiał czoła pewnemu zadaniu które zajmowało więcej czasu niż powinno, co obniżało wartość naszej pracy i powodowało napływ frustracji!
Na szczęście nigdy więcej, bo ten kurs dostarczy Tobie mnóstwo rozwiązań na najpopularniejsze retuszerskie zadania.
Z moim kursem nauczysz technik retuszu jak retusz beauty, retusz zdjęć rodzinnych, zdjęć ślubnych czy nawet edytoriali. Ten kurs skupia się na problemach z którymi musi poradzić sobie fotograf w codziennej pracy.
Jeśli chcesz się nauczyć w jaki sposób retuszować zdjęcia szybko i niedestruktywnie, ten kurs jest najlepszym wyborem na rynku. Nauczysz się tutaj jak retuszować skórę, usta, make up, rozstępy, pachy, ubrania, włosy i wiele innych!
Nauka od profesjonalisty jest kluczem by rozwinąć własne umiejętności i unikać przyszłych błędów. Ten kurs jest idealnych wyborem jeśli jesteś fotografem specjalizującym się w portretach i musisz dostarczyć wysokiej jakości pracę do swoich klientów. Po tym kursie będziesz w stanie retuszować zdjęcia innym, co pozwoli Tobie na dodatkowy zarobek przy pracy jako retuszer.
W tym kursie poruszymy takie tematy jak:
Zaczniemy od nauki podstawowych narzędzi retuszu, dlatego nie przejmuj się jeśli dopiero zaczynasz! Poznasz tutaj różnice pomiędzy danymi narzędziami, jak działają i kiedy najlepiej używać danego narzędzia.
Pokażę Tobie różne techniki retuszu dla przyśpieszenia pracy, np. separację częstotliwości. Dla tych co szukają bardziej profesjonalnej wiedzy przedstawię niedestruktywną technikę Dodge & Burn.
Nauczysz się jak retuszować nawet ekstremalne przypadki niedoskonałości na skórze takie jak trądzik, blizny czy przebarwienia. A co najlepsze, wszystko to w sposób niedestruktywny!
Nauczysz się jak odbudować teksturę skóre lub jak stworzyć ją od podstaw!
Nauczysz się różnych technik retuszu włosów, włosów na ciele czy innych drobnych detali!
Pokażę Tobie techniki retuszu dla takich zagadnień jak retusz ust, oczu, brew, make upu czy paznokci!
Nauczysz się jak retuszować rozstępy na skórze, zagięcia pod pachami lub jak retuszować ubrania!
Nauczysz się jak maskować tło by zmienić jego kolor, nawet w wypadku burzy włosów.
Co najlepsze w tym kursie, przygotowałem dla Ciebie zadania, dzięki czemu możesz ćwiczyć retusz na dostarczonych zdjęciach! A by tego było mało, dostaniesz ode mnie akcje które pozwolą przyśpieszyć Twoją pracę!
Więc jeśli nauka photoshopa od eksperta w tej dziedzinie jest czymś czego szukasz. Jesteś w dobrym miejscu by zacząć!
target_audience: Fotografowie
Portreciści

Fotografowie beauty i fotografowie mody
Każdy zainteresowany w fotografii portretowej
Retuszerzy lub osoby które chcą pracować w branży retuszu

courses.title: Sony A7RII Crash Course
courses.bio: Made for Beginners!
objectives: By the end of this course, you will understand the basic principles of photography.
By the end of this course, you will be able to comfortably use the Sony A7RII
requirements: This course is best when followed along with the A7RII, so it is best that you have this camera to try the techniques shown in the course.
You may need to know some basic photographic terms, such as "shoot," "light," and "video." If you don't, these terms are still covered in the course.
courses.description:
If you have recently purchased or plan to use the Sony A7RII as your primary camera, this is the course for you. Even if you've never used a DSLR before, or are brand new to photography, this course will work to build your understanding of both the camera and general photography from the ground up.
This is a relatively short course – about four and a half hours is all it takes to become a master with this camera. Lectures are 100% easy-to-follow videos, with plenty of clear diagrams that will construct your understanding of the camera dynamically. Topics include understanding the basics of photography and then building up to using the camera, menus, special features, video and Michael's recommendations.
target_audience: This course is designed for all competency levels – from complete beginners to industry professionals.

courses.title: PhotoFiltre le cours complet
courses.bio: Retouche et montage photo avec le logiciel PhotoFiltre
objectives: Maitriser le tableau de bord
Créer un document
Exporter un document
Transformer une image
Recadrer une image
Créer des selections
Maitriser les calques
Transformer un calque
Créer des formes
Ajouter des couleurs
Créer des dégradés
Utiliser le pinceau
Utiliser la gomme
Utiliser le tampon
Maitriser les réglages
Maitriser les filtres
Améliorer des photos
Créer des montages
Créer des documents graphiques
requirements: Vous devez télécharger Photo Filtre Studio 11
courses.description:
Le logiciel PhotoFiltre
PhotoFiltre est un logiciel de traitement d'images et de retouche photo. La version PhotoFiltre Studio 11 est la version payante de PhotoFiltre. Il est possible d'utiliser la version 7 qui est la version gratuite, mais qui est une version ancienne du logiciel. Dans cette formation, on travaille sur la version 11 du logiciel. PhotoFiltre prend en charge la plupart des formats de fichier image et propose des outils ergonomiques pour améliorer vos photographies. Le logiciel propose un système de gestion des calques et des outils de selection. Il permet aussi de créer des formes et de dessiner. Avec de nombreux réglages et filtres, il permet d'optimiser des images. Le logiciel convient très bien aux photographes et graphistes amateurs qui souhaitent apporter des améliorations à leurs créations sans passer par un logiciel avec trop de fonctionnalités. PhotoFiltre permet de convertir vos images vers d’autres formats de fichier.


Pourquoi utiliser PhotoFiltre Studio
Le logiciel dispose d’une interface graphique claire et intuitive  qui donne un accès rapide à toutes ses fonctionnalités. Une barre d’outils contient toutes les fonctions classiques pour un programme de retouche et montage photo. Le logiciel propose des outils de sélection et de dessin dans une interface accessible. Il est doté de fonctions de correction d’image pour définir la luminosité, la saturation, le contraste, la balance des couleurs et les réglages indispensables en retouche photo. Le logiciel propose de nombreux effets et filtres. La plupart des effets sont paramétrables et il est possible de les affecter avec des réglages.


La formation
Dans cette formation, vous allez apprendre le logiciel PhotoFiltre pour la retouche et le montage photo, ainsi que pour la création de documents graphiques. Démarrer avec le tableau de bord et la navigation. Vous apprendrez à maitriser les calques, à travailler avec les selections, et à utiliser les différents outils pour éditer vos photos. Vous verrez comment utiliser les réglages pour améliorer efficacement vos photos. Vous apprendrez aussi comment travailler avec les filtres. A la fin de la formations, des entrainements permettront de mettre en application les différentes fonctionnalités vues dans le cours.
target_audience: Les personnes qui veulent améliorer des photos
Les personnes qui veulent transformer des photos
Les personnes qui veulent faire des montages
Les personnes qui veulent créer des documents graphiques
