Não é necessário ter experiência com edição de imagens. Você aprenderá tudo o que precisa saber para ter um ótimo resultado nas suas fotos.
courses.description:
"Este curso é dedicado à exploração de presets /predefinições para o Lightroom, abrangendo a criação, salvamento, exportação e aplicação dessas configurações. Você terá acesso a diversas coleções temáticas, totalizando mais de 45 modelos de presets  variados, projetados para agilizar a pós-produção e otimizar o fluxo de trabalho.
Em cada aula específica sobre preset , você poderá baixar a coleção correspondente. Além disso, receberá instruções detalhadas sobre como aplicar efetivamente essas predefinições em suas fotografias, ajustando-as perfeitamente.
No mercado atual, é comum encontrar coleções de presets à venda, muitas vezes a preços elevados. No entanto, ao adquirir este curso, você não apenas obtém conhecimento abrangente sobre a criação, modificação e exportação de , mas também recebe as coleções como parte do pacote. Este curso atua como um guia prático, proporcionando uma maneira econômica e eficaz de aprimorar sua pós-produção. É uma oportunidade valiosa para simplificar seu processo criativo e melhorar a qualidade final de suas fotografias."
Explorando o Poder dos Presets: Dentro do universo da fotografia digital, os presets representam uma ferramenta poderosa. Descubra como essas predefinições pré-configuradas podem simplificar e aprimorar seu processo de edição, adicionando estilo e consistência com apenas um clique. Explore diferentes estilos de presets e como adaptá-los às suas preferências individuais.
target_audience: Fotógrafos Designers Bloggers Entusiastas do mundo da fotografia.

courses.title: Techniki Retuszu Zdjęć w Adobe Photoshop
courses.bio: Profesjonalny Retusz Beauty z okładek magazynów!
objectives: Obszerną relację z planu zdjęciowego i najważniejsze zagadnienia – sprzęt, oświetlenie, trzy omówione ujęcia
Proces selekcji fotografii i wskazówki, które ułatwią późniejszy retusz
Pracę z Bridge oraz Camera Raw
Najważniejsze techniki retuszu jak Dodge & Burn i Frequency Separation
Automatyzację pracy i niezbędne akcje które przyspieszą proces
Szereg wskazówek dotyczących cery, włosów, ust itp.
Kilka rekordowo szybkich technik korekty zdjęć
Wyostrzanie fotografii

Praca w Camera Raw: Camera Raw - maski oraz inne funkcjonalności

requirements: Umiejętność pracy w Adobe Photoshop
Podstawowa wiedza o fotografii
courses.description:
Kurs stanowi esencję wiedzy na temat profesjonalnych technik retuszu zdjęć i przeznaczony jest dla fotografów, retuszerów, grafików i wszystkich, którzy korzystają z Photoshop i chcą wzbogacić swój warsztat o zaawansowane techniki edycji fotografii. Razem z ekspertem przejdziesz przez kompletny proces retuszu zdjęcia i poznasz najciekawsze techniki pracy.

Praca na planie zdjęciowym
￼
W ramach kursu przygotowaliśmy obszerną relację z planu zdjęciowego. Jest to część przydatna dla osób, które fotografują ale także dla retuszerów, którzy mogą zrozumieć jak wygląda praca fotografa na planie i jakich wskazówek udzielić jeszcze przed wykonaniem zdjęcia aby postprodukcja przebiegła sprawnie. Artur Nyk zdradzi przy okazji szereg tajników fotografii beauty i omówi kluczowe zagadnienia takie jak sprzęt, wybór obiektywu, oświetlenie oraz szczegółowo proces powstawania każdego z ujęć.
Wybór fotografii i narzędzia
￼
W trakcie kursu będziemy realizować nasze zadania krok po kroku, tak jak to ma miejsce w trakcie procesu retuszu. Dowiesz się jak skutecznie zarządzać wykonanymi zdjęciami i na co zwracać uwagę przy wyborze zdjęcia, aby sam proces jego korekty w Photoshopie przebiegał sprawnie. Do tego celu wykorzystamy między innymi metadane zdjęć oraz sprytne skróty, w tym tryb rewizji w Adobe Bridge.
Praca w Camera Raw, preferencje i ustawienia
￼
Pokażę Ci także jak wykorzystać Camera Raw (lub Lightroom) do wstępnej korekty zdjęcia. Jest ona niezwykle ważna ponieważ najwięcej danych będziemy w stanie wydobyć z fotografii pracując na formacie RAW. Jednak zdecydowana większość naszej pracy odbędzie się już w samym Photoshopie, do którego zaimportujemy zdjęcie. Zajmiemy się także optymalnym ustawieniem preferencji każdej z aplikacji tak aby czynności wykonywać jak najszybciej.
Uniwersalny proces dla korekty fotografii
￼
Retusz beauty, który wykonamy w kursie, został celowo wybrany na potrzeby prezentacji wszystkich nowoczesnych metod korekty zdjęć. A to dlatego, iż jest to najbardziej wymagający rodzaj fotografii, które zdobią np. okładki modowych magazynów czy billboardy. Jednak kurs prowadzony jest etapami w taki sposób, abyś mógł zastosować wykonane operacje niemal do każdego innego zdjęcia, zarówno do sesji reklamowych jak i do fotografii produktowych i innych.

Czyszczenie zdjęcia i transformacje
￼
Proces korekty w Photoshop zaczniemy od usuwania niedoskonałości, koncentrując się na cerze oraz włosach. Nauczysz się wykorzystywać narzędzia czyszczenia w taki sposób aby działanie każdego z nich było odwracalne i abyś mógł w każdej chwili skorzystać z oryginalnych fragmentów cery. Będziemy unikać narzędzi, które deformują piksele, takich jak Spot Healing Brush czy Liquify i dowiesz się, w jaki sposób można je skutecznie zastąpić. Dużą uwagę poświecimy także włosom, omawiając techniki, które pozwolą je „uczesać”, nadać większą objętość i wyrównać kolory oraz, kontrast aby prezentowały się jak z reklam kosmetyków.
Światło i cień oraz Separacja Częstotliwości
￼
Jednymi z najważniejszych technik, które wykorzystamy podczas korekty to tzw. technika Dodge & Burn oraz Frequency Separation. To metody, które w zaawansowany sposób pozwolą Ci, bez istotnej ingerencji w strukturę i detale zdjęcia, takie jak skóra i jej istotne detale – znacznie poprawić jakość oraz rozłożenie światła i kolorów. Wygładzimy przejścia między cieniami oraz tranzycje kolorystyczne, co pozwoli uzyskać znacznie lepszy ogólny efekt oraz wygładzić cerę, jednak do tego celu nie będziemy używać żadnej szkodliwej dla pikseli techniki rozmywania. Skoncentrujemy się na najbardziej skutecznych technikach, których w swojej pracy używają najlepsi retuszerzy na świecie.
Praca z kolorem i tonacją zdjęcia
￼
Omówimy także szereg technik, które pozwolą po pierwsze poprawić zdjęcie pod kątem koloru, zaczynając od prostej korekty balansu bieli, przez bardziej zaawansowane metody wykorzystania warstw korekcyjnych aby selektywnie usunąć tak zwany Color Cast. Ponadto, nauczysz się także stosować odpowiednie adjusty aby wykonać konturowanie jak również zmienić finalną kolorystykę fotografii i nadać całej kompozycji odpowiedni, niezwykle ciekawy klimat.

Wyostrzanie zdjęcia i automatyzacja
Na koniec poznamy także techniki, które pozwolą efektywnie wyostrzyć zdjęcie na potrzeby rozmaitych zastosowań. Poznamy najlepsze techniki wyostrzania, dzięki którym fotografia zyska na detalach i jakości. Większość wykonywanych operacji będziemy także starali się automatyzować nagrywając odpowiednie akcje w Photoshopie, dzięki czemu każdy kolejny projekt wykonasz w rekordowym tempie.
Kalibracja monitora i preferencje tabletu

W trakcie kursu zajmiemy się także kluczowymi zagadnieniami, takimi jak profile kolorystyczne, przestrzeń bitowa a także omówimy sam proces kalibracji monitora graficznego tak, aby uzyskać optymalne rezultaty przy wyświetlaniu zdjęcia w sieci czy druku. Zajmiemy się także omówieniem kluczowych preferencji tabletu graficznego, który w przypadku retuszu okaże się niezwykle przydatny, jednak wiele jego funkcji będzie wymagało dostosowania.

Dla kogo jest ten kurs?
Kurs przeznaczony jest dla osób, które chcą dowiedzieć się jak powstają zachwycające zdjęcia, które zdobią billboardy oraz magazyny. Powstał on z myślą o fotografach, grafikach, retuszerach i wszystkich osobach, które znają podstawy Adobe Photoshop i chcą poznać najlepsze techniki retuszu zdjęć.
target_audience: Fotografowie pragnący poprawić swój warsztat pracy nad zdjęciami beauty
Osoby chcące nauczyć się profesjonalnego retuszu w Photoshop
Użytkownicy Photoshop, którzy chcą rozszerzyć swoje umiejętności pracy w programie

courses.title: What Camera Lens Filters Are & How to Use Them

objectives: Take more professional quality photos/video.
Create photos/video at a wide open aperture even in broad daylight.
Understand how to protect your camera lenses.
Understand what camera filters exist and how to use them.
requirements: You will need to own some sort of camera.
You'll also need to be enthusiastic about photography/cinematography.
courses.description:
Ever wonder what camera accessories will help you take your photos and videos to the next level? Today, the answer to your question is right in front of you.
In this course we'll be taking a closer look at the various types of attachment filters that you can place over your camera lens to open up a whole new world of photography and videography for you to experience. We'll also be discussing how to determine what size filters you'll need to buy and the different types of filter mounting options that exist.
No matter where you are on your journey through the world of photography or cinematography these tools are something you won't want to miss out on using!


Disclaimer: This course was produced independently of Canon, Altura Photo, and GoPro. As such this course has not been sponsored by, produced in affiliation with, or endorsed by Canon, Altura Photo, or GoPro.
target_audience: Anyone trying to go from beginner to pro in photography or cinematography will benefit.
Beginner, intermediate, or advanced camera users can benefit if you aren't aware of camera filters.

courses.title: Digital colour fundamentals everyone should know
courses.bio: Create eye-popping images by understanding the colour anatomy of digital photographs and how to manipulate them.
objectives: Learn how the primary colours of light and ink are different and used to define all other colours.
Learn how digital colours are defined to understand all your options when editing images
Learn how to set brightness and contrast for the most striking appearances of photos.
Learn how to use a histogram as the perfect tool to evaluate your photos under any lighting condition and on any monitor.
Learn to use colour levels as a much faster method to correct brightness and contrast optimally
Learn to how colour curves can be used as an all-in-one tool, or just for fun, to create artistic images
Learn where to find free quality stock images and photographs
Useful resources are provided.
If you or someone you know is colour blind, the histogram is a must to use for creating well colour balanced images for others.

Introduction: How to change the colour of an image without any skills
Fundamentals of colour: Laser engraving: Using contrast and the Histogram to get the best results
More about colour: Primary colours of print (paint and ink)

requirements: Basic computer skills are required.
Prior knowledge of photo editing is not required but can be useful since this course will benefit both groups.

courses.description:
If you are like me, seldomly happy to share a photo as-is, without making it look better first, and not just apply a filter or some automated colour adjustment, this is the course for you.
In this course, you will learn the fundamentals of colour that underpins digital photo editing, from how colour is formed and defined to how to measure and manipulate it effectively to save time making drastic improvements easily, using free or professional photo editing software.
These fundamentals are not linked to any particular software or toolsets. It can also be applied using popular online photo gallery services such as Google Photos or Apple iCloud Photo, or even your phone's default gallery app!
In this course, free photo editing desktop software (GIMP) will be provided for you to practise with in case you do not have access to commercial software such as Adobe Photoshop, LightRoom etc.
Where AI, filters and automated colour enhancements to photos falter, your skills can put your ideas ahead of the rest.
You will be surprised how many otherwise useless digital images can be rescued or given a second life if you understand how to read colour channel information from a histogram and identify what information is still usable in the image to repair, modify or improve it dramatically.
I will also share my favourite free stock photo and image sources on the internet and provide ample practical examples to experiment with in each lecture to ensure you get hands-on experience to cement your newly acquired knowledge.
I can never accept the default version of a photo I took or use it in a PowerPoint presentation or other digital platform as-is, without making fine adjustments first. These colour fundamentals that I studied and learnt over the years helped me to create even better-looking images than those automatic adjustments most photo apps can do for you.
target_audience: If you like to make your photos and images look much better than what automated steps or filters can do for you
Anyone editing photos and images in digital form.
Hobbyists and professional photo editors.
Anyone sharing digital images for personal or professional reasons.
When you are not satisfied with the automatic improvements of photo apps and online services
When you can see when a photo looks better but don't understand why.
When you want to modify existing photos or images for presentations or online use.

courses.description:
Have you ever wanted to get into photo editing and make mind-blowing fantasy or outrageous thought-provoking pictures you see on Instagram, but didn't know how or where to start?


If you’re anything like me, I spent my time feeling overwhelmed, confused, and frustrated with the millions of Youtube tutorials on photo editing that teach many skills, but not the ones I needed to know. These tutorials took hours and seemed exhaustingly long to follow and zapped my creativity. Besides, I didn’t know where to start, what tools were actually important, and for a long time I didn’t delve back into Photoshop because it seemed so complicated and daunting. It doesn’t have to be, in fact I can show you how easy it can be. After years of experience, and going through the clutter and noise, I’m here to teach you how you can make killer fantasy collage images easily and quickly—I’ll be taking out all the bull you don’t need to know (and adding only what is the bare minimum to produce stellar content) for you can save time doing what you love and producing your own surreal images and art, instead of feeling overwhelmed with choppy too-long tutorials.


So what are you waiting for? After this course you'll go from I-have-no-idea-how-to-Photoshop to I-can-create-whatever-want, fast.


Why learn photoshop and photo editing?
You’ll be able to make an impressive art portfolio
You’ll be able to dabble with fun image ideas/concepts and explore your creativity, forevermore
You'll be able to share your impressive and breath-taking art to the world (hello Instagram!) or your friends.
You'll be able to easily make stunning images you can sell or put on products
target_audience: Beginners in Photoshop/Photo Manipulation who want to finally produce their ideas

Having Adobe Lightroom would be very helpful for students to practice setting up their 360s.
courses.description:
During 2020 many Real Estate Photographers and other imaging specialists found a need for 360 Degree Virtual Tours.  With the ongoing global medical crisis many business professionals were looking for new ways to reach their clients and interact with them.  The need for "social distancing" left people searching for ways to still showcase locations, homes, businesses, and more.  That's where 360 images began to garner additional use cases.
At the same time imaging professionals were paying more attention to 360 photos they were also buying up many of the latest cameras.  One of the best known cameras for 360s, The Ricoh Theta Z1, became very hard to find and purchase.  For months the camera was on back order.  When inventory was finally available, many imaging professionals purchased the camera!
Documentation on the Z1 wasn't the greatest, and that's why we've launched this class here.  The basic menus, shooting modes, and more weren't fully covered in the "manual" we all received.  So in this course we'll take a closer look at the Theta Mobile App, it's menus and modes, and where to find the tools you need to successfully work with the Z1.  We'll also demonstrate some higher end features and Plugins to give students an idea of what they can do with this camera.  While it's no replacement for a DSLR with a Pano Head, the Z1 does offer great image quality in a small package.
Please Note:  This is a course about the Theta Z1, not about building full tours with 360 Cloud Hosting or desktop solutions.  The focus is on the camera, its basic modes, how to access them, and some higher end modes as well.  Students will see some 360 photo setups in a 360 cloud based viewer, but this course doesn't fully cover building your final tours.  We've included on special section on a "quick" tour build just for students to get the overall view of how tours can come together, but the focus of this course is the Theta Z1.  Additional courses will be coming soon from us on tour building (not just with the Z1) and using other cameras beyond the Z1 to create 360 tours.
target_audience: Beginner 360 photographers
Realtors looking to use the Theta Z1 for virtual home tours
Anyone interested in making 360 degree photos with the Z1
Students interested in using the Z1 for professional virtual tours.

Von den Grundlagen der Bildverwaltung bis hin zu fortgeschrittenen Arbeitstechniken der Bildbearbeitung, nehmen wir alle wichtigen Funktionen des Programms, Stück für Stück auseinander und lernen, wie wir sie effektiv einsetzen können.


Im Bearbeiten Bereich, schauen wir uns die vielen Werkzeuge an und lernen mithilfe dieser eine ganz neue Stimmung für unsere Bilder zu erzeugen. Damit das gelernte auch praktisch zum Einsatz kommt, werden wir anhand von Übungsprojekten unterschiedliche Looks erstellen.
Wir werden herausfinden, wie wir unsere Bearbeitung auf andere Bilder übertragen können und mit eigenen Presets arbeiten.
Um das volle Potenzial der Bearbeitung auszuschöpfen arbeiten wir unter anderem auch mit vielen Rohbilddateien, die dir zum mitmachen natürlich auch zum Download zur Verfügung stehen.
Neben klassischer Bildbearbeitung, bietet Luminar Neo aber noch einiges mehr und macht es uns durch die vielen KI Funktionen, sehr einfach, unsere Bilder zu korrigieren und auch völlig neu zu gestalten. Ein automatischer Himmelaustausch oder die Möglichkeit völlig neue Dinge im Bild zu generieren sind hierbei nur ein paar der Funktionen.

:Movavi Photo Editor 6 INFORMATION :
...........................................................................................................................
With Movavi Photo Editor, you can easily edit your pictures, create collages and banners, so you could share your photos on social networks. Restore family phots, change the background, and retouch portraits. The smooth new interface will help you edit pictures in a snap. With the help of Al-powered photo enhancement, editing will take no time: the program will improve your pictures automatically. In Photo Editor you will find all popular formats: JPEG, PNG, RAW.
Make your pictures brighter, increase color saturation, and sharpen details. Crop and rotate pictures for Instagram and apply any of the colorful filters. Vignettes turn your everyday pictures into retro images. Use the original effects to make a pop art poster and surprise your friends. Mirror photos vertically or horizontally, add text and make collages.
Smart Auto Enhancement
Don’t waste time editing pictures manually – try the new and improved auto enhancement. Based on neural networks, our smart algorithm will edit your pictures for you in no time. All you need to do is click the mouse. The program will analyze image colors and choose the best settings, so your photos will be saturated and the details will be super-sharp.
Remove people from one photo and place them in another. Change the background and create a brand new context for the people in the picture: seconds ago, they were on a busy street; now they’re on a tropical island. Erase crowds from background to draw attention for people in the foreground. The program can now identify human silhouettes automatically, so you can remove unwanted objects with ease.
Section Selection
Now you can remove shadows from faces, sharpen clouds, or make flowers zing with color. The program can focus on improving just one specific area you select – the rest of the picture stays the same. Try the new Selection Tools: Brush, Lasso, Magic Wand, and Rectangular Marquee.
Text and Frames
Apply new frames and turn your pictures into Polaroids or movie stills. You can change the size, width, color, and transparency of the frame. With the improved text tools, you can turn your photos into postcards and holiday cards with added greetings. The words will align automatically, but you can also twist text captions around.

courses.description:
En este curso queremos mostrarte una serie de conceptos, son muy útiles, pues te van a ayudar a realizar fotografías que transmitan.
Quien se adentra en la fotografía quiere conocer los conceptos básicos de la fotografía que son fundamentales para cualquiera que se esté iniciando en la fotografía.
Conocer estos conceptos son necesarios para poder avanzar en fotografía y buscar algo más para tener una base sólida de las principales nociones básicas de la fotografía, son fundamentales para capturar imágenes que transmitan.
En este video te incluyo la pregunta que pudieras hacer a tu buscador en internet; ¿Cuáles son los conceptos básicos de la fotografía? ¿Qué aspectos fotográficos básicos debería dominar? ¿Cuál es la mejor forma de aprender los principios básicos de la fotografía?
Explicados sin tecnicismo y de una forma amena, con imágenes de apoyo.
Está bien conocerlo, pero luego nuestro resultado tiene que ser perfecto, y hablo de conseguir una buena exposición en nuestra fotografía.
Seguro que has visto una imagen que te ha impactado de un maravilloso paisaje, con una gran nitidez, para esto se ha utilizado la distancia hiperfocal; y uno de los primeros efectos que te hará sentir como un auténtico fotógrafo es conseguir hacer una fotografía con el fondo desenfocado. Esta técnica, tan efectiva como sencilla, te resultará especialmente útil cuando quieras que tu motivo principal resalte sobre el resto de la escena. Para ello es importante que empieces a familiarizarte con la profundidad de campo. Diafragma, Iso, velocidad de exposición. Este es un concepto que hace referencia a la distancia a la que aparecerá enfocada en la fotografía. Que elementos han intervenido, conocerás como realizarla, pero incluso verás herramientas app que te ayudarán a comprenderlo.

Export images to internal and external storage in different formats.
Tether Lightroom to your Camera.

Lightroom Fundamentals: Intro to Preferences and Import Dialog
The Library Module: Quick Develop White Balance and Tint
The Develop Module: White Balance Correction with Color Picker

requirements: Students will require an internet connection and PC or MAC Computer System.
Basic Computer Skills.
courses.description:
Adobe Lightroom is a powerful, intuitive program used for enhancing, organizing, and editing your photos. Users can render enhancements on everything from smartphone photos to raw DSLR images. This course explores many of the exciting features this program offers. Take a look at just a brief summary of the course content below.

Section 1: Introduction
Students are provided with an overview of learning objectives and some of the key features that the course will explore.

Section 2: Fundamentals
Students learn to create and configure catalog settings and Lightroom preferences. We also introduce students to the Import Dialog and many of the important customization presets that can be applied to images. This includes file handling, file renaming procedures, metadata presets and other import options.

Section 3: File Formats and Color Space
This section provides an in-depth overview of file formats and color spaces relevant to photography and Lightroom. We explore the various pros and cons of compressed vs. RAW data formats. Students learn to effectively work with color profiles intended for both screen and print publishing. We provide a comparison of key color spaces including, sRGB, Adobe RGB, ProPhoto RGB, CMYK and Lab Color.

Students also learn to configure Lightroom's External application list, to export and edit images from Lightroom to third party applications.

Section 4: Basic Configuration
Students learn to customize and configure the Lightroom interface using the preferences panel, identity plates and image watermarks.

Section 5: Library Module
This section introduces students to one of the most important modules in Lightroom, the Library. Here, students will import a gallery of images into Lightroom and apply several sorting attributes to filter and organize images. Students learn to work with keywords, keyword sets, color labels, flags, and metadata. From there, students learn to create collection sets, collections, smart collections and custom filtering rules to master advanced filtering techniques.

We also explore automated watch folders, and smart previews to edit images off-location. Students are introduced to the Quick Develop panel to make basic adjustments in the Library module.

Section 6: Develop Module
Students learn to master Lightroom's Develop module to perform stunning photo enhancements using a number of professional techniques. We start by teaching development presets, creating snapshots and exploring the history panel. From there, we explore screen modes, and different views to edit and compare images while making adjustments.

We present an in-depth look into Lightroom's image histogram for making accurate image corrections using exposure and white balance adjustments. We explore many exciting tools including, crop overlay, spot removal, clone tool, red eye reduction, graduated filter, radial filter and the adjustments brush. Students will have the opportunity to use these tools in a number of exercises, designed to transform ordinary images into stunning, studio quality work.

In addition to the tools, students will also work with a number of other adjustment panels to adjust tone curves, HSL, noise reduction, lens corrections, image transformations and artistic vignettes. We also explore RAW file white balance adjustments and color calibration.

Students are introduced to metadata modifications, and writing data to XMP Sidecar files.

Section 7: Map Module
Students learn to geotag images and plot them on a Map. We explore map views, filtering and creating saved locations for custom filtering using GPS.

Section 8: Book Module
This section teaches students to create breathtaking photobooks using Lightroom's book module. We explore custom book layouts, book formatting, and applying text and background effects. Students also learn to export books as PDF documents, JPEG files or upload directly to Blurb.

Section 9: Slideshow Module
Students learn to create customized slideshows using the Slideshow module. We explore custom templates, layout options, text overlays, intro screens, embedding audio, video and a number of playback methods. We also explore methods to export the slideshow to render high-quality presentations.

Section 10: Print Module
This section explores effective techniques to print images using preset and customized print layouts. Students learn to soft-proof images to ensure color calibration between the monitor and printer. We also demonstrate working with layout styles and page options for optimal quality photographs.

Section 11: Web Module
Students learn to create and publish web photo galleries with ease, using Lightroom's Web Module. We explore custom layout options, color palettes, output settings and uploading.

Section 12: Publishing Images
This section teaches students to use a number of publish services built into Lightroom. Students learn to automatically upload and share images instantly to Facebook and Flickr. We also explore publishing images to local and external storage devices, email, and CD/DVD.

Section 13: Tethering
Students learn to setup an in-home studio by connecting their camera directly to Lightroom.

Requirements
This course is best suited for beginner to intermediate users. No prior knowledge or experience with Adobe Lightroom is required for enrollment.

All working files and a download link to a free trial version of the software is included.

The course is compatible with any version of Adobe Lightroom above 5.0 on MAC or PC.
target_audience: Students interested in mastering Adobe Lightroom
Photography enthusiasts interested in digitally enhancing images
Professional Photographers interested in learn to organize, sort, filter and enhance images

courses.description:
Featured Review:
"This course is a very thorough and informative lecture on Adobe Photoshop CC. There's a detailed section on Layers, which I think is a very important concept in Photoshop editing and a must for anyone interested in using this tool. Sandy describes the various selections in the menu bar and the different functions available in the toolbar. This is a great resource indeed. Sandy did another fantastic job with this lesson. :)"
- Pocholo Pasicolan
Are you a photographer who is looking to learn Photoshop, but doesn't know where to start (or there is too much confusing info out on the internet)?
Looking for a practical approach that doesn't confuse you with technical terms and jargon?
This beginners course is for photographers who want to understand all the important functions in Adobe Photoshop in a very practical approach. It will be like I'm taking you by the hand, explaining everything in a very visual and conversational way, so you don’t have to worry that it’s too technical or difficult to understand.
But I don't just skim the surface! This course takes you in detail through the most useful Photoshop tools and menus, all while applying them to an image so you can see their effects. This way you will be able to implement them on your own images immediately.
You will learn:
The Photoshop interface
The Tool Bar
The Menu Bar
The different layer options and their blending modes
you will get to know all important filters and adjustments so you can bring your images to their fullest potential without any problems.
I will also go through two workflows where all these tools get put into action: a wildlife photograph, and a portrait image.
I had once the same questions that you have now and we will explore all those tricky looking photoshop buttons and functions so that you don't have to worry about them, and can start getting the best potential from your images.
At the end of the tutorial you will not only understand all those photoshop techniques that are relevant for photographers but you will also love photoshop! You will be mesmerized how it can bring your images to a whole new level, how it will spark your creativity and how much fun it is!

courses.description:
Obróbka dla każdego fotografa
Nauczysz się tworzyć niesamowity klimat na swoich fotografiach za sprawą odpowiedniego ustawienia promieni światła czy też manipulacji głębią ostrości. Obróbka tego typu stosowana jest przez zawodowych fotografów, a Ty dzisiaj możesz poznać jej sekrety. Przekonaj się, że uzyskanie niezwykłego klimatu na zdjęciu wcale nie musi być takie trudne.
Wypracowanie metod manipulacji światłem na zdjęciu oraz promieniami słonecznymi sprawi, że nawet nieciekawe zdjęcie nabierze zupełnie nowych barw.


Czego się nauczysz ?


Manipulacji światłem
Zobacz jak tworzyć klimatyczne światło wykorzystując pędzle, gradienty oraz warstwy dopasowania
Uwydatniania głębi ostrości
Naucz się za pomocą filtrów tworzyć naturalną głębię ostrości
Manipulacji kolorem
Nadaj odpowiedniego koloru za pomocą pędzli
Poznaj techniki maskowania
Zobacz jak pracować z maskami warstw, maskami przycinającymi, grupami oraz warstwami dopasowania
Twórz barwne stylizacje
Zobacz jak posługiwać się kolorem, nadając zdjęciu zupełnie nowe oblicze
Skupiania uwagi na głównym obiekcie
Dzięki technikom z kursu uwydatnisz główny motyw na zdjęciu, przyciągając wzrok widza
Wypracuj sobie własny styl obróbki
Umiejętności z kursu sprawią, że będziesz samodzielnie edytować własne zdjęcia


Flary i bliki
Kurs w całości poświęcony jest światłu, a właściwie tworzeniu odpowiedniego klimatu poprzez ustawienie światła z poziomu Photoshopa. Jedną z częstszych metod rozchwytywanych w edycji zdjęć jest manipulacja światłem. Zboczysz jak na różne sposoby w Photoshopie możesz stworzyć świetlne, barwne flary, które dodadzą magii na zdjęciu. Oczywiście nie mówimy tu tylko o wbudowanych flarach w zakładce filtry ale o manipulacji kolorami w taki sposób, żeby stworzyć ciekawe efekty świetlne. Poznasz przeróżne metody na stworzenie efektów świetlnych zaczynając od pędzla, przez zastosowanie gradientów, filtrów oraz trybów mieszania.


Nowoczesna obróbka
Wiedza wyniesiona z kursu nauczy metod Cię obróbki zdjęć stosowanej przez fotografów światowej klasy. Jeśli kiedykolwiek przeszło Ci przez myśl jak uzyskano tak klimatyczne zdjęcie, to w tym kursie poznasz odpowiedź. Zobaczysz, że nawet z szarej nudnej fotografii można wycisnąć naprawdę wiele. Dzięki nauce manipulacji światłem wypracujesz sobie własny styl edycji zdjęć, który z pewnością będziesz stosować na wielu swoich fotografiach. Musisz wiedzieć, że tego typu postprodukcja zdjęć nadaje się praktycznie do każdego rodzaju fotografii, a w szczególności portretowej, dziecięcej, rodzinnej, ślubnej oraz wszędzie tam gdzie pożądane jest ciepłe, miękkie światło.


Rozświetlaj swoje fotografie kolorem
Jeśli kochasz fotografie ale do tej pory nie wypracowałeś sobie własnego stylu obróbki, to po obejrzeniu tego kursu stworzysz sobie schemat edycji. Wiedza wyniesiona z tego kursu sprawi, że Twoje ciemne i szare fotki staną się świetliste, pełne nowych barw. Umiejętna zabawa światłem, rozmyciem, winietowaniem oraz kolorem to klucz do sukcesu. Zobaczysz jak wycisnąć ze zdjęcia wszystkie soki i pokazać piękno chwili.


Workfollow fotografa
Do przerobienia kursu warto znać podstawy Photoshopa ale nie jest to wymóg konieczny. Lekcje prowadzone są w taki sposób, że nawet laik powinien poradzić sobie z obróbką. Popracujesz przede wszystkim na warstwach dopasowania, maskach warstw. Nauczysz się tworzyć naturalne winietowanie na różne sposoby. Zasymilujesz różnego rodzaju oświetlenie przez rozproszone promienie słoneczne, po efekty w stylu świetlistego bokeh. Zobaczysz jak uzyskać niesamowitą głębie ostrości, dzięki zastosowaniu rozmycia oraz przekonasz się, jak łączyć ze sobą kolory, by zdjęcie było efektowne, a zarazem naturalne.
target_audience: Dla fotografa dzieci Klimat uzyskany na zdjęciach świetnie nadaje się do zastosowanie przy sesjach dzieci oraz rodzinnych
Dla fotografa portretu Umiejętność manipulacji światłem przyda Ci się w sesjach portretowych tworzonych na zewnątrz przy naturalnym świetle
Dla fotografa ślubnego Zapewniam, że sztuczki z kursu na pewno wykorzystasz obrabiając zdjęcie z pleneru ślubnego

courses.title: 數位暗房超簡單（基礎篇）（繁體中文）
courses.bio: 學好 Lightroom，讓你的照片更動人！
objectives: 認知哪些元素會影響相片的色彩

清晰度與銳利化的影響
如何使用 Lightroom 處理相片: 如何調整曝光、對比、鮮豔與清晰度
黑白照片還需要調色嗎？

Lightroom 進階課程搶先看：用筆刷製作金屬質感

requirements: Lightroom
當作練習素材的照片
courses.description:
利用相片軟體去後製自己的照片是許多人都想要做的事，但是如果你對於拍照一點概念都沒有，也不知道派這的時候應該注意什麼該怎麼辦？更不用說一打開後製軟體，工具就讓你就眼花撩亂了嗎？別擔心，在這堂課當中陳寗會利用 Lightroom 教你如何處理照片，講師會分成兩個部分進行
第一個是部分是先跟各位解說哪些元素會影響相片的色彩，包跨：白平衡、曝光度、銳利度、對比度、彩度 ... 等等，讓各位對於照片的色彩有初步的認知，也有助於日後再拍照知道該注意什麼。
第二個部分是利用 Lightroom 實際去處理照片給告各位看，主題會環繞在上述剛剛說的幾個元素，說明不同的處理與搭配的方式，會擦出什麼樣的火花與效果，也希望各位學員可以在上完這堂課之後，開啟了自己的修照片生涯！
target_audience: 需要處理或是調整照片的學員
對於處理照片完全沒有認知的學員
想要上手 Lightroom 的學員

courses.title: Photoshop KI-Werkzeuge für kreative Workflows
courses.bio: Generative künstliche Intelligenz in Adobe Photoshop kennenlernen und in die eigene Arbeit integrieren
objectives: Arbeiten mit den KI-Werkzeugen von Adobe Photoshop
Verwendung der generativen Füllung
Generative Erweiterung verwenden
Kennenlernen aller Neural Filters
Ändern von Körperteilen, Kleidung und Dekorationen in einem Bild
Ändern des Hintergrunds/der Umgebung eines Bildes
Schnelle Restauration eines alten Fotos
Generieren eines Storyboards für Video- und Filmprojekte
Text-zu-Bild-Generation in Adobe Firefly
requirements: [optional] Neueste Version von Adobe Photoshop (25.0 +)
Internetverbindung
courses.description:
Möchtest du wissen, wie du generative KI dazu nutzen kannst deine kreativen Konzepte schneller und besser zu visualisieren?
Dann bist du hier genau richtig!
Ich zeige dir wie du die neuesten KI-Werkzeuge aus Adobe Photoshop und Firefly in deinen Workflow integrierst. Das umfasst auch die neuen Funktionen des 2024 Updates!


Künstliche Intelligenz hat in den letzten Jahren einen großen Aufschwung erlebt und wurde in viele Software implementiert, die wir täglich nutzen. Vor allem für Kreative birgt der Einsatz von KI großes Potenzial, da sie uns völlig neue Möglichkeiten bietet, schneller, besser und genauer zu arbeiten, wenn man weiß, wie man sie richtig einsetzt.
Ich zeige dir, wie du die KI-Funktion in Adobe Photoshop verstehst und anwendest, um sie in deinem eigenen Workflow zu nutzen. Dabei ist es egal, ob du gerade erst in die Bildbearbeitung einsteigst, oder ob du schon einige Jahre dabei bist.
Mit praktischen Arbeitsbeispielen möchte ich dir zeigen, wie vielfältig die Einsatzmöglichkeiten sind und dich dazu ermutigen selbst zu experimentieren.
Dieser Kurs ist für alle, die mehr über den konkreten Einsatz von generativer KI erfahren möchten, für alle die visuelle Konzepte erstellen und auch für diejenigen, die einfach nur Spaß an Photoshop haben.


Das bekommst du in diesem Kurs:

leicht verständliche Video-Tutorials und Beispiele
Premium Support für all deine Fragen
Neue Videos bei Updates von Adobe Photoshop CC
target_audience: Kreative, die mit Adobe Photoshop arbeiten
Menschen, die mehr über die Möglichkeiten der generativen KI wissen möchten
Alle, die visuelle Konzepte erstellen

courses.description:
لو انت شخص مصور وعايز تطور من مستوي شغلك فى التعديل على الصور
او لو انت شخص محتاج يزود دخلة وحاسس يتعلم برنامج يساعدة فى مجال الجرافيك او تعديل الصور
فأول برنامج لازم تتعلمةاو تحترفة هو برنامج الفوتوشوب


برنامج الفوتوشوب من اهم البرامج المطلوبة حاليا فى سوق العمل وفى جميع المجالات يعنى مش شرط خالص تكون مصور او مصمم جرافيك عشان تتعلم برنامج الفوتوشوب
وعمرك ما استخدمته قبل كدا فالكورس دا ليكPhotoshop لو أنت شخص متعرفش اي حاجة عن برنامج
حتى لو استخدمت البرنامج قبل كدة ونفسك توصل لمستوى احسن واكبر فهتلاقى كل دا فى الكورس دا


الكورس بياخدك من مستوى قليل جدا ومن الاول حتى الاحتراف ان شاء الله
هيكون فى تطبيقات كتير نظرى وعملى على الكورس وكمان هكون متواجد معاك ديما على جروب الفيس بوك عشان اتابع معاك مستواك واى حاجة واقفة معاك


ومن اهم المواضيع الى هتتعلماه فى الكورس هى :
- workspace
- Layers
- Blending Mode
- Selection Tools
- Adjustment Layer
- Camera Raw
- Beauty Retouch
- Filters & Actions
- Exporting
وحاجات تانية كتير فى خلال الكورس
الكورس كمان هيبقى updated لاى حاجة جديدة نزلت فى البرنامج بشكل دورى
فحاليا احنا بنتعلم برنامج فوتوشوب 2022 ولو فى اى اضافات جديدة نزلت فى البرنامج اول باول هيكون ليها فيديو عملى يضاف على محتوى الكورس
هكون معاكم انا احمد سعيد - مصور وصانع محتوى على اليوتيوب فى خلال الكورس
أتمنى ان كل الناس تستفاد واوشفكم فى اول درس
------------------------------------------

This course will help you to understand how to use Lightroom for all of your image editing needs. I cover everything from organizing your images to printing to slideshows. Every module is covered. This course is also frequently updated with the latest information and techniques. The course covers Lightroom versions 4, 5, and 6 / CC.
This course is almost 100% video lessons with some supporting notes and references. The course has about 46 lessons and I'm constantly adding new lessons. You will have access to me through Udemy's discussion tab for answering all of your questions and checking out your progress with your image editing.
You should take this course if you are new to using Lightroom or if you are experienced and just need to learn more details about how the program works. This course does start at the beginning, but it does go to an advanced level.
Last updated 6/29/2018

I have never given this course away for free so my student numbers are not deceptively inflated as you may see on other Udemy courses.
target_audience: Anyone that would like to learn how to improve their photos with a professional program like Lightroom.

courses.description:
Möchtest du deine Bilder in Zukunft auf Profiniveau verarbeiten? Dann bist du bei mir richtig!
Aber nicht mehr in diesem Kurs!
Bitte schaue bei meinen anderen Kursen nach. Dort gibt es den Kurs  Adobe Lightroom: Alles komplett von A bis Z inkl. Plugins
Das ist der Kurs, der weiterhin mit Updates versehen wird und dir deutlich mehr Freude bereiten wird!


Ich danke dir für dein Verständnis!


(Das letzte Kursupdate in diesem Kurs fand im November 2017 statt. Der Kurs behandelt "Lightroom Classic CC" - ehemals "Lightroom CC"). Dieser Kurs ist also bereits veraltet. Du bist nicht mehr aktuell, wenn du diesen Kurs kaufst.
Bitte kaufe den Adobe Lightroom: Alles komplett von A bis Z inkl. Plugins Kurs. Damit hast du mehr Freude!


Ich schreibe das hier, weil immer mal wieder Einschreibungen kommen, und ich gerne ehrlich mit meinen Kunden umgehe. Daher hoffe ich, dass du meine Transparenz auch zu schätzen weißt. Dieser Kurs wird in wenigen Monaten aus dem Marktplatz von Udemy verschwinden. Das gesamte Wissen befindet sich nun bereits in dem "Adobe Lightroom: Alles komplett von A bis Z inkl. Plugins" Kurs. Dadurch verpasst du nichts und kannst trotzdem den Umgang mit Adobe Lightroom erlernen und beherrschen.

Liebe Grüße und Danke!
target_audience: Diese Masterclass richtet sich an alle, die gerne mehr aus ihren Bildern holen möchten. Ob Anfänger, Fortgeschrittener oder Profi - Lightroom hilft dir in vielen Bereichen schnell und einfach weiter.
Dieser Kurs richtet sich an hart arbeitende, motivierte Schüler!

courses.title: Adobe Photoshop - De débutant à avancé en moins de 2h
courses.bio: Apprendre simplement
objectives: Organisation de Photoshop.
Utiliser les principaux outils
Travailler proprement dans Photoshop
Détourer un un élément
Supprimer un élément
Retoucher un visage
Modifier les couleurs / l’exposition etc…

Les calques: 5.5 - Liste des astuces avec les calques
Les masques: 6.1 - Utiliser les masques sur un calque de réglage
6.2 - Utiliser les masques sur un calque d'image

requirements: Aucun prérequis nécessaire
courses.description:
INTRO
Photoshop est un outil qui peut paraitre ultra complexe lorsqu’on débute où que nous avons utilisé le logiciel pendant seulement quelques heures. Vous voyez énormément de fonctionnalités et pouvez ne pas savoir par où commencer.


L’objectif de cette formation est de vous fournir les clés en main pour comprendre rapidement Photoshop. Nous allons donc aller à l’essentiel.
Vous souhaitez savoir comment :
Comment est organisé Photoshop.
Comment détourer un objet / une personne
Comment supprimer un élément
Comment retoucher un visage
Comment modifier les couleurs / l’exposition etc…
Comment travailler proprement et de façon organisée dans Photoshop
Ce cours répond à toutes ces questions de façon condensée et concrète.
_______________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________
PLAN
Une partie théorique :
Les 6 outils qui vous permettant d’effectuer 80% du travail.
Les calques et des masques qui sont l’une des principales forces de Photoshop
Une partie pratique :
Embellir un visage (Frequency Separation)
Supprimer un élément (Content Aware Fill)
Ajouter des flares  (Options de fusion)
Enlever un trademark (Outils de sélection)
Que tu sois débutant ou que tu connaisses déjà les bases de Photoshop, ce cours t'amènera à un niveau suffisant pour comprendre la plupart des mécaniques de cet outil et apprendre par toi même les nouveaux dans le futur.
target_audience: Intérêt pour la photographie
Intérêt pour la retouche photo
Débutant Photoshop
Débutant Photographie

courses.bio: Starte sofort mit der Erstellung deiner Videos in Camtasia! Lerne in 60 Minuten die wichtigsten Funktionen kennen.
objectives: Erstelle in 60 Minuten Dein eigenes Video mit Camtasia 2025
Was ist Camtasia und was ist neu in Camtasia 2025?
Erstelle ein Drehbuch
Bereite deinen Computer für die Aufnahme der Screencasts vor
Nehme den Bildschirm, die Vertonung und optional deine Webcam auf
Bearbeite dein Video effektiv
Produziere dein Video in optimaler Qualität
Nutze die Vorlagen und Checklisten aus diesem Kurs für deine Projekte

Planung: Tipps für die Erstellung des Drehbuchs
Aufnahme: Aufgabe: Nehme den Bildschirm und die Vertonung auf
Produktion: Aufgabe: Produziere dein Video in optimaler Qualität
Bonus: Audio optimieren mit Adobe Podcast Enhance

requirements: Du brauchst mindestens eine Testversion von Camtasia
Für den Export des Videos benötigst Du die Vollversion - sonst erscheint ein Wasserzeichen im Video
Alternativ kannst du Camtasia am Mac nutzen - die aktuellen Versionen für Windows und Mac sind sehr ähnlich
courses.description:
"Der Kurs gibt eine sehr gute, und schnelle Einführung in die grundlegenden Funktionen von Camtasia."  ★★★★★
"Finde ich richtig gut, den Kurs, das 60-Minuten-kompakt-Format ist super."  ★★★★★
"Der Kurs ist kompakt, sehr gut strukturiert und beinhaltet wertvolle Tipps."  ★★★★★


= Camtasia 2025 in 60 Minuten =
Lerne in 60 Minuten die wichtigsten Funktionen von Camtasia kennen!
Starte sofort mit der Erstellung deiner Videos - dafür musst du dir keinen 8 Stunden Kurs anschauen.
In diesem Kurs bekommst du die Chance, einem professionellen Screencaster und Camtasia Trainer (Techsmith "Empfohlener Trainer") bei der Erstellung eines Screencasts in 60 Minuten über die Schulter zu schauen und alles 1 zu 1 in Camtasia nachzuvollziehen.
Dabei geht es nicht um die Verwendung jeder einzelnen Funktion von Camtasia, sondern um die effiziente und zügige Erstellung eindrucksvoller Screencasts. Einige Funktionen und Einstellungen von Camtasia wirst du vermutlich nie brauchen. Deshalb konzentrieren wir uns in diesem Kurs darauf, dass du schnell loslegen und beeindruckende Videos erstellen kannst.
Der Aufbau orientiert sich daran, wie der Autor seit 2007 mehr als 2000 Screencasts mit Camtasia erstellt hat.
Zu Beginn machen wir uns während der Konzeption Gedanken darüber, was wir im Screencast welchem Publikum zeigen möchten und entwickeln ein Drehbuch für unser Video.
Während der Vorbereitung wird die Aufnahmeumgebung eingerichtet. Dazu gehört die Konfiguration unseres Systems, die Organisation von Dateien und die Wahl eines guten Aufnahmeortes ohne Störung.
Die Aufnahme startet mit der Aufnahme des Bildschirms. Anschließend nehmen wir die Vertonung auf.
Die Bearbeitung beginnt mit dem groben Videoschnitt und dem Entfernen kleiner Fehler und Pausen. Danach synchronisieren wir die Vertonung mit unserem Video. Abschließend geben wir unserem Video mit Übergängen, Animationen, Grafiken und vielen weiteren Effekten einen professionellen Touch. Das fertige Video exportieren wir in der Produktion.
Ist der Kurs auch für vorherige Camtasia Versionen?
Dieser Videokurs zu Camtasia kann für Camtasia Versionen ab Camtasia 9 bis zur aktuellen Version Camtasia 2025 genutzt werden, da die meisten Funktionen identisch sind.
target_audience: Camtasia Einsteiger, die schnell loslegen möchten
Anwender von vorherigen Camtasia Versionen, die auf Camtasia 2025 umsteigen möchten.
Dozenten, die Screencasts in ihren Schulungen verwenden möchten
Support Mitarbeiter, die Screencasts zu häufigen Fragen erstellen möchten
udemy Dozenten, die Screencasts in ihren Kursen erstellen möchten

courses.title: Adobe Lightroom CC Photo Editing Class Beginner to Pro
courses.bio: The whole course lasts for about 6 hours, I can promise very exciting journey to the world of photography.
objectives: You'll learn the best practices for white balance, temperature, and color correction that will make your images look amazing.
You'll discover how to use the power of masking to enhance your photos and take them to the next level.
We'll cover all types of photography genres including Portrait, Landscape, Architectural, Travel, Product and Instagram.
You'll learn how to color grade like a professional, starting with simple grades and moving on to distinctive powerful color grades
You'll learn how to retouch images, making skin smoother, eyes & teeth whiter, and making hair, eyes, and lips standout in portraits.
You'll learn how to remove unwanted elements from an image.
You'll learn where to find and how to use the best Presets, LUTS & Profiles to work faster and apply your edits in bulk to a huge group of images all at once.
You'll learn Lightroom's amazing organizational abilities, including quickly sorting, comparing, searching, grading, and backing up images.
You'll learn the best settings for printing your images and sharing on social media without losing details.

The first introduction to Lightroom: How to buy or install a trial version of Lightroom
How to switch the language and set up Lightroom
Library module: Workspace overview, organization, ratings and markers
Sorting and selecting photos, creating collections
Processing module: An overview of all panels and tabs
Tools of the "basic" tab and basic processing
Personalize Lightroom and set up a watermark
Modules Map, Book, Print and Web
Develop module: A crop tool and an example of editing a complex photo
A tone curve. Brightness, contrast, color channels. Editing options
HSL/Color, selective and general work with color and tinting
Masks: Subject and sky selection. How masks with artificial intelligence work
Selections and working with a brush. Add masks and brush settings for retouching
Linear gradient, selecting, adding and subtracting masks
Radial gradient. Examples of selecting and combining masks
Color range masks. Deep dive. Creation, refinement, addition
Luminosity masks. Selection of complex areas
Photo editing techniques: Editing photos with jewellery. Photos for Instagram
Editing photos from a smartphone in Lightroom
The "Enhance" function – increase the size of a photo and improve the quality
Assembling the panorama and subsequent editing for printing
Editing of a white object on a white background
Black on black. Features and subtleties of editing complex frames
Extra: Styles and presets. How to speed up the editing process
Learning how to retouch like in the movies

requirements: It is recommended that you have access to a recent version of Adobe Lightroom, such as Lightroom CC (Creative Cloud).
Windows or Mac OS computer
courses.description:
Hi! My name is Peter Romanov and I am thrilled to introduce you to AIM School's newest course: "Adobe Lightroom 2024 Photo Editing Class Beginner to Pro".


As an experienced Instructor and creative professional with over 10 years of experience in photo retouching, I am excited to share my knowledge with you.


In this course, you will learn how to turn your photographs into dynamic, beautiful images using Adobe Lightroom CC. Through step-by-step instruction, you will learn the best practices for:
• White balance and temperature control
• Color correction and grading
• Masking techniques for selective editing


We will explore various types of photography, including portrait, landscape, wildlife, architectural, travel and product photography. You will learn how to color grade your images like a pro, making them pop and stand out.


In addition to photo editing techniques, you will learn how to:
• Smooth skin texture and highlight facial features in portrait photography
• Remove unwanted elements from your images
• Color grade your videos
• Reduce noise and graininess from your photos


Throughout the course, we will be working with Adobe Lightroom CC desktop. You will also learn about presets, which can help speed up your workflow and enhance your images.


This course is perfect for beginners who are new to image editing and photography in general and intermediate specialists. Whether you're using a basic mobile phone or a state-of-the-art digital SLR camera, Lightroom CC is a powerful tool that can help you transform your images.


Join me in transforming your photos with Adobe Lightroom CC. I can't wait to see what you'll create!


I'll see you in class!
target_audience: This course is perfect for beginners who have never used Lightroom or have only limited experience with the software.
It is also suitable for intermediate/casual Lightroom users who are looking to enhance their skills and knowledge of proper usage of the software.

Gimpは無料で使える画像編集ソフトなのにPhotoshopにも劣らないほど機能が充実しています。

courses.description:
Descubra todo o potencial da edição de imagem diretamente do seu dispositivo móvel com o nosso curso especializado de Edição de Imagem e Criação de Presets no Lightroom Mobile! Este curso abrangente oferece uma jornada emocionante para explorar as capacidades avançadas de edição disponíveis no aplicativo Lightroom Mobile da Adobe.
Durante o curso, você mergulhará em técnicas avançadas de edição, começando com os fundamentos básicos e progredindo para efeitos profissionais. Aprenda a ajustar exposição, contraste, cor, saturação e muito mais para dar vida às suas imagens com apenas alguns toques na tela do seu smartphone ou tablet.
Além disso, você descobrirá o poder dos presets personalizados. Dominar a criação de presets permitirá que você desenvolva um estilo único e coeso em suas imagens, ao mesmo tempo em que agiliza seu fluxo de trabalho. Essa habilidade é inestimável para entusiastas da fotografia e profissionais que desejam criar um impacto visual poderoso em suas imagens, com apenas alguns ajustes predefinidos.
Este curso prático e acessível é projetado para tornar a edição de imagem no Lightroom Mobile uma experiência agradável e eficiente para todos os níveis de habilidade. Prepare-se para transformar suas fotos com facilidade e estilo, tudo na palma da sua mão!

¿Siempre has querido aprender a editar fotos? ¿Quieres crear portadas para tus redes sociales? Mejor aún, crear fotomontajes.
Este curso va dirigido para principiantes quienes consideran a Photoshop un programa muy complicado o bien demasiado caro para costearlo, me atrevo a decir semejante cosa siendo yo, alguien que ha trabajado con este programa por algunos años.
Pero calma, que te tengo ¡muy buenas noticias! ha llegado una alternativa real a Photoshop que es más intuitiva, la cual es: Affinity Photo.
En este curso vas aprender de forma divertida y entretenida todo lo que necesitas saber para aprender a usar este programa, vamos, te convertiré en un experto en el manejo y uso de este gran programa que pocos conocen, vas a desarrollar un amplio criterio al momento de trabajar en tus proyectos permitiéndote tomar mejores decisiones.
Finalmente, como parte de nuestra filosofía de trabajo, trabajaremos bajo el principio de la edición no destructiva, lo que significa que estaremos trabajando sin echar a perder las cosas con las que vayamos trabajando a lo largo del curso.
Como extra, tendrás acceso al servidor de Discord exclusivo para mis estudiantes donde estaremos compartiendo nuestros proyectos, dudas extra, material extra entre otras cosas más.

courses.description:
Hem dış çekim hemde stüdyo fotoğrafçılığında yeni bir dönem başlıyor diyebiliriz ,özellikle son zamanlarda geri planda kalan stüdyo fotoğrafçılığının yapay zeka desteği ile tekrar canlanmaya başladığını görüyorüyoruz.Hem doğal bir görünüm-uyum,hemde masraftan koruyan uygun-uyumlu tasarımlar ile fotoğrafı görsel açıdan daha zengin ve ilham verici katkıları var.Bu eğitim setinde özellikle fotoğraf tonlama ve tonlama sonrası düzeltmeleri olabildiğince işleyeceğiz.
Photoshop ile restoreden renklendirmeye,Lightroom gibi diğer uygulamalar dahil ederek yapay zekanın sektörel ihtiyaçlarımıza yönelik yanlarını pratikte tekrar ederek öğreneceğiz.
Yapay zeka ile arka plan fonlama da yeni bir soluk gelecek; Biliyorsunuz özellikle stüdyo fotoğrafları fonlama yaparken kişinin ortamla bütünleşmesi ton, ışık ve açı olarak kolay değildir. Bunları sağlamak için detaylı bir çalışma ve uzun vakitler harcamamız gerekebiliyordu. Artık hayatımıza giren yapay zeka ile, işimiz daha kolay ve daha kaliteli olacak.
Hepimizin karşısın   sosyal paylaşım platformlarında yapay zeka ile ilgili çokça video çıkıyordur. Fakat “biz ne istersek o yapıyor” demek doğru değil. Yanlışlar var, eksikler ve uyumsuzluklar da var. Bunları beraber düzeltip öğrenerek ilerleyeceğiz.
Yapay zeka yenilenip gelişmeye devam ederken, mesleğimize etkileri, pratik ve üretici faydaları da bu eğitim setinde güncel olarak yenilenecektir. Bir fotoğrafçı olarak öğretmenin öğrenmeye teşviki ile hep beraber faydalanacağız. Ayırdığınız vakit ve emek için şimdiden teşekkür ediyorum.
target_audience: Fotoğrafçılar ve fotoğrafçı adaylarına yönelik bir eğitim setidir

courses.title: Single Light Photography with the Westcott Apollo 28"
courses.bio: A complete guide to using one of the most popular tools in the photography market
objectives: Understand speedlights and control their exposure;
Apply off-camera flash lighting principles with confidence;
Get the best use out of the speedlight's inherent limitations;
Use the Apollo 28" effectively in a host of different situations, either as the only light source in an image, or together with natural light to create more complex lighting scenarios;
Apply basic post-processing techniques to further enhance their images.

2. Tech Stuff: 2.3 Working with Flash and Ambient light

requirements: To take advantage of this course, students will need a camera that allows the use of external, off-camera lights (DSLR or mirrorless with hot-shoe or internal wireless trigger system), as well as a speedlight / strobe and respective triggering system.
Students will also need to have working knowledge of their camera, including how to set your exposure modes, shutter speed, aperture and ISO.
This course was designed around the Westcott Apollo 28" and accessories, but the principles still apply to any similar sized softbox.
Photo editing and processing software, such as Adobe Lightroom and / or Photoshop, will also allow the students to take more advantage of the post-processing chapters in the course.
target_audience: This course is ideal for photographers who are starting out on their off-camera lighting journey and are looking for a complete tutorial that takes them from pressing the "on" button on the speedlight to creating amazing images with an extremely simple but versatile tool.
This course is probably not for the advanced photographer who already knows all the principles related to off-camera lighting and how to use modifiers.

CorelDRAW X7 Kurs Açıklaması
CorelDRAW X7 kursu, grafik tasarım dünyasına adım atmak veya mevcut becerilerini geliştirmek isteyen herkes için kapsamlı bir eğitim sunar. Bu kurs sayesinde, vektörel tasarımın temel ilkelerinden başlayarak, profesyonel seviyede grafikler oluşturmayı öğrenebilirsiniz.
Eğitimde, CorelDRAW X7’nin arayüzü, temel araçları, katman kullanımı, şekil oluşturma ve düzenleme, logo tasarımı, tipografi, renk yönetimi ve efekt uygulamaları gibi konular detaylı şekilde ele alınır. Ayrıca afiş, broşür ve kurumsal kimlik tasarımı gibi uygulamalı çalışmalar ile öğrendiklerinizi pekiştirme fırsatı bulacaksınız. Gelişmiş teknikler, özel fırçalar, gölgelendirme, transparan efektler ve çıktı alma yöntemleri de ders içeriğinde yer almaktadır.
CorelDRAW X7’nin güçlü özellikleri sayesinde, matbaa ve dijital ortamlar için yüksek kaliteli tasarımlar yapabilirsiniz. Grafik tasarım sektöründe kendinizi geliştirmek, serbest çalışma imkanları yaratmak veya profesyonel bir kariyer hedefliyorsanız, bu kurs sizin için ideal bir başlangıç olacaktır. Kurs sonunda, yaratıcı projelerle portföyünüzü güçlendirebilir, özgün tasarımlarınızı hayata geçirebilirsiniz.
Hayal gücünüzü CorelDRAW X7 ile gerçeğe dönüştürmeye hazır olun!


Corel Draw X7 programını kullanmanızda etkili olacak olan eğitim setimiz tam 18 adet Full HD videodan oluşmaktadır. Sırası ile videoları izleyerek anlatımları uygulayarak sizde bu devasa grafik çizim programını öğrenebilirsiniz.
Corel Draw X7 eğitim videoları ayrıca Türkçe dil içeriyor. Böylece eğitim setini daha kolay anlarsınız. Videolarda çeşitli örnekler yapılıyor, bu örnekleri inceleyerek ve aynılarını yaparak sizde programa tamamen hakim olabileceksiniz.

courses.title: Adobe Lightroom Classic: Zero to Sixty
courses.bio: Master Lightroom Classic for image editing and management.
objectives: Learn how to manage images in a catalog.
Organize images within a catalog so they are easy to find.
Edit images to create the end result you want.
Export variants that match the quality your application needs.
requirements: You don't need any experience using Lightroom Classic to take this course. But you should have access to the most recent version of Lightroom Classic (which is different from Lightroom) before registering.
courses.description:
In this complete class, we will examine the Adobe Lightroom Classic software from beginning to end. Even if you haven't used Lightroom Classic before, we will get you up to speed. And if you've used the software for some time, we will help you maximize your effectiveness and efficiency. Please note that there are two softwares: Lightroom and Lightroom Classic. In this course we use the most recent (as of 2025) version of Lightroom Classic, not Adobe Lightroom.


We begin with image organization, because this is where most people have significant issues. We will build a catalog and understand how they operate. Then we will use Lightroom  to manage the actual data on your machine. Of course, once we use Lightroom Classic to manage your image, we will need to organize  images within the software.  This is the collection, smart collection, and collection set structure, which we will tackle next.


The next portion of the class is all about image editing. We will explore exposure, contrast, color control, white balance, noise reduction, detail sharpening and more in our editing section. This culminates with a full course on masking and layering. We will end our editing section by editing three images for demonstration.


Lastly, we will need to export variants to your specifications on demand and easily. I hope you join us for a fun time exploring one of the most powerful editors and organizers in the photographic world.
target_audience: This course is for any hobby or enthusiast photographer who wants to use Adobe Lightroom Classic as his or her primary image editor.

courses.title: Adobe Bridge CC and Adobe Camera Raw for Beginners
courses.bio: Organize and Enhance Your Images with Adobe Photoshop's Free Inbuilt Catalog System and Powerful Editing Tool (ACR)
objectives: Efficiently catalog and rate your images
Tag your images with keywords
Protect your images by appending copyright protection in your metadata
Enhance your images to their fullest potential with ACR
Use basic developments in Exposure, White Balance and Sharpening
requirements: You should have access to the Adobe Photoshop CC subscription
courses.description:
Featured Review:
"I've been interested for a while in learning about Adobe Camera Raw (having heard about it, but not really seen much useful information about it) - so this is very enlightening. It's definitely interesting how Lightroom is really not that necessary!" - Steven Ricker
Welcome to our course Adobe Bridge CC and Adobe Camera Raw For Beginners!
Most photographers think they have to use Lightroom to organize and enhance their images and didn’t even hear about the fantastic inbuilt catalog system called Bridge, and the even better image developing program called Adobe Camera Raw - or ACR for short. Which is a shame because not only are both programs very easy to use, but they are absolutely FREE and BUILT into Photoshop!

So understanding how to use Adobe Bridge efficiently and enhancing your images with Adobe Camera Raw are vital for developing a great workflow within Photoshop and I will show you how easy it is!
This course is for photographers who would love to enhance their images whilst also organizing them, so that they are easily accessible. No matter if you are shooting landscapes, cities, wildlife or portraiture - with this tutorial you can develop your photographs to their highest potential.  And with the images that you can find in your course materials you can even work side by side with me.
So what will you learn in this course?
In this course you will learn:
How to access Adobe Bridge
How to organize your images
How to download your images into Bridge
How to access ACR and how to create presets to guarantee fantastic results every single time
How to sync your settings to save time in your editing workflow
How to combine single images into a Panorama
And so much more!
I will show you step-by-step the most important functionalities in Adobe Bridge and ACR.
At the end of the course you will know:
How to efficiently catalog and rate your images,
How to tag your images with keywords
How to protect your images by appending copyright protection in your metadata
How to enhance your images to their fullest potential with ACR
How to use basic developments in Exposure, White Balance and Sharpening and more defined adjustments like the radial filter and my favorite tool - the adjustment brush.
And why smart collections are awesome!
And even better - you will be absolutely astounded how easily you can use all those techniques and how much fun they are! Watch your pictures come to life without even opening Photoshop!

So if you are interested in seeing me in action, go ahead and watch some previews! Or if you want to develop your images to their highest standard: Enroll now and let’s get started with creating your best pictures ever!
See you soon!
target_audience: Beginner to intermediate photographers who want to organize and enhance their images

courses.title: DIY Photography Mastery: Build, Innovate, and Capture
courses.bio: Transform everyday items into powerful photography tools. Innovative, budget-friendly solutions for photographers.

DIY Shots: Making a flash diffuser out of a plastic cup
Create a low-cost constant lighting setup
Build a double flash head holder
Building a ground-level light and camera stand
Add supports to a handheld tripod
Constructing a massive but inexpensive soft box

requirements: Photoshop to follow along
courses.description:
In the world of photography, even the most basic accessories can come with a hefty price tag, often costing as much as a few days’ salary. But what if you didn’t have to spend big to capture professional-looking shots? The solution is simple: don’t buy it—build it!
That’s the philosophy behind The Do-It-Yourself Photographer. This course is designed for creative minds who want to take their photography to the next level without breaking the bank. You’ll discover how to transform everyday household items—like plastic cups, parchment paper, cardboard, or simple clamps—into powerful tools that can elevate your photos. From enhancing your lighting setups to stabilizing your camera, these DIY hacks will give you more control, flexibility, and confidence behind the lens.
You don’t need to be a craft expert or own a fully stocked workshop to succeed in this course. With a roll of gaffer’s tape and a little imagination, you’ll learn how to solve common photography challenges using inexpensive, accessible materials. Along the way, you’ll also gain a deeper understanding of how professional gear works—because once you can build it, you can use it more effectively.
So, roll up your sleeves and embrace your inner inventor. Whether you’re a beginner photographer or a seasoned shooter looking for budget-friendly tricks, this course will empower you to become a true DIY photographer.
target_audience: Illustrators and Designers
Photographers
Photoshop users
Graphic Designers and Digital Artists

Willst du deine Fotos auf das nächste Level bringen?


In unserem Lightroom Komplettkurs zeige ich dir, wie du deine Bilder wie ein Profi importierst, bearbeitest, verwaltest und wieder exportierst – mit Adobe Lightroom Classic und Lightroom CC.
Mein Name ist Michael Klein und ich bin seit 2012 Fotograf. Ich begleite Hochzeiten, fotografieren Babys und führe regelmäßig Fotokurse durch und bringe meinen Teilnehmern das Fotografieren und die Bildbearbeitung näher. In vielen Jahren der Fotografie habe ich viele Menschen dabei unterstützt mehr aus der Kamera und aus den Bildern zu holen.  Nach meinem Kurs kannst du dir nicht mehr vorstellen ohne Lightroom deine Bilder zu bearbeiten. requirements: Ideally Photoshop CC, trial free version is more than enough

courses.description:
Photoshop opens the door to endless creative possibilities by empowering you to easily make multiple, selective adjustments using layers. Luminosity masks provide you with a greater level of control and the ability to quickly and efficiently perform advanced adjustments.This course teaches you how to approach your photo editing workflow in a comprehensive, non-destructive manner. You will benefit from expert insights and pro techniques that will elevate your work with lighting and color to a new level of mastery and impact.


Sharpen Your Skills
Create Pixel-Perfect Masks
By the end of the course, you’ll confidently be able to create a full set of luminosity masks with the Photoshop Actions provided, or, if you prefer, create them manually.


Make Dramatic & Seamless Luminosity Adjustments
Using luminosity masks to introduce evoking, elaborate lighting effects, you’ll be able to seamlessly add mood and depth to your images — for stunning results.


Devise a Non-Destructive Workflow
Learn how to combine masks and adjustment layers to achieve your creative vision and maintain a high level of flexibility. Create in no time alternative versions of one photo, or revisit your artwork in the future to bring new ideas to life with a few strategic adjustments.


Enjoy Powerful Color Grading
You have unique ideas about color — luminosity masks help bring your wildest concepts to life. With luminosity-based, pixel-perfect selections, you can try original color combinations and always achieve natural-looking results. Injecting a specific color into selected luminosity range has never been easier. Want to add to your shadows a hint of blue? With luminosity masks you can achieve this and much more in just in a few seconds.
target_audience: This course is for aspiring photographers who want to improve their photo editing skills
This course is for anyone who is curious about professional Photoshop techniques behind successful images
This course is for artists who want to introduce digital techniques into their creative process
This course is for anyone who wants to develop artistic skills in fields of creative photo processing

courses.description:
NOTE: this class is given freely to all photographers who want to know how to use their light meter in digital photography... it is simply produced and is more informational than glossy. It will be continuously updated when new materials become available.
This course is designed for those photographers who have just begun using a hand held light meter or who may not know what to do with their meters. or why they are important and useful tools for making images.
The light meter is a device that measures the intensity of light, whether that light is being reflected from a subject (reflected light) or falling upon the subject (ambient or "incident" light). The light meter is a tool that helps a photographer create more accuracy in exposures.
We take a very close look at all the ways a light meter can help a photographer develop a stronger understanding of the light, as well as learning how the different tonalities are expressed through a light meter.
Real world examples and some simple and fun exercises will help the beginning light meter user develop good habits, and stronger lighting.
From reflected light readings to "placing the exposure" for maximum artistic presentation to using the ambient dome for flash in studio, this course is a simple to follow discussion of meters.
NOTE: We do not discuss the operation of any specific (Brand) kind of meters. You will still be required to read your manual to find out how to set your specific meter up, and the specific ways it works. But all meters DO the basic same things, and that is what we discuss on this course.
We use video and a few PDF's to show how to use a light meter in both reflective and ambient modes. There are three exercises to be done by the student that will help them learn their specific meter.
The course should be done in order, and there is over 2 hours of video content as well as PDF documents for your files.
If you are ready to learn to use a meter, to take control of your exposure this course is for you. Many photographers will tell you that 'chimping' is all you need to do. I disagree... there are far more reasons to use a light meter than merely exposure... and we will discuss them in this class.
The class is free... enjoy and keep shooting.
Thank you,
Don Giannatti
target_audience: Beginning Photographers with a Light Meter they do not know how to use
Intermediate Photographers who want to take more control of their images
Photographers who may have a light meter and are not familiar with how it works

•  Need help with choosing cameras?

With over two hours of authoritative, concise content, a quiz and short guide to cameras, here's just what you're looking for.

I've created a short and easy-to-understand course for anyone confused about buying cameras.   You'll see pictures of different cameras, details of camera controls, photographic examples, and more!

Remember: there’s no such thing as a perfect camera. But there’s probably a camera that’s perfect for you.   In this course I aim to equip you so you can make your own, confident decisions.
I give you the information, hints and tips to help you find the camera that’s just right for you.

In the process, you also learn a bit of photography! There are lots of tips and hints on photo-technique.

I explain everything in everyday language with lots of illustrations.   I’ve created this with the absolute beginner in mind - so you don’t need to have any knowledge of photography.

I won’t be check out or reviewing individual camera models this time, but I will describe the main types of cameras so you understand their pros and cons. That’s the best way to narrow your search.

There’s a lot to cover, so let’s get to it!

The lectures start with some introductory material, starting with four key terms in Lecture 2. Even if you know some photography, I suggest you take Lecture 3: A few key truths. Then we work our way up from basic point-and-shoot cameras to SLRs. Then we look in more detail at key camera features. Round up is some advice on how to buy, finishing off with three of my top tips in the final lesson.

courses.description:
Merhaba, hoşgeldiniz.
Bu eğitimi incelediğinize göre ya Fujifilm X-T5 ile ilgileniyor, onu almayı düşünüyorsunuz ya da halihazırda almış durumdasınız.
En sonda söyleyeceğimi en başta söyleyerek sizi rahatlatayım: ‘Bence çok doğru karar. Zaten ben de X-T5 aldım. O yüzden makinadaşız…’
Evet, Fujifilm yakın dönemde X-H2s, X-H2 ve X-T5 gibi birçok iyi makina çıkardı. X-T5’i; video konusunda iyi olmakla birlikte, özellikle ‘fotoğrafçılık alanına’ odaklanmış bir başrol oyuncusu olarak tanıttı.
Bu eğitim serisinde X-T5’e, fotoğraf ve video özelliklerine derinlemesine bakacağız, en ince detayları dahi öğreneceğiz.
Ancak şunu unutmamanızı rica ediyorum. Dünyanın en iyi fotoğraf makinasına dahi sahip olsanız, eğer makinanızı sizin elinizin, gözünüzün bir parçası olmamışsa hiçbir işe yaramaz.
Neden mi? Açıklayalım:
Fotoğraf çekme süreci içerisinde fotoğrafçının beyni, birçok konu için aynı anda düşünmek zorundadır. Bunlar,
ışık, diyafram, enstantane, ISO, makine ayarları, lens ve açı seçimi gibi teknik konular;
Kompozisyon kurgusu ve diğer estetik kaygılar
Anlatım dili ve içerik ile kaygılar
O birkaç saniye hatta zaman zaman milisaniye içerisine bu kadar çok konu ve bir o kadar çok karar sığdırmak gerçekten hiç kolay bir şey olmasa gerek.
İşte bu konu ve kaygılar içerisinde potansiyel olarak sizi en çok mesgul eden ama bununla birlikte en kolay elimine edilebilecek, değişkenliği en az şey, makine ile ilgili ayarlar bölümüdür.
Siz makinanıza hakim iseniz, makinanızdan ne istediğinizi biliyorsanız, makinanızın size ne verebileceğini biliyorsanız ve istediklerinizi makinanızdan nasıl alacağınızı biliyorsanız artık önemli konulardan birisini halletmişsiniz demektir.
Diğer konulara, kompozisyona ve fotoğrafın içeriğine, anlatım dilinizi oluşturmaya konsantre olabilirsiniz.
Ancak, makinanızı tanımıyorsanız, fotoğraf çekme süreci sizin için makine ile boğuşma serüveni haline gelir ve bu sırada fotoğraflar uçar, gider.
Makinanıza çok ciddi bir maddi yatırım yaptınız. Şimdi de kendinize küçük bir yatırım yapın ve makinanızla bütünleşmenize yardımcı olacak “Fujifilm X-T5’te Ustalaşmak Video Eğitim Serisini” izleyin. Kendinize yapacağınız bu küçük yatırımın, makinanıza yaptığınız o büyük yatırımı nasıl değerli kıldığını göreceksiniz.
Toplamda 80 ders, 7.5 saati aşan eğitimi kapsayan “X-T5’te Ustalaşmak Video Eğitim Serisi”nde, çok yetenekli ve üstün özelliklere sahip olan makinanızı, doğru tanımanız ve ona hakim olmanız için en ufak detaydan en karmaşık konulara kadar hemen her şeyi vermeye çalıştık.
Bu eğitimi bitirdiğinizde bir kenara bırakmayacak, takıldığınız her şeyde tekrar tekrar gelip izleyeceksiniz. Gerekiyorsa baştan sona tekrar izlemelisiniz. Ne zaman ki makinanız sizin eliniz, gözünüz oldu o zaman gönül rahatlığı ile bir kenara bırakabilirsiniz.
Ee haydi o zaman, ilk derste buluşalım…
target_audience: Fujifilm X sistem kullanıcıları, Fujifilm X-T5 kullanıcıları veya satın almayı düşünenler

requirements: Du brauchst einen Computer auf dem du Photoshop 2025 installieren und benutzen kannst.
