Lautsprecher oder ein Headset helfen dir sehr beim erfolgreichen Bearbeiten des Kurses.
Du solltest dir einen Stift und Zettel bereit legen - du wirst dir Notizen machen wollen!
courses.description:
Möchtest Du mit Photoshop in Zukunft professionell und schnell arbeiten? Dann bist Du hier richtig!
(Der Kurs behandelt Adobe Photoshop CC 26.4 (Version 2025). Ältere Versionen wie Adobe Photoshop CS6 sind natürlich meist kompatibel).
Ich bin Justus Zeemann, seit über 7 Jahren erfolgreicher Berufsdozent.
Auf Udemy findest Du mehr als 60.000 zufriedene Teilnehmer in über 90.000 verkauften Kursen.
Durch die Betreuung vieler Unternehmen habe ich mir ein umfangreiches Wissen angeeignet.
In diesem Kurs zeige ich Dir alles, was Du brauchst, um mit Adobe Photoshop durchzustarten und in der Zukunft professionell und schnell mit dem Programm zu arbeiten.
In diesem Kurs lernst Du alles über Photoshop.
Ich führe Dich durch den Photoshop Download, die Installation und die optimale Einrichtung Deines Arbeitsbereiches; vorbei an der Funktion und Arbeitsweise von Ebenen; über die Einstellungsebenen und die Füllmethoden zu den Werkzeugen. Zur weiteren Bearbeitung erfährst Du dann noch alles über Filter und kannst im Praxisteil die Bearbeitung direkt am Objekt nachvollziehen.

Teilnehmerin Petra Kohlsdorfer schreibt zu ihrer 5/5 Sterne Bewertung:
"ich habe genau so etwas gesucht, was bei 0 anfängt und jeden einzelnen Schritt/Tastendruck erklärt."

Teilnehmer David Arndt schreibt zu seiner 5/5 Sterne Bewertung:
"Der Kurs war sehr hilfreich! Im Rahmen meiner Ausbildung setze ich mich jetzt mit den wichtigsten Adobe Programmen auseinander und durch diesen Kurs gelingt mir der Einstieg einwandfrei :)"


Jede Funktion von Adobe Photoshop CC wird praxisnah und teilweise direkt mit Beispielen durchgesprochen und erklärt. Zusätzlich erfährst Du Tastenkürzel, Tipps & Tricks, erhältst die Kursbilder zum Mitarbeiten und vieles mehr.
Dein Vorgehen und Dein Wissen über Photoshop werden nach diesem Kurs nicht mehr wie vorher sein!

Erfahre alles über:
Ebenen
Einstellungsebenen
Füllmethoden
Filter
Werkzeuge
AI Werkzeuge
den Export deiner Bearbeitungen
Bibliotheken
Farbfelder
den Arbeitsbereich
Vorlagenerstellung
uvm.

Teilnehmerin Olga Kozak schreibt zu ihrer 5/5 Sterne Bewertung:
"Der Kurs hat mir sehr gut gefallen: Informationsreich, klare Aufklärungen, anwendbar in der Praxis."

Teilnehmer Michael Buhr schreibt zu seiner 5/5 Sterne Bewertung:
"Ein unglaublich toller Kurs für alle Photoshopbegeisterten. Das Programm ist sehr komplex und wird ausgezeichnet erklärt. Danke!"


Du kannst das Geld für den Kurs innerhalb von 30 Tagen zurück erhalten, wenn Dir der Kurs nicht gefällt.
Dies ist Deine Chance!
Es ist Zeit, Deine Photoshop-Künste auf das nächste Level zu heben. Schreibe Dich gleich für den Kurs ein und schließe Dich über 31.000 zufriedenen Teilnehmern an!
target_audience: An alle Anfänger die Photoshop kennen und lieben lernen möchten.
Fortgeschrittene, die bisher nur mit Photoshop gearbeitet aber keine Hintergrundinfos haben.
Wenn du motiviert bist, Photoshop von Grund auf zu Lernen und zu Verstehen, bist du hier richtig!

courses.title: Fujifilm X-H2'de Ustalaşmak
courses.bio: X-H2'yi elinizin, gözünüzün doğal uzantısı yapın...

requirements: Fujifilm X-H2 fotoğraf makinası sahibi olmak veya sahip olmayı düşünmek
Temel fotoğrafçılık seviyesinde bilgi sahibi olmak
courses.description:
Merhaba, hoşgeldiniz.
Bu eğitimi incelediğinize göre ya Fujifilm X-H2 ile ilgileniyor, onu almayı düşünüyorsunuz ya da halihazırda almış durumdasınız.
En sonda söyleyeceğimi en başta söyleyerek sizi rahatlatayım: ‘Bence çok doğru karar. Bugünlerde piyasada olan hem fotoğraf hem de video anlamında en yetenekli kameralardan birisi X-H2.’
Bu eğitim serisinde, X-H2’nin fotoğraf ve video özelliklerine derinlemesine bakacağız, en ince detayları dahi öğreneceğiz.
Ancak şunu unutmamanızı rica ediyorum. Dünyanın en iyi fotoğraf makinasına dahi sahip olsanız, eğer makinanızı sizin elinizin, gözünüzün bir parçası olmamışsa hiçbir işe yaramaz.
Neden mi? Açıklayalım:
Fotoğraf çekme süreci içerisinde fotoğrafçının beyni, birçok konu için aynı anda düşünmek zorundadır. Bunlar,
ışık, diyafram, enstantane, ISO, makine ayarları, lens ve açı seçimi gibi teknik konular;
Kompozisyon kurgusu ve diğer estetik kaygılar
Anlatım dili ve içerik ile kaygılar
O birkaç saniye hatta zaman zaman milisaniye içerisine bu kadar çok konu ve bir o kadar çok karar sığdırmak gerçekten hiç kolay bir şey olmasa gerek.
İşte bu konu ve kaygılar içerisinde potansiyel olarak sizi en çok mesgul eden ama bununla birlikte en kolay elimine edilebilecek, değişkenliği en az şey, makine ile ilgili ayarlar bölümüdür.
Siz makinanıza hakim iseniz, makinanızdan ne istediğinizi biliyorsanız, makinanızın size ne verebileceğini biliyorsanız ve istediklerinizi makinanızdan nasıl alacağınızı biliyorsanız artık önemli konulardan birisini halletmişsiniz demektir.
Diğer konulara, kompozisyona ve fotoğrafın içeriğine, anlatım dilinizi oluşturmaya konsantre olabilirsiniz.
Ancak, makinanızı tanımıyorsanız, fotoğraf çekme süreci sizin için makine ile boğuşma serüveni haline gelir ve bu sırada fotoğraflar uçar, gider.
Makinanıza çok ciddi bir maddi yatırım yaptınız. Şimdi de kendinize küçük bir yatırım yapın ve makinanızla bütünleşmenize yardımcı olacak “Fujifilm X-H2’de Ustalaşmak Video Eğitim Serisini” izleyin. Kendinize yapacağınız bu küçük yatırımın, makinanıza yaptığınız o büyük yatırımı nasıl değerli kıldığını göreceksiniz.
Toplamda 82 ders, 7,5 saati aşan eğitimi kapsayan “X-H2’de Ustalaşmak Video Eğitim Serisi”nde, çok yetenekli ve üstün özelliklere sahip olan makinanızı, doğru tanımanız ve ona hakim olmanız için en ufak detaydan en karmaşık konulara kadar hemen her şeyi vermeye çalıştım.
Bu eğitimi bitirdiğinizde bir kenara bırakmayacak, takıldığınız her şeyde tekrar tekrar gelip izleyeceksiniz. Gerekiyorsa baştan sona tekrar izlemelisiniz. Ne zaman ki makinanız sizin eliniz, gözünüz oldu o zaman gönül rahatlığı ile bir kenara bırakabilirsiniz.
Ee haydi o zaman, ilk derste buluşalım…
target_audience: Fujifilm X sistem kullanıcıları, Fujifilm X-H2 kullanıcıları veya satın almayı düşünenler

courses.bio: Przewodnik Użytkownika
objectives: Zdobędą wiedzę potrzebną do rozpoczęcia przygody z dronem DJI Mavic 2 PRO
Poszerzą wiedzę i kompetencję z zakresu eksploatacji dronów DJI

requirements: Podstawowa wiedza dotycząca użytkowania telefonu, aplikacji i sterowania urządzeniami
Podstawowa znajomość języka angielskiego
Otwartość na poszerzenie horyzontów
Proaktywne podejście na "tak"
courses.description:
Kurs dotyczący eksploatacji jednego z najwspanialszych dronów naszych czasów, czyli DJI Mavic 2 PRO.
Jeżeli wydałeś spore pieniądze na swojego nowego Towarzysza przygody i chcesz w pełni wykorzystać jego możliwości, ten kurs jest właśnie dla Ciebie.
Autor w sposób przejrzysty wprowadza Cię w tajniki DJI Mavic 2 PRO, krok po kroku.  Ten kurs zawiera szerokie spektrum wiedzy i doświadczeń z zakresu latania dronem DJI Mavic 2 PRO.
Możesz śmiało korzystać z  doświadczeń innych związanych z każdym etapem wtajemniczenia, od omówienia ustawień, inteligentnych trybów lotu, bezpieczeństwa, aż po bardziej zaawansowane techniki lotu, wykonywania zdjęć  i filmowania.
Kurs systematycznie będzie się poszerzał o bieżące informacje i nagrane nowe materiały dydaktyczne a także pomoce.
Materiał został przygotowany w taki sposób, aby każdy otwarty na rozwój użytkownik mógł z niego wynieść coś dla siebie. W miarę jak technologia i aktualizacje  będą się rozwijały, na bieżąco kurs zostanie aktualizowany.


Zapraszam  serdecznie,
Rafał Galiński
target_audience: Każdy, kto rozważa zakup drona Mavic 2 PRO
Posiadacze Mavic 2 PRO, pragnący poszerzyć wiedzę i doświadczenia
Użytkownicy otwarci na świat i zmiany, pragnące zaznać wyjątkowych chwil w życiu.

courses.bio: محاضر خبرة , شرح من البداية خطوه بخطوة , تحديثات تناسب سوق العمل, تمارين عملية

courses.description:
اهلا بيك في دوره تعديل الوان الصور بواسطة أدوبي فوتوشوب من الصفر
في الدوره دي احنا هنتعلم ازاي نقدر نعمل تعديل او ريتاتش وتظبيت جوده الصورة باستخدام ادوبي فوتوشوب والرحله دي احنا هنتعلم فيها من بدايه تنزيل البرنامج علي الجهاز الخاص بينا واساسيات ادوبي فوتوشوب الي اننا نقدر نعمل ريتاتش بشكل كامل للكاميرا بشكل كامل وعلي كذا صوره، كورس مليان تمارين عملية من تحين جودات صور اوزاله العيوب الي فيها او تظبيط اضافات .
الكورس ده مهم ليك اذا حبب يبدأ مجال تعديل الصور او الاديت وهيكون اضافه ليك لو عاوز تشتغل في مكتب للتصوير في تعديل الصور وكمان في اخر محاضرة بنتكلم علي انواع التقدم والمصطلحات بتاعته، الدوره للمستوي المبتدئ وهتخرجك قادر علي تعديل الصور بدون مشاكل .
يوجد اتنين محاضرين :
المحاضر أ / احمد حمدي
مصمم جرافيك ومونتير , صانع محتوي علي الانترنت من 2017 (هيعرفكم علي برنامج الفوتوشوب )
المحاضر أ / محسن رضا
بورترية ويدج فوتو مصمم محترف من عام 2016 مصور محترف للعمل لفترة طويلة في تعديل الصور لكاتب تصوير في المملكة المتحدة وهواليا صاحب مكتب خاص
(هيعرفكم أساسيات تعديل الصور بواسطه ادوبي فوتوشوب للصورين من تعديل الوان وريتاتش وتصحيح جودة ومن يجذبه في سوق العمل)

courses.description:
動画配信時代に突入し、個人でも簡単に稼ぎを作れるようになった今、
オンラインセミナーやオンラインでの動画販売の機会がずいぶん増えました。


「動画配信を上手に行えるスキルを手に入れられているか否か」が、
相手からの第一印象を良くする上でも非常に重要なスキルとなりつつあります。


少し前の時代であれば、
「清潔感のある服装や髪型による身だしなみ」が大切でしたが、
今の時代であれば、
それ以外にも「動画配信スキルをしっかり身につけられているか否か」で
あなた自身への第一印象が大きく変わります。
今後の長い人生においても、このスキルを身につけられているか否かで、
人生に大きな差がついてしまうということは誰しも容易に想像できるでしょう。


このコースでは
これからUdemy等で動画配信を始めるにあたりそもそも機材の選び方がわからない
動画配信で専用機材を買うメリットについてをもう少し詳しく学びたい
過去に多少機材投資したものの、撮影する際に家族や隣の住人の微かな物音さえもマイクが拾ってしまう
賃貸ワンルーム暮らしなので撮影するには背景が物足りないと感じている
iMovieなどの標準のノイズ除去に限界を感じている
もし一つ以上当てはまる方でしたらこのコースは役立ちます。


本コースはUdemyで数多くのベストセラー実績を作ってきた講師が、
動画配信を効果的に行なっていくための撮影カメラ・機材の選定方法
動画コンテンツ収録以外にもZoomやYoububeなどのライブ配信で一眼レフカメラをWebカメラとして使えるようにする方法
照明機材の設置方法のコツ
お勧めのグリーンバックのご紹介や使い方
雑音や生活音が入りにくい高品質マイクの選び方
綺麗に音を収録するために、Adobe Auditionを使った収録ノウハウ
mmhmmを使った動画の録画方法
といった盛りだくさんの最先端の内容で、あなたがオンラインで動画コンテンツを販売、ZoomやYoutubeなどのライブ配信で一目置かれるレベルに一気に向上させるためのノウハウをご紹介していきます。


本コースを通じて動画の撮影技術はもちろん、
たまに見かける、綺麗なZoom配信を行われている方と同じレベルでの配信技術が手に入ります。


講師が約３年かけて少しずつ手に入れてきた実践的ノウハウを一気に学ぶことで、
動画配信時代であなた自身をしっかりブランディング・セルフプロデュースしていける力を身につけましょう。


Udemy Q&A機能もありますので、受講の中で疑問に思ったことはぜひ積極的に質問してくださいね。
それではコースの中でお会いしましょう。

Czy chcesz robić zapierające dech w piersiach powietrzne ujęcia, przy użyciu drona, stosując się do obecnych przepisów?
Ten kurs stworzyłem, aby poprowadził Cię w prostych krokach w zapisy prawne regulujące ruch lotniczy w Polsce i i ich interpretację.
Warsztat podzielony jest na odrębne działy, każdy z nich zawiera odmienną treść, stanowiąca kompendium wiedzy i zasad bezpieczeństwa.
Warsztat został przygotowany w oparciu o drony produkcji DJI: Mavic Air, Mavic Pro, Phantom 4 i Mavic 2 Pro.  Jednak na rynku istnieją ciekawe modele  innych firm, np. Parrot.
Kurs odbywa się przy wykorzystaniu dronów DJI, ale możesz go śledzić, posiadając dowolny model na rynku.
Zasady bezpieczeństwa i przepisy są uniwersalne!

courses.title: Photo post-processing – Adobe Photoshop and Lightroom
courses.bio: Photo post-processing in practice – photo editing taught by practising photographers
objectives: You will get to know most essential tools in Adobe Photoshop and Lightroom.
You will practice everything we show on actual photos.
We will go through face editing together and we will work on layers and masks.
In Adobe Photoshop we will practice:
developing photos in Camera Raw
cutting tool, crop tool, frame tool, eyedropper tool
healing brush, brush tool, clone stamp tool, eraser tool
paint bucket tool, blur tool, dodge tool, burn tool, type tool
adding shapes and zoom tool, working on layers
editing portrait photos
In Adobe Lightroom we will practice:
tagging photos
processing
local photo editing
creating presets
exporting pictures
requirements: Apart from having these two programs, there are no additional requirements :)
courses.description:
We have huge experience in teaching photography and photo editing. Thousands of learners have participated in training courses in our company. In our photo post-processing course, we rely on the experience of our trainers, who are also photographers. In this course, we start with the basics of Adobe Lightroom and Adobe Photoshop and then gradually move on to the next levels of knowledge. Adobe Lightroom is much easier and more intuitive, which is why working with it is more user-friendly. However, it does not mean that Lightroom is for amateurs. In fact, it is used by many professionals. Adobe Photoshop requires more attention and work, but it also gives you incomparably more options to work with images. In this course, we will guide you through basic editing, working with RAW files, working with layers and masks, airbrushing photos and many other functions. During the course, you will get to know the majority of the most important tools and practise using them. This online course is for anyone who thinks about editing photos for their own needs and for commercial purposes. If you take photos, the ability to edit them will definitely come in handy. You can also treat this course as an introduction to working with graphic design.
We use Adobe Photoshop CC and Lightroom CC 2020.
target_audience: For anyone who thinks about editing photos for their own needs and for commercial purposes.
For anyone who wants to know how to improve their photos!
If you take photos, the ability to edit them will definitely come in handy.
If you want to organise your knowledge of editing and using Adobe Photoshop or Adobe.
Lightroom, you will definitely be able to do that during this course!

Este curso tem por finalidade ajudar alunos com conhecimento em Photoshop CC a dar mais um passo em seus estudos.
Trata-se de um treinamento avançado de técnicas e recursos utilizados para restauração e colorização de fotos no Photoshop CC ou superior.  Este curso tem a finalidade de proporcionar conhecimentos e informações necessárias para que possa utilizar todas as ferramentas e os principais recursos para restaurar e colorir fotos.
Todas as aulas possuem exercício de apoio para você praticar em casa.
target_audience: Este curso é voltado para os seguintes profissionais: Fotógrafo, Designer, Artista gráfico, Editor de Imagem,  pessoas que desejam trabalhar com restauração de fotos, que desejam aprender recursos avançados do Photoshop CC ou Freelancer.

courses.title: GIMP 2.10 zrozumieć i używać. Od zielonego do biegłego.
courses.bio: Kurs przeprowadzi Cię przez proces nauki programu graficznego GIMP niemal jak za rękę.
objectives: Przerabianie zdjęć.
Sztuki fotomontażu.
Tworzenie wizytówek i ulotek.
Retusz starych zdjęć.
Większość użytecznych funkcji zawartych w oprogramowaniu GIMP.
requirements: Wymagana podstawowa znajomość obsługi komputera.
courses.description: Wiele godzin merytorycznej wiedzy na temat programu GIMP w jednym miejscu. W zasadzie po ukończeniu kursu możesz powiedzieć, że wiesz to, co potrzebujesz, jeśli chodzi o obróbkę grafiki w tym popularnym programie. Kurs na początku tłumaczy podstawy, przeprowadza Cię przez niezbędne narzędzia i szczegółowo wyjaśnia ich sposób działania. Następnie, po zademonstrowaniu tego, jak działa narzędzie, przystępujemy do realizacji ćwiczeń. Oprócz tego, w pierwszej sekcji mówię o problemach, które powtarzają się wśród nowych użytkowników programu. Na przykład o uciekających przybornikach, paletach kolorów itd.  Kurs opisuje te wszystkie pomniejsze problemy, po to, abyś ich uniknął i uczył się szybciej. W drugiej i znacznie dłuższej części kursu realizujemy konkretne projekty, na przykład naprawę starej fotografii, usuwanie zmian skórnych, takich jak trądzik i zmarszczki. Uczymy się także, jak zaprojektować wizytówkę czy ulotkę. W kursie znajdziesz również ciekawe efekty, które ubogacą każdy projekt, tworząc go bardziej widowiskowym i profesjonalnym. Materiał jest bardzo obszerny, a na dzień publikacji kursu jest to najdłuższy kurs dostępny na polskim Udemy o Gimpie. Zalecam jako autor, abyś realizował kurs po kolei, nawet jeżeli znasz już jakieś zagadnienie, to warto chociaż obejrzeć je fragmentami, aby zaznajomić się ze wszystkimi funkcjami, których używam. Po zapoznaniu się z całością kursu można zawsze wrócić do kontretnych lekcji, które są dla Ciebie problematyczne. Jako autor życzę przyjemnej nauki, a po ukończeniu proszę o pozytywną ocenę całości.
target_audience: Początkujący graficy komputerowi, hobbyści i inne osoby, które chcą nauczyć się edycji zdjęć i obrazów.

Photo perfection doesn’t stop after you capture an image. Image specialists (and the rest of us) optimize their pictures in Photoshop before sharing/posting these creations. With this course, you can gain professional-level Photoshop Elements skills and impress your audience with top-quality images.
Whether you’re an entry-level photographer, an experienced amateur, or a professional photo editor, you need to know about Photoshop Elements 2018. As a beginner, you’ll love this software package, which contains many features of the professional version – but with a simpler interface and reduced cost. As a professional, you need to understand this compact version of Photoshop when coaching clients and instructing students.
In this course, you’ll start from the very beginning – you don’t need any previous Photoshop knowledge. You’ll learn how to download the most recent version of this powerful software package and get up-and-running in a flash. Our experienced instructor will explain the basic and advanced features of Photoshop Elements 2018 in simple, jargon-free language.

Follow the tutorials in this course to master the fundamentals of Photoshop Images 2018. You’ll learn how to use color swatches, adjust lighting levels, and remove red-eye. You’ll learn to work with layers, replace colors, and create stunning black-and-white versions of your images.
With the practical tips and tricks in this course, you can quickly edit images and add artistic touches. With Photoshop 2018, you can easily express your artistic vision and creativity. You’ll learn hassle-free techniques for organizing pictures by importing them into a centralized catalog. With photo tags and keywords, you can easily create photo albums for easy access and archiving. You’re just a few clicks away from sharing these creations with your family, friends, and colleagues.

This course covers DSLR accessories that you may be interested in if you recently purchased a camera. This is a comprehensive course, and you don't need any more information than basic information about DSLRs. If you're feeling lost about what kind of accessories you should buy for your needs, this is the course for you!
Accessories are helpful (and often essential) for many types of shooting scenarios. Additionally, each kind of DSLR accessory is different and is used in different settings. We'll discuss what kinds of accessories there are and how each are used, especially with different kinds of situations and techniques.
This course is chock full of helpful resources within the lesson videos, including links to helpful third-party websites, diagrams, and hands-on examples.

Miscellaneous Accessories (8:58)
Wrap Up and Conclusion (1:21)
At a comfortable pace, the course should take about half a week to complete, though it can certainly be done in less or greater time, depending on your learning style.
You should be familiar with some basic terminology regarding accessories, such as "lens," and "tripod," though these terms will be explained in the course.
Ultimately, it's our end goal to prepare you to have a clear idea of what kind of accessories you need, and for you to know what the best kind of equipment is, and how to use, maintain, and enjoy it. If you've been waiting to learn about the kinds of DSLR accessories you'll need in photography, we look forward to seeing you in this course.
target_audience: This course is for everyone who wants to learn about the various types of DSLR accessories.

courses.description:
Fotoğraflarınızı Baştan Yaratın! – Fotoğraf Retouch Eğitimi
Photoshop ile retouch odaklı Türkiye'nin en kapsamlı fotoğraf düzenleme eğitim seti serisidir!
İster moda fotoğrafçısı olun, ister portre fotoğrafçısı. Fotoğraflarınızı ufak ya da büyük dokunuşlarla mükemmel hale getireceğiniz Retouch Kursu’nu kaçırmayın! High-end profesyonel fotoğraf rötuş yöntemleri ile doku kaybı olmadan fotoğraf düzenleme yapabileceksiniz. Klasik Photoshop retouch yöntemleri doku, detay kaybına sebep olmaktadır. Ancak high-end photo retouch yöntemleri ile frekans ayırma tekniği uygulanmaktadır. Fotoğrafın doku ve renkleri ayrı katmanlara aktarılmaktadır. Böylece renk katmanı üzerinde işlem yapılmasına rağmen hiç bir şekilde doku, detay kaybı oluşmamaktadır.


Fotoğraflarında mükemmellik isteyenler, bu eğitim tam size göre.
Orta ve ileri seviye uygulamalı Photoshop retouch, fotoğraf rötuş eğitimini bitirdikten sonra, fotoğraflarınızı baştan sona mükemmel hale getirmeyi, daha hızlı, pratik ve profesyonel düzenlemeyi öğreneceksiniz. High-end retouch, profesyonel rötuş tekniğini öğrenecek ve sektörde iş yapabilme düzeyine geleceksiniz. Retouch eğitimi için indirimi kaçırmayın. Profesyonel fotoğrafçıyım diyebilmek için bu eğitimi kaçırmayın.


Fotoğraf tutkunuysanız;
Hobi için; temel ve ileri fotoğrafçılık eğitimlerini alabilir ardından retouch eğitimine kayıt olabilirsiniz. Fotoğraf çekmeye devam ederek çektiğiniz fotoğrafları düzenleyebilir, böylece daha fazla pratik yaparak kendinizi geliştirebilirsiniz.


Meslek edinmek istiyorsanız;
Mesleki olarak düşünürseniz; Photoshop fotoğraf retouch kursu ile mesleğinize ilk adımınızı atabilir, fotoğraları profesyonel teknikler ile düzenlemeyi öğrenebilirsiniz. Profesyonel fotoğraf rötuş yöntemlerini öğrendikten sonra profesyonel kariyerinizi oluşturabilirsiniz.


Deneyip memnun kalmazsanız 30 gün içinde paranız iade! Hemen kayıt olun! Para iade garantisi. Telefonunuza İndirin. Ömür Boyu Erişim.

5 Głównych Korzyści z udziału dla Ciebie:
- lepszy dostęp do osoby prowadzącej poprzez korespondencję lub udział w opcjonalnych konsultacjach,
dzięki temu uzyskasz odpowiedzi na trapiące Cię pytania i rozwiejesz niepewności,


- pomoc krok po kroku na wstępnym etapie eksploatacji,
unikniesz typowych błędów popełnianych przez początkujących (np. rozbicie drona, utopienie, naruszenie prywatności sąsiadów),


- uzyskanie fachowego wsparcia, wiedzy merytorycznej i serwisowej,
skrócisz czas potrzebny na poszukiwania informacji, skorzystasz z gotowych i sprawdzonych rozwiązań,
- materiały dydaktyczne online i pomoce w pdf,
w każdym dogodnym momencie możesz po nie sięgnąć, obejrzeć lub wydrukować pdf-y,
to Ty decydujesz gdzie i kiedy,
- wsparcie w kształtowaniu pewności przy obsłudze twojego pierwszego drona,
poczujesz się pewniej i nabierzesz wprawy szybciej,
- informacje na temat bezpiecznego i legalnego latania,
oszczędzisz czas stracony na poszukiwanie odpowiednich przepisów a także ich interpretację,
- wsparcie na etapie serwisowym, czyli pomoc w trudnych chwilach.


Trzymam kciuki i powodzenia!

courses.description:
This course includes my Lightroom preset starter kit of 35 presets (not just 7)!
In this course, I’ll share with you my top 7 Lightroom presets that I’ve used to streamline my workflow and cut post production by up to 50%!
These are the same presets I’ve used on hundreds of weddings and thousands of portrait sessions.  I’ve used them for my personal photography business and as a personal editor for other professional photographers around the world.  And now I’m sharing them with you so you too can cut your post-production by up to 50%.
This course is jam packed with tons of presets, tips and techniques for spending less time in Lightroom.  My favorites, are the 2 types of presets that can be applied during import!  Imagine specific edits you do for every photo and then allowing Lightroom to apply them during import - automatically!  Although, I do prefer having full control over my edits.  However, there specific edits that I do to every photo and prefer to let Lightroom do it automatically.    You’ll learn all about them in this course!
The one thing I hate doing is, the same thing over and over.  Lightroom has tons of ways to save ordinary tasks as presets.  This way, you can set something up once and save it as a preset for future use.  For example, if you’d like to add a Watermark to your images during import, you can create a preset just for that.  Or maybe you have different settings for exporting to different destinations;  Facebook, pro lab, blog, etc..  For this, you can create a Preset for Export and create a new one for each type of output needed.  You’ll learn how to create these types of presets as well.
I LOVE Lightroom's Local Adjustment tools.  Local Adjustment presets give you the precision and control you need to apply specific edits in specific locations (unlike Develop presets that apply the edits globally).  You’ll learn how to use them and create your own.  Plus, I’ve included some for free with the preset starter kit that is included with this course.
It doesn’t end there.  In the Bonus section, you’ll learn how to use collage templates in the Print Module.  Plus, you’ll receive 15 templates (in the starter kit) to get started with.  These are great for using for your Facebook timeline cover, Pinterest or for your blog.  I’ll show you how easy it is to add your photos to the templates and how to create your own.
When you’re done with this course, you’ll have my top 7 Lightroom presets to help you cut your post production by up to 50%.
Just a small snippet of what you’ll learn throughout the course…
Tips & Techniques for using Local Adjustment presets (brushes and filters)
How to make your own Local Adjustment presets
How to install Develop presets
Tips for using Develop presets
How to make Keyword presets
How to make a Copyright preset
How to install Local Adjustment presets
How to make Export presets
How to make a Watermark preset
How to make & use collage templates - in Lightroom!
Plus, you’ll receive my Lightroom preset starter kit of 35 presets!
target_audience: All levels of Lightroom users
All levels of photographers
Anyone who wants to spend less time in front of the computer
Anyone who would like to cut post production by up to 50%

courses.description:
O pacote de Ferramentas Imobiliárias é o curso ideal para quem deseja criar fotos e vídeos de alta qualidade para o mercado imobiliário de forma prática e eficiente. Nele, você terá acesso a ferramentas exclusivas, como presets, LUTs e templates prontos para edição, que vão transformar suas produções em conteúdos profissionais, mesmo sem experiência prévia.
Você aprenderá a utilizar esses recursos para otimizar seu fluxo de trabalho e entregar fotos e vídeos incríveis que destacam os imóveis de seus clientes. Além disso, o curso oferece dicas de edição, ajustes de cores e personalização para que seus vídeos e fotos tenham um toque único e profissional.
O curso também aborda estratégias para planejar suas produções de forma eficiente, garantindo que você capture os melhores ângulos e detalhes que fazem a diferença nas vendas. Seja você um videomaker iniciante ou um corretor de imóveis buscando melhorar suas apresentações, este curso vai ajudá-lo a criar vídeos que vendem.
Com as ferramentas certas e orientações práticas, você será capaz de atrair mais clientes, gerar resultados e se destacar no mercado imobiliário. Não perca a chance de transformar sua forma de trabalhar com conteúdos visuais. Inscreva-se agora e tenha acesso a todas as ferramentas e conteúdos exclusivos!

courses.bio: Learn How to Build Lifelike AI Clones/Avatars Using HeyGen, VEO 3, ElevenLabs & Kling AI. Perfect for Video Production.
objectives: Understand what AI clones/avatars are and how they can be used for content creation, business, and personal branding.
Learn the step-by-step process of creating an AI clone using images, audio, and AI-powered tools.

requirements: There are no prerequisites. This course is perfect for complete beginners.
courses.description:
"DISCLAIMER - This course contains the use of artificial intelligence."
Imagine if you could create your AI clone/avatar that looks like you, talks like you and moves like you?
It will allow you to be anywhere at any time without you actually being there.
No more make-up, dressing up, setting up expensive gear just to make a video of yourself.
With your AI clone, you will be able to create endless number of videos simply with a single click.
This course, Creating AI Clones Using AI, is designed to guide you step by step through the fascinating process of building your own AI clone (also called an AI avatar). In less than two hours, you’ll learn how to combine images, audio, and AI tools to create a digital version of yourself that looks and speaks just like you.
We begin with the Introduction, where you’ll understand what an AI clone is, see a real example in action, and explore why creating your own clone can be valuable for content creation, business, or personal branding.
In Section 2, we break down the process. You’ll discover the essential tools (both free and paid) and the key ingredients: image, audio, and AI technology. We’ll also discuss the difference between using a real image and an AI-generated one for clone creation.
Next, in Section 3, we dive into HeyGen AI Avatar 4. You’ll learn how to prepare your image and audio files, create a clone step by step, analyze the results, and explore HeyGen’s pricing options.
Section 4 covers VEO 3, one of the most advanced AI video tools. We’ll generate realistic AI images using ChatGPT, Nano Banana, and Ideogram AI, upscale them for quality, and then use VEO 3 to bring your clone to life.
In Section 5, we focus on audio with ElevenLabs AI, where you’ll learn how to generate and manipulate realistic voices. We’ll then compare HeyGen and VEO 3 to see which tool performs best for creating clones.
Finally, in Section 6, we explore Kling AI, another cutting-edge tool, with hands-on demonstrations across two lectures.
By the end of this course, you’ll have practical knowledge and workflows to create, refine, and compare AI clones using multiple tools.
target_audience: This course is for people who want to learn how to create their AI clone/avatar so they can use it for different types of content creation

Podsummowanie: Wykład Bonusowy: Kupony Rabatowe na Inne Moje Kursy

requirements: Podstawowa wiedza dotycząca użytkowania telefonu, aplikacji i sterowania urządzeniami
Proaktywne podejście na "tak"
Otwartość na poszerzenie horyzontów
courses.description:
Czy chcesz robić zapierające dech w piersiach powietrzne zdjęcia, przy użyciu drona, stosując profesjonalne zasady?
Ten materiał stworzyłem, aby poprowadził Cię w prostych krokach w tajniki i specyfikę wykonywania fotografii z powietrza.
Mini Warsztat stanowi etap wstępny docelowego Warsztatu Online, omawiającego szczegółowo aspekty fotografii z powietrza wraz z poszczególnymi przykładami.
Warsztat docelowy podzielony jest na odrębne projekty, każdy z nich zawiera przykładową sesję zdjęciową (zapis lotu), postprodukcję a także przedstawienie ustawień kamery drona, sposób ujmowania ujęć.
Warsztat został przygotowany w oparciu o loty i sesje zdjęciowe dronami produkcji DJI: Mavic Air, Mavic Pro, Phantom 4 i Mavic 2 Pro.
W treści warsztatu otrzymasz wszystkie najlepsze wskazówki dotyczące fotografii powietrznej, poznasz możliwości sprzętowe, techniki stosowane przez najlepszych operatorów.
Kurs odbywa się przy wykorzystaniu dronów DJI, ale możesz go śledzić, posiadając dowolny model na rynku.

Your first image imports to Adobe Lightroom Classic

requirements: Students will need Adobe's Lightroom Software, and it doesn't have to be the latest version
Students will need to be willing to be creative
Students will need some of their own photos to experiment with.
Students will need a Windows or Apple Computer
Students should be motivated to improve their digital photography.
courses.description:
Welcome to the Digital Photography Editing Workflow with Lightroom Classic.  I've been working with Lightroom for over a decade now as a professional photographer, and I've got to say that developing my workflow has saved me immense amounts of time over the years.  Lightroom is not only a powerful editing solution for your digital images, it is the best photography asset management system out there to date.
In this course we'll talk about setting Lightroom up from scratch if this is your first time using it.  We'll review the core interface and spend almost all of the course time in the Library Module and Develop Module.  For most digital photographers, professional or amateur, the Library and Develop Modules are everything.  And for most photographers using Lightroom, you won't need any other software beyond Lightroom to make compelling edits to your photos.
Over the course of the lectures in this class you'll learn how to import images properly, including Keywords and additional Metadata applying your copyright to all of your images.  We'll walk through navigating the Lightroom Interface together.  And we'll also walk through the Develop Module as well.  We'll spend some time editing a few images, and taking a few poor quality images and breathing some life into them.
By the time you've completed the course I believe you'll have a firm grasp of how to navigate Lightroom, find and catalog your images, and you'll have a level of comfort with editing that will allow you to start being more creative with your images.  With Lightroom you'll feel confident about making minor edits all the way through creating heavily edited works as well.  And throughout the course I want you to remember, these are your images and you should be as creative as you like while working on them in Lightroom.
target_audience: Anyone interested in improving their skills with Adobe's Lightroom
Digital photographers who want to streamline their editing process
Digital Photographers who want to learn how to improve their images in post processing easily
People interested in Drone Photography and editing as well.

You will learn how to use all the various tools including Camera Raw, advanced layer techniques, manipulating images, sharing your creations, and so much more. Why not finally learn about all the exciting tools and possibilities that Photoshop Elements has to offer?
Whether you are completely new to Photoshop Elements or upgrading from an older version, this course will empower you with the knowledge and skills necessary to be a proficient user. We have incorporated years of classroom training experience and teaching techniques to develop an easy-to-use course that you can customize to meet your personal learning needs. courses.description:
Jeśli lubisz odkrywać sekrety i nowe możliwości Photoshopa to ten kurs jest dla Ciebie. Stworzony z myślą o fotografach, którzy poprawiają swoje zdjęcia.
Kurs to niesamowita dawka wiedzy na temat pracy z Photoshopem. Nie sposób określić zakresu tematów jakie obejmuje ale na pewno będą zadowoleni z niego wszyscy fotografowie. Głównym założeniem tego poradnika jest przekazanie wiedzy na temat pracy ze zdjęciami, która wychodzi poza ramy podstawowego poziomu. Dzięki kursowi przekonasz się, jakie duże możliwości kryje Photoshop. Nawet jeśli pracujesz w nim na co dzień to jestem pewien, że nie jedna lekcja z tego kursu Cię zaskoczy. Pokażemy Ci, że dany efekt można w Photoshopie osiągnąć na sto różnych sposobów.
Kurs został podzielony na 4 różne rozdziały: Retusz, Wycinanie, Fotomanipulacje, Kolor. W każdym rozdziale dowiesz się ciekawych rzeczy związanych z procesem edycji. Dowiesz się jakimi metodami retuszować zdjęcie portretowe, jak sprawić by kompozycja wyciętych obiektów była ze sobą spójna, jak wycinać włosy czy osiągnąć kolory znanych fotografów.
W czasie trwania lekcji poznasz nowe oblicze narzędzi, które już na pewno znasz: maski, warstwy, tryby mieszania, filtry, maski przycinające,
warstwy dopasowania, moduł Camera Raw i wiele wiele innych.

courses.description:
Profesjonalny retusz to kompleksowy biznes w którym nawet doświadczeni fotografowie mają duże problemy. Z tego powodu niezwykle ważnym jest by uczyć się retuszu od odpowiednich osób i w odpowiedni sposób.
Ja nazywam się Marcin Mikus. Jestem profesjonalnym retuszerem specializujacym się w modzie, beauty oraz retuszu komercyjnym. Moja praca jest widoczna w takich magazynach jak Vogue, Elle, Numero, l'Officiel i wielu innych. Wiem jak ważne jest by retuszować szybko i niedestruktywnie dlatego jestem najlepszym wyborem jeśli chodzi o naukę retuszu zdjęć studyjnych!
Dla fotografów:
Poza retuszem ja sam jestem entuzjasta fotografii, dlatego rozumiem czasochłonnym process=em jest organizacja sesji i wyboru zdjęć. Poza tym retusz i dostarczenie zdjęć. Wiem co to znaczy by retuszować wydajnie, a zarazem zachować najwyższa jakość zdjęć co jest tak niezwykle ważne w dzisiejszej pracy.
Nauczę Ciebie w jaki sposób wywoływać pliki Raw, a następnie jak oczyścić skórę w photoshopie - szybko i naturalnie. Nauczę Ciebie techniki retuszu Dodge & Burn w specialnie przygotowanych lekcjach treningowych dzięki czemu zaoszczędzisz mnóstwo czasu w przyszłej pracy z technika Dodge & Burn.
Poza samym retuszem rozumiesz w jaki sposób działaja światła i cienie co pozwoli na dokładne dopasowanie kontrasów i kolorów na zdjęciu, niezależnie czy sa to tony skóry czy tło. Pokażę Tobie w jaki sposób pracować selektywnie przy użyciu masek!
Dla retuszerów:
Sam nim jestem! Zajmuję się retuszem od wielu lat i pracowałem z czołowymi fotografami modowymi. Wiem w jaki sposób wyglada praca retuszera od środka, wiem czego oczekuja marki modowe, agencje czy magazyny. Nauczę Ciebie wszystkiego co potrzebujesz by pracować jako retuszer!
Tematy poruszane w kursie:
Wywoływanie plików Raw w Camera Raw i w Lightroomie
Lekcje czyszczenia zdjęcia: Retusz skóry, retusz włosów, włosków na ciele, tła, ubrań.

La fotografía con smartphone se ha convertido en una herramienta más para el fotógrafo actual y, a pesar de que existen muchos debates sobre si la fotografía con smartphone es o no fotografía, para el equipo de ENUNDOSPOR3 si lo es, porque para nosotros le damos mucha importancia a la esencia de la escena, sea con un smartphone o una cámara profesional y como siempre lo hemos dicho lo importante es que a ti te guste lo que tomas con tu cámara.
La fotografía con smartphone ha venido para quedarse no solo porque es probablemente la cámara que más utilizamos los fotógrafos de todos los niveles, sino porque las cámaras son cada vez mejores su versatilidad, portabilidad e inmediatez nos tiene atrapados y va a seguir siendo así por lo menos una larga temporada.
Por ello hemos querido dedicarle a la fotografía con smartphone nuestro curso porque estamos seguros de que te ayudará. Te enseñaremos algunos tips, de como puedes sacar tus fotografías, como editarlas, algunos hacks para tus redes sociales, etc.
Al final del curso adquirirás habilidades y conocimientos que te permitirán fotografiar de una manera práctica, dinámica y útil. Así que no esperes más y vayamos aprender ENUNDOSPOR3.

courses.title: Adobe Lightroom Classic - Beginner Level
courses.bio: Learn all the basics, from importing and organizing to developing and exporting of images in Adobe Lightroom Classic.
objectives: Import existing images and copy new ones into Lightroom.
Organize your Lightroom folders so that you always know exactly where all your photos are.
Master workflow in both the Library and Develop modules.
Turn good images into excellent ones by processing them correctly.
Export RAW files to print perfectly or show up beautifully on social media.
requirements: You need a fast computer or laptop that starts easily and opens programs without unnecessarily long delays. It can be Windows or Mac.
You need Adobe Lightroom Classic installed on your computer or laptop.
You need an external hard drive (at least 1TB) without any files on it (new or newly formatted).
You need a notepad and pen.
courses.description:
<< One of six digital photography courses by Villiers Steyn >>
UPDATED in November 2021!
<< IMPORTANT NOTICE: Adobe dropped the "CC" from their software names, so "Lightroom CC" is now simply "Lightroom" and "Lightroom Classic CC" is now known as "Lightroom Classic" only! >>


Adobe Lightroom Classic is by far the best image viewing-, sorting- and editing software available to photographers, and there's no better person than seasoned professional photographer, Villiers Steyn, to teach you how it works. It acts as a one-stop-shop for amateur and professional photographers, overcoming the need to jump between older viewing programs like Adobe Bridge and Photoshop.
Even though it's a very user-friendly program, Lightroom Classic can be intimidating to first-time users who don't understand exactly how the software 'communicates' with their computer and hard drives, where their photos are stored. And that's how this course was born: To help beginners who are new to Lightroom Classic to completely understand it right from the start, making their lives a million times easier in the long run...
What is Adobe Lightroom Classic and how does it differ from normal Lightroom?
It's VERY important that you don't get confused by the two! Lightroom Classic, covered in this course, is a program that is used by photographers to view, sort, process and export their images for use elsewhere. Normal Lightroom is a cloud-based sharing program that then shares those exported files (or any other photos for that matter), between your devices - your computer, tablet and smartphone. Normal Lightroom is not covered in this course.
SO WHAT WILL YOU LEARN FROM THIS COURSE?
The exact difference between Lightroom and Lightroom Classic.
How Lightroom and your computer 'communicates' with each other.
How to keep your computer as 'fast' as possible by saving space on its built-in hard drive.
How to import existing photos and copy new photos into Lightroom.
How to organize your image folders in the Library Module by moving and renaming images and folders.
How to view your photos as thumbnails, single images, full screen and zoomed in.
How to quickly learn more about each image by viewing important metadata, like settings and equipment used, at the press of a button.
How to assign attributes like flags, star ratings and colors to images, helping you to filter for specific subsets.
How to do the most important basic editing in the Develop Module, including:
Cropping;
White balance changes;
Exposure corrections;
Image saturation;
Image sharpening; and
Spot-removal.
How to export RAW files for social media or print use.
How to use shortcut keys to greatly improve your Lightroom workflow.


Take a moment to view the course Promo Video, as well as those lectures that have been made available as a sample of what you can expect.
Keep in mind, if you're not happy with the material, there's a 30-day no-questions-asked full money back guarantee! So don't hesitate and enroll today, and take the first step towards mastering Adobe Lightroom Classic!


What makes Villiers Steyn the perfect teacher for this course?
Villiers Steyn is a professional photographer and Udemy instructor with thousands of students enrolled in his Udemy photography courses. He has used Lightroom since it was first launched in 2007 and knows the software inside-out! He's got a knack for transforming the seemingly complicated into something easily understandable, making him the ideal teacher for beginners. This is what one of his students had to say:
“Villiers is an excellent instructor! He explains everything perfectly and his lectures are very easy to follow..."
Louise Victor – South Africa
target_audience: This course is for amateur and professional photographers that have never used Adobe Lightroom Classic and would like to learn the basics of: 1) Importing images; 2) Sorting images; 3) Viewing images; 4) Processing images and 5) Exporting images in Lightroom.

courses.description:
Award winning instructor, camera guru & professional wedding photographer Michael Andrew takes us on a step-by-step tour of the Olympus EM1ii in this training tutorial download video. Michael Andrew’s unique approach simplifies digital photography and shows students how to use simple techniques to take amazing photographs. Michael blends technical competence with artistic fundamentals in this truly unique training video.


When Michael started in 2003, before the youtube age, he learned by trial and error. It took him 2 years to fully master his camera. In 2008, after many years of shooting weddings, Michael was convinced he could develop a teaching system to help new students learn their cameras over a weekend. He's been teaching new photographers ever since! Michael's unique approach focuses on simplicity, clarity, and synthesis, which has helped thousands of beginning students learn their cameras in just a few hours.
If you own an Olympus EM1ii and are looking to improve your photographic skills or aren’t exactly sure how everything works….this is the tutorial for you!

courses.title: Mastering Adobe Lightroom - A Guide to Photo Editing
courses.bio: Learn all the basics, from importing and organizing to developing and exporting of images in Adobe Lightroom.
objectives: You will be able to make your photos look better than ever.
Fix basic issues like exposure, white balance and crop.
Know exactly where to start your editing process.
Use sharpening and noise reduction to make your photos look better.
Use and create your own Lightroom presets to speed up your editing.
Export high quality photos perfect for printing or posting online.
requirements: No experience needed, we will teach you everything you need to know.
You will need the Lightroom Classic application to follow along.
courses.description:
Welcome to "Mastering Adobe Lightroom - A Comprehensive Guide to Photo Editing" Are you ready to take your photography skills to the next level? Whether you're a beginner just starting out or an experienced photographer looking to enhance your editing skills, this course is designed to help you unlock the full potential of Adobe Lightroom.
In this course, we'll cover everything you need to know to become proficient in Lightroom. From the basics of importing and organizing your photos to advanced editing techniques, we've got you covered. But what sets this course apart is our hands-on approach – we won't just tell you how to edit photos, we'll show you.
Throughout the course, we'll be working with real-life examples, demonstrating each concept through practical editing sessions. You'll learn how to enhance colors, adjust exposure, sharpen details, and much more, all while following along with our step-by-step guidance.
Here's a glimpse of what you'll learn
Getting Started with Lightroom: We'll start by familiarizing ourselves with the Lightroom interface and understanding its various modules.
Importing and Organizing Photos: Learn how to import your photos into Lightroom and organize them effectively using keywords, tags, and collections.
Basic Editing Techniques: Master the essentials of photo editing, including adjusting exposure, contrast, white balance, and cropping.
Advanced Editing Tools: Dive deeper into Lightroom's advanced editing tools, such as gradient filters, radial filters, and adjustment brushes.
Creative Editing: Discover how to add artistic effects, create stunning black and white images, and apply presets to streamline your workflow.
Exporting and Sharing: Learn how to export your edited photos in different formats and sizes, as well as how to share them on social media or print them for display.
By the end of this course, you'll have the skills and confidence to tackle any editing project with Adobe Lightroom. Whether you're editing portraits, landscapes, or any other type of photography, you'll have the knowledge and techniques to make your images truly stand out.
target_audience: People new to photo editing software and photography in general. We’ll start right at the beginning and work our way through step by step.
Photographers looking to learn photo editing application used by professional photographers.
Photographers that want to learn all aspects of Lightroom .

courses.description:
This Drone Operating App - DJI GO 4 workshop describes the variety of functions and settings within the DJI GO 4  App for drone operation, which can be used as a remote controller connection with a mobile device for the DJI Spark and Mavic AiR or Mavic Pro or in connection with a Remote Controller for the DJI Spark, Mavic AiR, Phantom 4 Series, Inspire , Mavic 2 or Mavic Pro.
Overall, the Application DJI GO is the gateway to your drone’s settings, so it’s essential to understand what the settings do and how do  they work.
Please, be aware, that this DJI GO 4 workshop is based on the Phantom 4 Pro, Mavic, Spark, and Inspire 2.
Due to various functions of the drone, some of the screenshots of DJI GO 4 show settings that are available to specific aircrafts only.
target_audience: The course is designed for newbies, who want to start their adventure in the world of drones.
The ones who bought a drone and have not idea how to operate it properly and safely.

The course is not for very experienced drone operators, we designate it for beginners.

objectives: Overview of photo editing basics and the tools needed to edit photos in Adobe Photoshop
In-depth analysis of Kim Kardashian's Instagram feed and the specific elements that make her photos stand out
Use of color, lighting, and composition, and how to replicate these techniques in our own photos.

how to import a preset in lightroom and photoshop

requirements: basic knowledge of photoshop and photoshop installed in your system, class is very briefed and simple so even zero knowledge you can learn it
courses.description:
If you want to take your photo editing skills to the next level, you might be interested in learning how to edit pictures like Kim Kardashian's Instagram in Adobe Photoshop. This course will provide you with the tools and techniques needed to create polished, high-end images, and custom presets to achieve a similar style to Kim Kardashian's Instagram.
In this course, we will start with an overview of photo editing basics and the tools needed to edit photos in Adobe Photoshop. We will then move on to a more in-depth analysis of Kim Kardashian's Instagram feed and the specific elements that make her photos stand out. We will explore her use of color, lighting, and composition, and how to replicate these techniques in our own photos.
You will learn,
Identify Colour, style and moods
Edit the hue, saturation, and lightness of individual colors.
Adobe camera raw
Photo editing
Presets & specific photo style
Body features editing
Fashion photo editing
3 different Kim editing styles
introduction of adobe camera raw
One of the most important aspects of Kim Kardashian's Instagram feed is her consistent use of presets and filters to create a cohesive and polished look. In this course, we will learn how to create our own presets and filters in Adobe Photoshop, which will help us achieve a similar style to Kim Kardashian's Instagram. We will explore different presets and filters that can be used to achieve different looks, and we will learn how to modify these presets to suit our own preferences.
In addition to presets and filters, we will also explore other editing techniques such as adjusting exposure, saturation, and contrast. We will learn how to use layer masks and adjustment layers to make precise edits to our photos. We will also explore how to use blending modes to create unique and interesting effects.
Once we have covered the basics of photo editing and have explored Kim Kardashian's Instagram style, we will move on to a series of practical exercises. These exercises will allow you to put your new editing skills to use and create your own polished, high-end images. You will be able to work on your own images and receive feedback from the instructor and other students in the course.
By the end of this course, you will have the knowledge and skills needed to edit pictures like Kim Kardashian's Instagram in Adobe Photoshop. You will be able to create your own custom presets and filters and use them to achieve a similar style to Kim Kardashian's Instagram. You will also have a thorough understanding of the basic editing techniques needed to create polished, high-end images.
This course is suitable for both beginners and those with some photo editing experience. If you want to take your photo editing skills to the next level and achieve a similar style to Kim Kardashian's Instagram, this course is for you. With the practical exercises and personalized feedback provided in the course, you will be able to improve your editing skills and create beautiful, high-end images.
target_audience: Perfect for Photographers, Designers, and Artists Alike, this Course Will Help You Take Your Skills to the Next Level and Stand Out from the Crowd. Enroll Today and Unlock the Full Potential of Adobe Photoshop!

courses.description:
Everything you need to turn ordinary photos into impressive masterpieces
Whopping 15 Hours of Expert Instruction
More than 120 Individual Video Tutorials
Course starts right at the very beginning
Everything is explained in clear detail
Full coverage of basic functions in Photoshop Elements 14
How to use Photoshop Organizer efficiently
Where to get great content
Printing your photos so they look professional
Working miracles with the Editor
Speeding your projects with Quick Mode
Practical retouching and enhancing techniques
Includes exercise files to practice what you’ve learned
Adobe Photoshop Elements 14 For Beginners
We've all seen amazing photos of models, natural scenes, and events that look absolutely perfect. Somebody will say "It's been Photoshopped!" Now you can have the advanced skills required to use Photoshop Elements 14 like a pro. This big 15 hour course starts right at the very beginning showing you how to download the software and get it going. Then we carefully walk you through each and every step toward becoming a true Photoshop power user. Use these skills for your job, your hobby, or even start a new business.
Many Photoshop courses are designed for people who have some experience using the application. While this course will be very useful to students with experience, it was designed for the person who has never worked with Photoshop before and knows nothing about it.
Contents and Overview
This course starts right at the very beginning with how to get PSE14 and install it. We review what is different in Elements 14 so those who have worked with the previous version can fast forward to the new functions they need to understand. In Chapter 2 you learn start up, the all important keyboard shortcuts that will greatly speed your work, and how to get answers using Help. We also set up your preferences so you can customize PSE 14 for your use.
Next you learn how to use Quick Start. That is the perfect way for the beginner to see impressive results. This includes an exercise where you create a slide show worthy of a professional presentation. Next we learn the many functions of The Organizer including catalogs, media browser, timelines, instant fix, image properties and much more.
We cover Acquiring Content and Printing before getting to the heart of PSE 14: The Editor. This is where you learn how to create a workspace and manipulate your content for desired results. Later we look at editing in Expert Mode. Along the way we study the often used Quick Mode where you can instantly remove red eyes, add effects, textures, frames, and auto smart tone.
As you progress we study Guided Editing where you resize photos and perform guided edits on image properties. Later we work on filters, lighting, adding text, text effects, color effects and much more as we advance through the massive 15 hours of instruction that take you through every detail of Photoshop Elements 14.
What people are saying:
“Excellent course. Well worth the money. The only complaint is that the sound seemed to get very soft sometime. Had to adjust the volume. I would still recommend this course.” -Nancy Hinzmann
“I am familiar with PSE back to version 6, skipping versions, but usually used 8 or 10. So, I thought I'd skip 'basics' and jump along to the editing. Sure glad I didn't do that because I've learned so much more than I 'thought' I already knew - not true, I learned many things I didn't know or wasn't aware of. Only the memory doesn't work so well these senior days, so I'm going back for reviews as needed. Onward! “–Trish Satkofsky
“This course is specific on how to correct issues plus it is easier to understand rather than some of the instruction books that seem to talk above my head.” -Susan Kross
target_audience: This is course is for anyone new to Photoshop Elements or upgrading from an older version of Photoshop Elements.
Hobbyist photographers.

courses.title: Portret - Profesjonalna Foto Edycja w Photoshop
courses.bio: Polska wersja bestsellera "Portrait Photography Masterclass - Photoshop Pro Techniques". Edytuj jak profesjonalisci.
objectives: Staniesz sie ekspertem w zakresie profesjonalnych technik foto edycji w Photoshop
Poznasz sekrety jednego z najbardziej efektywnych narzedzi Photoshop - Krzywych (The Curves)
Nauczysz sie jak pracowac z Maskami i dzieki nim stapiac zastosowane efekty w jedna calosc
Szybko i efektywnie naprawiac typowe bledy w fotografii: plaskie zdjecia, przeswietlone niebo, zbyt ciemne oczy bez wyrazu, niski kontrast, brak wyraznego detalu i tekstury w zdjeciu
Dodac zdjeciom glebi i wyrazu
Zdefiniowac i wyrazic wlasna artystyczna wizje poprzez medium fotografii
Przeprowadzic podstawowy retusz skory przygotowujacy baze do dalszej edycji
Rozjasnic i wyostrzyc oczy modela
Wprowadzic refleksy we wlosach
Modelowac ksztalt twarzy i sylwetki z Filtrem Liquify
Nauczysz sie pracowac w "nie-destruktywny" sposob dzieki Warstwom Korygujacym
Nauczysz sie w kilku krokach wzmacniac wyraz zdjecia przez zastosowanie lokalnych korekt
requirements: Photoshop CC, darmowa wersja probna mozliwa do pobrania ze strony www Adobe jest w zupelnosci wystarczajaca
Uprzednia znajomosc programu Photoshop nie jest konieczna, wszystkie techniki sa szczegolowo wyjasnione
Do kursu dolaczone sa wysokiej jakosci materialy pomocnicze ktore umozliwia Ci natychmiastowe rozpoczecie praktyki!
courses.description:
Portret - Profesjonalna Foto Edycja w Photoshop
Stan sie ekspertem w dziedzinie edycji fotografii portretowej. Poznaj potezne narzedzia programu Photoshop ktorymi posluguja sie profesjonalisci. Zbuduj doskonale portfolio ktore zachwyci Twoich klientow i wyrozni Cie na tle konkurencji.
Ten kurs powstal z mysla o tych z Was ktorzy chcieliby udoskonalic swoje umiejetnosci w ramach edycji zdjec oraz tych poszukujacych swojego wlasnego, niepowtarzalnego stylu w fotografii.
W tym kursie skupimy sie na fotografii portretowej - dowiecie sie jak szybko przeprowadzic retusz zdjecia: usunac niedoskonalosci skory, subtelnie wzmocnic wyraz oczu oraz dodac refleksy we wlosach. W kilka godzin nauczycie sie jak dzieki odpowiedniej edycji - zdjecia plaskie i nieciekawe stana sie przykuwajace oko.

Udostepniam do pobrania 10 wysokiej rozdzielczosci plikow TIFF z ktorymi bedziemy pracowac w trakcie kursu. Umozliwi Wam to natychmiastowy start, bez koniecznosci poszukiwania odpowiednich materialow. Edycje zdjec rozpoczniemy z wersjami oryginalnymi zdjec, a do Waszej dyspozycji sa rowniez osobne, gotowe pliki zawierajace wszystkie edytowalne warstwy Photoshop-a.


W tym kursie prezentuje techniki ktorych nauczylam sie pracujac nad wlasnymi zdjeciami przez ostatnie 10 lat. Jak zawsze dostarczam szczegolowych instrukcji ktore pozwola Wam krok po kroku przesledzic i powtorzyc kreatywny proces w zaciszu wlasnej pracowni.
Poznacie najpotezniejsze i najbardziej efektywne techniki edycji zdjec w Photoshop
Bedziecie pracowac w "nie-destruktywny" sposob ("non-destructive workkflow") z Warstwami Korygujacymi (Adjustment Layers)
Nauczycie sie jak maksymalnie przyspieszyc proces edycji zdjec
Nauczycie sie jak optymalnie wykorzystac jedno z najwazniejszych narzedzi w Photoshop: Krzywe (The Curves Adjustment Layer Tool)
Dowiecie sie w jaki sposob pracujac z Maskami polaczyc w niezauwazalny, "bezszwowy" sposob kilka roznych efektow korygujacych
Nauczycie sie jak pracowac z narzedziem Histogram
Rozwiniecie swoj artystyczny talent i bedziecie w stanie uzyskac swietne rezultaty pracujac z wlasnymi zdjeciami
Dolacz do ponad 70,400 tysiaca studentow z calego swiata ktorzy zaufali Digital Art Classes i ktorzy doskonala swoje umiejetnosci foto edycji z tym kursem, pobierz materialy pomocnicze i zacznij praktykowac z nami juz dzis!
target_audience: Dolacz do tego kursu jesli chcesz poznac lub udoskonalic techniki edycji zdjec w Photoshop
Dolacz do tego kursu jesli jestes ciekaw jak "od kuchni" wyglada praca nad intrygujacymi portretami
Dolacz do tego kursu jesli jestes artysta i pracujesz z tradycyjnym medium i chcialbys poznac techniki cyfrowe
Dolacz do tego kursu jesli chcesz nauczyc sie jak tworzyc wysokiej jakosci zdjecia i sprzedawac je w bankach zdjec online takich jak Shutterstock, Alamy, iStock
Dolacz do tego kursu jesli chcesz rozwinac swoj artystyczny talent w zakresie kreatywnej foto edycji

courses.title: Lightroom the complete course
courses.bio: Master Lightroom software to improve all your photos
objectives: Import photos
Classify photos
Navigation on photo
Share your photos
Add informations
Search photos by informations
Understand the parameters to edit photos
Edit a photo
Improve a photo
Enhance colors
Use linear gradient
Use radial gradient
Make adjustment with brush
Improve landscape photo
Improve portrait photo
requirements: You need to have Lightroom CC on your computer
courses.description:
Lightroom
Lightroom is professional image editing software. It's never been more convenient to edit photos quickly and efficiently than in Lightroom. Lightroom should not be confused with Lightroom CC Classic. Although the two software have a lot of similarities, there are some differences. Lightroom is therefore accessible from any devices like computer, laptop and tablet and allows you to quickly edit and optimize your photos. Saved in the Adobe Cloud, you can start working on an image from a computer and change media at any time since your photos will be stored online in the cloud.


What can you do with Lightroom
- Import and export photos
- Add information to photos
- Use all photo adjustments
- Correct and remove defaults
- Improve exposure
- Improve colors
- Add effects
- Edit your photos on multiple media


Training course
In this training you will see how to use Lightroom. We will see how to use the dashboard, how to import your photos and organize them into albums and folders. We will also see how to classify photos. Then we will work with the main part of photo editing with the different adjustments. So we will see in details how to improve any photos. Finally we will work on different examples.
target_audience: People who want to learn the software
People who want to edit photos
Professional photographer

courses.title: Affinity Photo | Die Grundlagen der Bildbearbeitung
courses.bio: Grundlagen und Workflows zur Bildbearbeitung mit Affinity Photo | Kurz und verständlich erklärt
objectives: Werkzeuge und Arbeitsweisen in Affinity Photo kennenlernen
Raw Fotos entwickeln und bearbeiten
Workflow zur Bearbeitung von verschiedenen Bildern und Kompositionen lernen und verinnerlichen
Richtige Exporteinstellungen für verschiedene Anwendungsbereiche treffen

Projekt 1 - RAW Foto Entwicklung: Tonwertkorrektur bei RAW Fotos + Teal & Orange Look
Werkzeuge für PROJEKT 2: Text Werkzeuge (Arbeiten mit Text in Affinity Photo)
Projekt 2 - Freistellen & Hintergründe a: Ebenen Strukturieren und Effekte mit Transparenz nutzen

requirements: Grundlegendes Verständnis von Fotografie und Bearbeitungsprogrammen
Du lernst alles weitere im Kurs, vor jedem Projekt werden alle Werkzeuge die gebraucht werden erklärt.
courses.description:
Affinity Photo ist eine super Alternative zu anderen Photo Bearbeitungs-Programmen. Es hat viele verschiedene Tools, die einem bei der Bearbeitung von Photos helfen. ABER: Man muss natürlich wissen, wie man diese auch benutzt, um damit zum Ziel zu kommen.




Wir fokussieren uns hier nicht auf einzelne Tools, sondern betrachten die Fotobearbeitung im gesamten. Durch verschiedene Projekte bringe ich euch sowohl die verschiedenen Werkzeuge, aber auch fast noch wichtiger, die richtigen Arbeitsweisen anhand von konkreten Beispielen bei. Damit könnt ihr komplexe Fotobearbeitungs-Aufgaben schnell und zielgerichtet umsetzen und bekommt direkt eine Hilfestellung, wie ein professioneller Workflow aussieht. Das ganze ist in einem kurzen und knackigen Format gehalten, um euch möglichst schnell zur Bearbeitung eigener Bilder zu verhelfen.




Alles, was Ihr für den Kurs braucht, ist Affinity Photo, Zeit und Lust neues zu lernen. Sämtliche Bilder aus den Projekten, welche wir bearbeiten, stehen zum Download bereit. Ihr könnt aber selbstverständlich auch eure eigenen Bilder nehmen und direkt anfangen diese zu bearbeiten. Wichtig ist nur, dass ihr die verschiedenen Projekte gleichzeitig mit mir bearbeitet, denn dadurch festigen sich sowohl die Kenntnisse über das Arbeiten mit den verschiedenen Werkzeugen, aber auch die Arbeitsweisen. Dadurch werdet ihr deutlich schneller eure eigenen Projekte auch ohne Kurse/Tutorials bearbeiten können.




Am Ende dieses Kurses wisst ihr, wie man RAW Fotos mit Affinity Photo entwickelt, Himmel austauscht, Personen/Objekte ausschneidet, mit Texten arbeitet und habt im Allgemeinen ein sehr umfangreiches Grundverständnis mit dem ihr Selbstständig in Affinity Photo arbeiten könnt.


Wichtig: Dieser Kurs ist für Affinity Photo. Ein Kurs für Affinity Photo 2 wird im Herbst 2023 folgen.
target_audience: Beginner und Fortgeschrittene, die mit Affinity Photo Bilder bearbeiten möchten.
Fortgeschrittene, die bestimmte Funktionen wirklich verstehen möchten.

objectives: Aprenderás conceptos básicos y avanzados de diseño gráfico digital con Photoshop CC
Configurar y ajustar profesionalmente los colores.
Crear selecciones, máscaras y siluetas avanzadas y complejas.

Recortar, rotar y manejo de perspectiva usando objetos inteligentes.
Crear y manipular Smart Objects para realizar transformaciones y ajustes no destructivos.
Modificar profesionalmente las imágenes a nivel avanzado.
Crear efectos especiales usando Modos de fusión o Blending modes.
Mediante sencillas prácticas y ejemplos comprenderás el funcionamiento de las herramientas de Photoshop CC.
Podrás identificar, afrontar y resolver retos de diseño digital tanto de proyectos personales como profesionales de distintas áreas.

Dominio básico del sistema operativo Mac o Windows
courses.description:
Aprende todo sobre Adobe Photoshop cc desde cero y domina el mejor software de tratamiento, retoque y creación de imágenes digitales del mercado, con nosotros pasaras de ser un novato o experimentado a todo un experto.


¡Aprende Adobe Photoshop CC desde cero en este nuevo curso!


La dificultad más grande para el estudiante promedio de software profesional como en este caso Adobe PhotoShop CC es poder asimilar los conceptos más básicos para ir avanzando poco a poco con confianza y dominio de la herramienta. La buena noticia es que lo sabemos y lo tenemos cubierto en este mega curso.


El curso es muy completo ya que está orientado a personas con cero conocimiento en el área, hasta llegar a niveles avanzados para expertos, todo explicado y demostrado paso a paso.
Has encontrado el curso perfecto para aprender Photoshop. No importa si no tiene experiencia en absoluto, este curso fue diseñado para enseñarle Photoshop de la manera más elemental posible hasta nivele experto.


No solo eso, sino que este curso también está diseñado para personas que ya conocen algo de Photoshop y solo necesitan ayuda con una herramienta o función específica, ¡puedes pasar directamente a ese tema o herramienta de tu interés!


Adobe Photoshop CC es útil para muchas carreras, industrias y pasatiempos. No importa si se trata de fotografía, diseño gráfico, diseño web, redes sociales, diseño de interfaz de usuario, publicidad, pintura, impresión o video / animación. ¡Este curso cubrirá herramientas que se pueden usar en cualquier nicho!


Las profesiones digitales se han convertido en las profesiones más demandadas en los últimos años, pero debido a la pandemia del año 2020 es BRUTAL la DEMANDA de profesionales digitales, son muchas las empresas que han tenido que adaptarse al Teletrabajo en un tiempo récord, según el Banco Mundial.


He creado este curso con mucha pasión e interés de ayudar a personas a emprender desde su casa y generar importantes ingresos en estos tiempos tan inciertos, aprovechando esta gran oportunidad de ser Diseñador gráfico.


Comienza ya!
target_audience: Fotógrafos.
Diseñadores gráficos.
Diseñadores web.
Personas sin conocimientos previos de Photoshop o con conocimientos básicos.
Personas que quieran fundamentar claramente sus conocimientos previos de Photoshop CC.
Cualquier persona que quiera dominar las herramientas y opciones de Photoshop CC desde sus conceptos fundamentales hasta los más avanzados.

courses.description:
Learn the Basics of Photoshop Even If You Have Never Used Photoshop Before!
This course has been created for photographers who want to learn Photoshop but don't want to waste their time in learning anything that is not essential for a Photographer. This is where other Photoshop courses go wrong. They teach too many things which don't really help a photographer.
In this course, I've kept the focus on teaching those tools and functions in Photoshop that make a huge difference to photographers and are used frequently.
You'll be able to perform color, exposure and transformational editing to your shots and take your photography to a completely new level.
I've also provided work-along images for each video so you can actually practice the techniques as you watch the video.
You'll be learning things like:
Using the Color and Exposure Editing to Change Your Images Dramatically
Using Selection Tools to Select, Delete and Replace Certain Sections in an Image
Using Tools to Remove Distractions Like People, Wires, Objects, etc.
Using Tools to Smoothen and Beautify the Skin in Portraits
Use Tools to Cut Out and Replace Backgrounds in Complex Subjects
Using the Technique of Dodge and Burning and Sharpening Tools to Make Shots More Dramatic
And so much more.

objectives: Discover how to edit and retouch your photos, like a pro, with Photoshop
37+ hours of Photoshop tutorials (recorded at 1080HD) already included - for both beginners and advanced users!
Photoshop - Learn how to edit like a pro. You'll learn how to use ALL retouching tools for awesome photos.
