courses.title: Business & Marketing Strategy for Real Estate Photographers
courses.bio: How to develop a business strategy and marketing plan for your real estate photography business.
objectives: How to identify your customer, perform market research and test your services.
How to price your products and services.
Digital and direct marketing strategies to grow your business.
How to conduct a simple competitive analysis.
Trends and seasonal factors in the business of real estate photography.
Developing your business structure & and financial plans.
Business opportunities (once established).
requirements: A computer, smartphone or tablet to access the course.
courses.description:
Business & Marketing Strategy for Real Estate Photographers
This course provides a blueprint for setting up and growing your real estate photography business through an effective business strategy and development of an effective marketing plan. The course has been divided into several modules to cover the most important aspects of the business.


Market Overview
Lectures one and two discuss how under and oversupply of properties in the real estate market influence the demand for real estate photography services. You will also learn how to define your market and understand how to establish your share of the market.
Client Profile
Lecture three covers, in detail, how to develop a strong understanding of your client profile and how their budget, values, and personal and company values affect their decision to use your services.
Market Research & Testing
Market research and testing are explained in lectures 4 and 5, where you will learn how to develop a market research survey, test your photography services, and perform a competitive analysis using the template provided.
Service Development & Pricing Strategy
Lectures 6 and 7 will explain how to develop your service offering and establish your pricing strategy using the resources collected in the previous lecture.
An overview of how to develop your portfolio is covered in lecture eight along with how to present your images to potential clients through a website for your business.
Digital & Direct Marketing Strategies
A comprehensive list of digital and direct marketing strategies are provided in lectures 9 and 10 to assist you in reaching out to potential clients for your business.
Business Structure & Finance
Lecture 11 provides an overview of how to set up your business structure, and in Lecture 12 you will be provided tips on funding your business, in addition to a brief overview of the financial components needed to complete the financial plan templates.
Business Opportunities
The final part of the course outlines potential opportunities to explore after your business is established, such as hiring staff and contractors, new product development, and business acquisitions.
Included Templates and Resources
The course includes several free templates to help with market research, financial planning, and marketing activities;
Market Survey
Competitor Analysis
Marketing Action Plan
Financial Plans
The course is delivered in slide-show format to make it easier for students to refer back to certain lectures in the future at different stages of their business growth. Please preview the course samples before enrolling in the course to see if the delivery style suits your desired method of learning.  The lectures are delivered at a slow, comfortable pace, however, feel free to speed up or slow-down the instructor’s voice to go at your own speed.
Please note this course focuses on the business and marketing aspects of a real estate photography business. If you wish to learn about real estate photography techniques and workflow practices, please refer to our first course in this series; The Real Estate Photography Masterclass.
Why Learn From Us?
The course producer; Steven Ungermann, is a professional real estate photographer and founder of multiple businesses in the fields of property marketing and proptech. Recent accolades include being listed in the Anthill 30 under 30 list and being named a finalist in the Broadcasting & Television 30u30 Awards and the Australian Small Business Champion Awards.
He started his real estate photography business in 2009 while studying at university and grew it into a 6-figure company servicing some of the world’s largest commercial and residential real estate franchises in addition to boutique agencies and property developers. In 2019 he founded Haus Photo Media, to provide photographers with educational resources such as this course, to help start and grow their own real estate photography business.
target_audience: Entrepreneurs interested in starting a real estate photography business.
Real estate photographers who want to learn how to grow their business.
Established photographers interested in transitioning into real estate photography
Real estate photographers who need to develop or improve their marketing plan and business strategy.

courses.description:

Shooting Menu - features that affect the video capture process
Setup Menu
Retouching Menu

This class focuses specifically on the camera and its features. We will cover buttons on the body of the camera as well as options in the camera's menu. This is not an intro to photography or video class.
That being said, a knowledge of basic photography principals is great to have, but not absolutely necessary to taking this course. It is important to note that this class is specific to the Nikon D series cameras.

courses.title: Affinity Photo-Tutorial – Grundlagen
courses.bio: Ein Training – alle Grundlagen! Danach beherrscht du perfekt die Photoshop-Alternative. Dein Trainer: Marco Kolditz
objectives: Umfassendes Affinity Photo-Tutorial zum Einstieg in die Bildbearbeitung und in das Programm
Einführung: Verschaffe dir einen Überblick über Arbeitsoberfläche und Einstellungen.
Ebenen: Was sind Ebenen, welche Arten gibt es und wie arbeitest du mit ihnen?
Werkzeuge: Jedes einzelne Werkzeug wird vorgestellt und dessen Anwendung erklärt.
Anpassungsebenen: Erfahre, wie sich Tonwertkorrektur, Weißabgleich und Co auswirken.
Typische Methoden der Bildbearbeitung: Wende das Gelernte direkt praktisch an.
Grundlagen: In über 11 Stunden von Marco Kolditz Schritt für Schritt auf den Punkt gebracht
Neue Funktionen von Affinity 2.0 kurz und bündig erklärt

Einführung: 1.1 | Was ist Affinity Photo – Pixel vs. Vektor
Updates: Alle neuen Funktionen von Affinity Photo 2.0

requirements: Dieses Video-Tutorial eignet sich hervorragend zum Einstieg in die Bildbearbeitung allgemein und zur Anwendung von Affinity Photo im Speziellen.
courses.description:
Dein Trainer: Marco Kolditz (MEER DER IDEEN)


Ein Training – alle Grundlagen! Dieses Tutorial ist der perfekte Ausgangspunkt für deinen gelingenden Start in die Welt der Bildbearbeitung mit Affinity Photo.
Affinity Photo ist ein Programm zur Foto- und Bildbearbeitung aus dem Hause Serif. Du bist hier richtig, wenn du den Umgang mit der Software von Grund auf lernen möchtest. Am Ende des über 11-stündigen Video-Tutorials findest du dich in Affinity Photo zurecht, du kennst alle wichtigen Werkzeuge und Funktionen, außerdem bist du bereits erste Schritte in Richtung Bildbearbeitung gegangen – genau das passende Rüstzeug, damit du künftig deine eigenen Bilder, Fotos und Bildkompositionen bearbeiten kannst.


Die Grundlagen – perfekt für deinen Einstieg: Pixel und Ebenen
Trainer Marco Kolditz setzt für dich bei den Grundlagen an, um dich im Verlaufe des Tutorials zu ersten eigenen Bildbearbeitungen zu motivieren. Los geht’s in Affinity Photo mit der Bedienoberfläche, zielführenden Voreinstellungen sowie einem Überblick über die Arbeitsbereiche, den sogenannten Personas. Du lernst, Bilder ins Programm zu laden, mit dem Raster zu arbeiten und deine Werke sinnvoll zu exportieren. Besonders wichtig: Erfahre alles über den Umgang mit Ebenen. Was hat es mit ihnen auf sich? Wie funktioniert das Ebenen-Prinzip von Affinity Photo? Welche verschiedenen Ebenen-Arten gibt es und wozu benötigst du sie? – Antworten erhältst du im Tutorial.


Werkzeuge und Anpassungsebenen – wozu du sie brauchst und wie du sie nutzt
Zur Bildbearbeitung stehen dir in der Software eine Unmenge an Werkzeugen sowie Anpassungsebenen zur Verfügung. Das Affinity Photo-Tutorial dient dir als Wegweiser durch die schier endlosen Möglichkeiten: Zu jedem Werkzeug erfährst du, wozu du es benötigst und wie du es anwendest. Dasselbe gilt für die zahlreichen Anpassungsebenen. Ob Farbpipette, Klonen, Zeichenstift oder Pixel-Werkzeug, ob Tonwertkorrektur, Gradationskurven oder Split Toning – nach dem Tutorial kennst du dich aus und du weißt, wann du auf welche Funktion zurückgreifen solltest.


Affinity Photo-Praxis – weil Selbermachen zu Können und Kenntnis führt
Mit den Affinity Photo-Grundlagen im Gepäck startest du direkt durch: Marco Kolditz zeigt dir typische, immer wieder benötigte Methoden der Bildbearbeitung. So wirst du unter anderem ein Profilfoto zur Anwendung im Web optimieren, eine Schwarz-Weiß-Umwandlung durchführen, den Kontrast anpassen oder die Perspektive korrigieren. Hast du das Tutorial einmal durchgespielt, kannst du deine Kenntnisse bei uns anschließend weiter vertiefen und zum Beispiel lernen, wie du in Affinity Photo eine Retusche durchführst, Bildelemente freistellst oder Overlays kreativ anwendest.
target_audience: Werkzeug für Werkzeug und Ebene für Ebene erläutert dir Marco Kolditz in über 11 Stunden, wozu die Programmfunktionen dienen und wie du sie nutzt. Grundlagen plus Praxis!

courses.description:
Hola, soy Juan Pablo Aquila, Licenciado en Comunicación y fotógrafo especializado en bodas y sesiones.


Estoy muy contento de traerte este curso que finalmente me decidí a dar donde revelo todos mis secretos:


En este curso avanzado, concretamente, vamos a:


- Editar de forma precisa fotografías al estilo Ruso, sin salir de Cámera Raw (o Lightroom) y en menos de cuatro minutos por imagen. Es decir, no utilizaremos Photoshop en absoluto.
- Aprenderemos las herramientas de revelado puntual para llevar a cabo nuestra meta.
- Editaremos Sesiones (niños, quinceañeras, novios), Bodas diurnas y Nocturnas.


Nunca te vas a imaginar, que en tan poquito tiempo y sin tocar photoshop, puedas dejar las imágenes como aquí aprenderemos. Mira el trailer y ve realmente las fotos que haremos, son increibles; y respecto a que las haremos en menos de 4 minutos...  ¡Es literal!
Con mi técnica, que te enseñaré paso a paso,  harás en bastante menos tiempo que cuatro minutos cada imagen con ese mismo resultado.  GARANTIZADO.


Es MUY importante que hayas hecho el curso Nivel inicial que he dado, o bien, que ya dominas lo básico en cuanto a revelado. Sería ideal que ya tengas dominado el uso de luz (histograma) y Color en revelado, al igual que los distintos módulos de ajustes globales que tanto Lightroom como Camera Raw disponen. Si no lo haces, te recuerdo que todos estos conceptos los puedes adquirir en el curso básico que he subido a esta misma plataforma.


¡Te esper@, y Bienvenid@!


Lic. Juan Pablo Aquila
target_audience: Personas que hayan finalizado el curso básico que os he dado.
Cualquier estudiante o fotógrafo aficionado o profesional, que se desarrolle o quiera desarrollarse en el ámbito de bodas y sesiones fotográficas.

courses.bio: Fast, Easy, and Customizable Editing
objectives: How to use Looks for editing your Images.
How to edit portraits with AI tools.

How to replace boring skies with more interesting skies.

requirements: You should have photos you want to edit.
courses.description:
This course will show you how to use the power AI tools that will allow you to edit images faster and easier than ever before.  In this course you will see how using Looks can dramatically speed up your image editing time.  Plus you will be able to do things like replacing a sky or portrait retouching that would be very hard to learn to do in Photoshop.  Luminar AI takes you from a beginer to an advanced image editor in no time.
In this course, you will learn how to organize your photos.  Edit photos with AI tools and edit them with more manual tools. Take advantage of a large library of preset Looks and specialized tools that allow you to add special effects like fog, flares, skies, textures, and other photo objects.  This course also has assignments so you can practice what you've learned right after you learn it.  This software offers:
More Possibilities. Innovative technologies give a whole new world of possibilities to express your ideas.
Less Routine. AI deals with the boring tasks so you can focus on your creative story.
No Learning Barrier. Whether you’ve been a photographer for 20 years or 20 seconds, you’ll get awesome results right from the start.
This course will show you how to use:
Body AI
Iris AI
Face AI
Skin AI
Accent AI
Bokeh AI
Atmosphere AI
Structure AI
Sky AI
Color Harmony
Contrast
Mood
Augmented Sky AI
Composition AI
and much more!
target_audience: Photographers who want an easy an fast way to do impressive edits to their images.

courses.description:
Start editing your own photos with one of the best PC and Mac photo editing software out there, PhotoDirector!
If you're looking for a easy photo editing application that will allow you to edit professional quality photos, Cyberlink's PhotoDirector is a great tool. This course will teach you everything you need to know to get started editing.
Learn the NEW PhotoDirector 8 Features:
Use the Video Snapshot tool to create face swap, multi-exposure, and panoramas from your videos
Use the Express Project tool to instantly stylize your photos
Use the new overlay, blending, color splash, and blur tools to make modern and professional photos
Make photos look the way you envision - better! If you want to crop, white balance, adjust contrast, add effects, and share better photos than ever, this is the course for you.
Here are the main topics in this course:
Easily import and organize photos in PhotoDirector
Crop and rotate your photos
Apply one-click presets
Correct white balance
Adjust tone, add HDR effects, change contrast
Apply edits to only certain parts of your photos
'Beautify' people with teeth whitening, eye brightening, wrinkle removing, and body shaping
Remove unwanted objects in your photos
Merge photos, create panoramas, and face swap to get the best smile
Add custom watermarks to your photos
Create slideshows out of your photos
Publish photos easily to Facebook and Flickr
Export high quality files for sharing and printing
Why is this the course that will make you successful?
Taking online courses isn't easy. It takes work and action. This course will help you succeed with concrete practice lessons. We'll walk you through each exercise. By the end of the course, you'll have a fully edited video montage that you can share with the world.
Who teaches this course?
Phil Ebiner is a professional photographer and video creator who has edited thousands of photos. His photos have won international contests, sold in art galleries, and captured stories around the world. Phil strives to teach students not only the technical skills of a photo editor with this course, but also the philosophy of photo editing. You'll love learning from Phil like thousands of other Udemy students.
Are you ready to edit professional-looking photos?
With our 30-day 100% money back guarantee, there is nothing holding you back from jumping in right now and trying the course out.
Go ahead and click the enroll button, and I'll see you in lesson 1!
Cheers,
Phil
target_audience: Photographers who want to make their photos better.
PC or Mac users who need a professional photo editing software to edit great photos.

courses.title: Krzywe w Photoshop - Kompletny Kurs Od Zera Do Pro!
courses.bio: Naucz się najefektywniejszego narzędzia w Photoshop - Krzywych - Procesuj i Edytuj Zdjęcia od Początku do końca!
objectives: Nauczysz sie pracowac z krzywymi
Nauczysz sie edytowac zdjecia w niedestruktywny sposob
Nauczysz sie pracy z cieniami, swiatlami i kontrastami
Zrozumiem teorie kolorow
Nauczysz sie Pracowac z Kolorami
Poznasz prace z maskami - od zeraz do profesjonalisty
Nauczysz sie selektywnie pracowac ze zdjeciem
Nauczysz sie profesjonalnego retuszu
requirements: Potrzebujesz komputera i oczywiscie programu Photoshop
courses.description:
Dlaczgo Krzywe? Dlaczego zdecydowalem sie zrobic kurs o tej jednej warstwie dopasowan. Jaka jest przewaga krzywych porownujac je na przyklad do poziomow czy innych ustawien w photoshopie.
Jeśli chodzi o dostosowywanie kontrastow, tonów i cieni- nie ma nic bardziej wydajnego niz krzywe. Daja ci one niesamowita kontrole nad dopasowywaniem cieni, swiatel, kontrastow, jasnosci i kolorow w photoshopie. I co w tym wszystkim jest najlepsze! - Jesli nauczysz sie uzywac krzywych w odpowiedni sposo, pozwoli ci to orobic i retuszowac cale zdjecie od poczatku do konca.
Jesli nie wiesz jak to zrobic, lub jestes kims kto chce poznac photoshop i retusz lepiej - Ja jestemtutaj by pomoc i dac wszystko najlepsze co mam do zaoferowania.
W ciagu kilku godzin nauczysz sie wszystiego co musisz wiedziec o krzywych. Nie przejmuj sie jesli jestes poczatkujacym - zaczniemy prosto! Zrobimy sobie dokladna analize podstawowych krokow przez rozne tematy w kilku osobbnych sekcjach.
Porozmawiamy o teorii wystarczajaco bys byl pewny siebie w tym co robisz. Jesli chodzi o praktyczne rzeczy - Bedziesz wiedzial wszystko o cieniech, swiatlach kontrastkach, kolorach, tonowaniu, naprawie tonow, naprawie ekspozycji i pracy z odpowiednimi trybami mieszania! Nauczysz sie jak pracowac efektywnie z maskami by iec pelna kontrole nad karzda czescia zdjecia. I w koncu - nauczysz sie jak retuszowac z krzywymi! Od poczatku do konca - nie wazne czy pracujesz ze zdjeciami studyjnymi czy poza studiem!
Do zobaczenia w pierwszej lekcji!
target_audience: Fotografowie
Osoby ktore chca zaczac z Photoshopem
Kazdy kto chce poszerzyc wiedze o krzywych w Photoshopie
Poczatkujacy Retuszerzy
Kazdy kto chce lepiej rozumiec photoshop i jego narzedzia

courses.description:
课程二合一——Lightroom Classic CC + Lightroom CC！
你想让你的照片看起来更好……更令人赞叹吗？
您想学习专业摄影师使用的世界上最强大、最高效的编辑应用程序吗？
如果是这样，那么你来对地方了——我也很高兴你能来这里！
从今天开始，在Adobe Lightroom Classic CC（旧称Lightroom CC）和全新的基于云的Lightroom CC应用程序中编辑照片吧！
也许你是一位业余摄影师，曾接触过图像编辑，也许你有丰富的照片编辑经验。无论怎样，这门课程都能帮助您让照片变得更有内容、更有内涵。
这个Lightroom CC课程的主要课题：
熟悉Adobe Lightroom Classic CC和Lightroom CC应用程序的界面
导入和整理照片
修复白平衡、裁剪和曝光
色调、饱和度和亮度调整
锐化和降噪
晕影、颗粒、去除薄雾效果
使用和创建预设
镜头校正
去除瑕疵
渐变、径向和笔刷调整
改善人物肖像和照片
导出照片和添加水印
以及如何在Lightroom CC中完成以上所有操作！
还有更多！
用Adobe Lightroom让您的照片看起来更好 – 掌握修复曝光、白平衡、裁剪和旋转等基本技能。
使用Adobe Lightroom将您的照片提升到一个新的水平 - 本地化调整、锐化和消除噪音、添加效果、晕影等。
本课程包含十几个完整的编辑流程，您可以跟着我们从头到尾操作一遍。这些课程非常适合学习专业编辑使用的所有技能，使照片看起来更棒！
您将会在本次Adobe Lightroom课程中得到什么？
易于理解的视频教程
可供下载的项目文件
讲师的全力支持
这门Adobe Lightroom课程适合谁？
无论您使用的是Lightroom Classic CC还是旧版本的Lightroom，还是新的基于云的Lightroom CC应用程序，本课程都将教您如何充分利用这些程序。本课程专为初学摄影师、想要从头学习如何编辑照片的高级摄影师设计。
我们向您承诺：
我们会陪伴你走过课程学习的每一步。如果你有与课程有关的任何疑问，随时都可以在课程中发布问题或向我发送直接信息。
我们想让这个课程成为Adobe Lightroom的最佳教程。所以，如果有任何方法可以改进这门课程，请务必告诉我。
我们有30天全额退款保证，为什么不试试学习这个课程呢？
快来加入我们吧！我们在第1课见！
菲尔
target_audience: 未曾使用过Adobe Lightroom CC的任何人

courses.title: Android ile mükemmel photoshop
courses.bio: ANDROİD CİHAZ İLE PHOTOSHOP DERSLERİ

FOTOĞRAFTA İSTENEN NESNEYİ SİLME, KOPYAL: FOTOĞRAFTA CİSİMİ İSTEDİĞİNİZ GİBİ KULLANMA EFEKTİ

requirements: ANDROİD TELEFON
courses.description:
Bu kursumuzda mükemmel photoshop için bir android telefonunuzun olmasının nasıl yeterli olabileceğini göreceksiniz.
Samimi olarak söylüyorum yani sırf kursu övmek için değil profesyonel photoshop uygulamaları çok karışık bunu çoğumuz biliyoruz.
bu kursta sadece telefonunuzu ve bir kaç basit uygulamayı göstereceğim. V e siz de göreceksiniz ki android ile photoshop yapmak gerekse ücret
gerekse anlaşılmak olsun her bakımdan daha kolay. Bu ders hem istediğiniz gibi görüntüler oluşturabilecek hem de sosyal mecralarda
gördüğünüz basit efektlerini kolayca uygulamanıza olanak sağlar. Böylelikle siz de istediğiniz gibi görüntüler oluşturup paylaşabilirsiniz. Umarım
bu uygulamaları beğenerek kullanırsınız derslerimize ara ara yeni derslerde eklenebilir tek isteğim sizin de yapabileceğiniz eğlenceli ve güzel
photoshoplar göstermek ve öğretmek kursumu bu alanda açmak ve hem geçmişe hem geleceğe yönelik efektlerle sizi buluşturmak sizin
destekleriniz ile umarım daha iyi dersler ve kurslar yayınlayıp sizin için daha faydalı bilgiler yayınlayabilirim. Bu arada derslerimde
karşılaşabileceğiniz sıkıntılardan kısaca bahstemek istiyorum ilk olarak çoğu photoshop uygulaması dik konumda ama birkaçı çeşitli
uygulamalarla yan çevrilebildiği gibi bazıları çevrilemiyor ya efektler görünmüyor yada photoshop yapacağımız fotoğraf bu yüzden birkaç dersi
dik konumda çekmek zorunda kaldım. Maalesef diğer bir sorunda ses fark edeceğiniz üzere maalesef öğrenci olmamdan dolayı istediğim gibi
mikrofon alamadım bu yüzden bu kadar kötü bir ses mevcut zaten derslerde görüntüde ne yapılacağı ve açıklama kısmında hangi uygulama ile
yapıldığı yazıyor ses yine anlaşılıyor ama insanı maalesef rahatsız ediyor. Sesi kısıp izleyebilir ve efekti nasıl uygulayabileceğinizi öğrenebilirsinzi
ama kim 50 tl verip böyle ders almak ister ama bilmem ama olsun umarım bir gün daha kaliteli ders ve kurslarda yine buluşuruz.
target_audience: PHOTOSHOP YAPMAK İSTEYEN

DJI GO 4.0 dla Mavic 2 PRO (Część Szkole: Aplikacja DJI GO 4.0 Wprowadzenie do Działu
Rozdzielczość i Pole Widzenia HQ vs. Full Field of View
Widok Kamery i Poszczególne Ustawienia: Ustawienia Transmisji i Baterii: Image Transmission Settings, Battery Settings
Ustawienia: Jak To Wygląda w Życiu
Ustawienia Foto i Video: Jakich Ustawień Kamery Używam na Codzień?
Aircraft Status - Szybka Diagnostyka naszego Drona
Ustawienia Foto i Video dla Mavic 2 Pro: Ustawienia Foto i Video dla Mavic 2 Pro

Podsumowanie Warsztatu: Wykład Bonusowy Wyjątkowe Rabaty na Moje Pozostałe Kursy Online

requirements: Dostęp drona od DJI jest kluczowy
Posiadanie telefonu lub tabletu z zainstalowaną aplikacją DJI GO
Ogólna wiedza z zakresu użytkowania dronów
Minimalne doświadczenie w zakresie bezzałogowych statków powietrznych
courses.description:
Jeżeli pasjonuje Cię latanie dronami, wydałeś spore pieniądze na swojego nowego towarzysza przygody i chciałbyś w pełni wykorzystać możliwości aplikacji DJI GO 4.0, ten warsztat jest odpowiedzią na Twoje oczekiwania.


Krok po kroku poznasz strukturę aplikacji, ustawienia, optymalną formę korzystania z aplikacji, często pojawiające się komunikaty.
Warsztat zawiera także części bonusowe, czyli omówienia elementów dodatkowych np; DJI Assistant 2.0, Drone Radar, Litchi.


Warsztat stanowi odpowiedź na wielokrotnie zadawane pytania, szereg zagadnień i wątpliwości poruszanych przez operatorów bezzałogowców podczas użytkowania swoich maszyn.
Autor w sposób przejrzysty wprowadza Cię w tajniki aplikacji, krok po kroku.  Ten kurs zawiera szerokie spektrum wiedzy i doświadczeń dotyczące latania dronami DJI.


Możesz śmiało korzystać z  doświadczeń innych związanych z każdym etapem wtajemniczenia, od podstaw poprzez omówienie poszczególnych elementów menu, ustawień, komunikatów, inteligentnych trybów lotu, aż po bardziej zaawansowane techniki lotu, fotografowania i filmowania.
Kurs systematycznie będzie się poszerzał o bieżące informacje i nagrane nowe materiały dydaktyczne.


Materiał został przygotowany w taki sposób, aby każdy otwarty na rozwój użytkownik mógł z niego wynieść coś dla siebie. W miarę jak technologia będzie się rozwijała, na bieżąco kurs zostanie aktualizowany.


Zapraszam bardzo serdecznie,
Autor
target_audience: Początkujący operatorzy dronów, chcący poszerzyć swoje kwalifikacje i wiedzę
Osoby mające trudności z opanowaniem anglojęzycznych terminów w aplikacji DJI GO 4
Osoby stale zajęte, nie mające czasu na zgłębianie funkcjonalności aplikacji DJI GO 4 samemu

courses.title: Photography for Beginners: The Ultimate Camera Guide
courses.bio: Buy your first or next camera with confidence. Learn how to choose the perfect camera for your photography journey.
objectives: A Step-by-Step guide to Buying a Photography Camera
Understand what camera and lens will work best for you

courses.description:
Are you ready to buy your first camera or upgrade to the camera of your dreams and are confused about what camera to buy?
This is the perfect course to learn all of the steps you need to figuring out how to decide what camera is best for YOU.
There's no perfect camera that fits every single persons needs. In this course I will give you the tools to figure out how to decide what camera to buy for your specific needs. I'll take you through 3 steps with a work sheet that will help you determine YOUR next steps on camera research and what equipment will work for your budget, style, and future. We are not going to tell you exactly what camera to buy, but we are going to give you the tools to help you figure it out yourself.
Enroll now, and you'll get instant access to:
Easy-to-watch lectures
Premium support if you ever get stuck
Lifetime updates to the course content
What will you learn in this course?
How to decipher the things needed when considering a camera to buy.
Breaking down your intentions for different genres of photography shooting.
You'll learn all of the key factors that go into buying a starter or upgrade camera.
You'll hear 2 small case studies from Will and Phil on why they chose the cameras they shoot.
You'll get a mini workbook to help you visualize your camera purchasing variables.
Lastly, you'll gain the confidence to help make a smart camera purchase for your individual self.
We believe this is a perfect first step into your camera buying process.
Key course topics:
Are you ready to buy a camera/ do you need one?
Basic photography terms when looking to buy a camera
3 variables for buying a camera for yourself
Making a decision on budget, style of photography, and your future
Case studies on what and why Will and Phill bought specific models of cameras
Who are the Instructors?
Will Carnahan - a professional photographer, cinematographer, and instructor. Will has been purchasing cameras and making money from photography and film making for over 20 years.
Along with Phil Ebiner and Sam Shimizu-Jones we've created some of the world's top-rated photography courses taken by millions of students around the world. Many of our students have gone on to make money with their photography skills as a side hustle or full time business.
You'll get premium support and feedback to help you become a better photographer!
We can't wait to see you in the course!
Will
target_audience: Beginner Photographers
Photographers ready to upgrade their equipment
First time camera buyers

courses.title: Fujifilm X-S20'de Ustalaşmak
courses.bio: X-S20'yi elinizin, gözünüzün doğal uzantısı yapın...
objectives: Fujifilm X-S20 fotoğraf makinasını kullanmak
Fujifilm X-S20 fotoğraf makinası menüleri
Fujifilm X-S20 fotoğraf makinası fotoğraf ayarları

Fujifilm X-S20 ile değişik video tiplerini çekebilmek

Çekim Türleri: Seri çekim (CH, CL) ve çekim hızı ayarları
Ağ/USB ayarları: Akıllı telefon ile eşleştirme ve Bluetooth işlemleri

requirements: Fujifilm X-S20 fotoğraf makinası sahibi olmak veya sahip olmayı düşünmek
Temel seviyede fotoğrafçılık bilgisine sahibi olmak
courses.description:
Merhaba, hoşgeldiniz.
Bu eğitimi incelediğinize göre ya Fujifilm X-S20 ile ilgileniyor, onu almayı düşünüyorsunuz ya da halihazırda almış durumdasınız.
En sonda söyleyeceğimi en başta söyleyerek sizi rahatlatayım: ‘Bence çok doğru karar. Bugünlerde piyasada olan hem fotoğraf hem de video anlamında en yetenekli kameralardan birisi X-S20.’
Bu eğitim serisinde, X-S20’nin fotoğraf ve video özelliklerine derinlemesine bakacağız, en ince detayları dahi öğreneceğiz.
Ancak şunu unutmamanızı rica ediyorum. Dünyanın en iyi fotoğraf makinasına dahi sahip olsanız, eğer makinanızı sizin elinizin, gözünüzün bir parçası olmamışsa hiçbir işe yaramaz.
Neden mi? Açıklayalım:
Fotoğraf çekme süreci içerisinde fotoğrafçının beyni, birçok konu için aynı anda düşünmek zorundadır. Bunlar,
ışık, diyafram, enstantane, ISO, makine ayarları, lens ve açı seçimi gibi teknik konular;
Kompozisyon kurgusu ve diğer estetik kaygılar
Anlatım dili ve içerik ile kaygılar
O birkaç saniye hatta zaman zaman milisaniye içerisine bu kadar çok konu ve bir o kadar çok karar sığdırmak gerçekten hiç kolay bir şey olmasa gerek.
İşte bu konu ve kaygılar içerisinde potansiyel olarak sizi en çok mesgul eden ama bununla birlikte en kolay elimine edilebilecek, değişkenliği en az şey, makine ile ilgili ayarlar bölümüdür.
Siz makinanıza hakim iseniz, makinanızdan ne istediğinizi biliyorsanız, makinanızın size ne verebileceğini biliyorsanız ve istediklerinizi makinanızdan nasıl alacağınızı biliyorsanız artık önemli konulardan birisini halletmişsiniz demektir.
Diğer konulara, kompozisyona ve fotoğrafın içeriğine, anlatım dilinizi oluşturmaya konsantre olabilirsiniz.
Ancak, makinanızı tanımıyorsanız, fotoğraf çekme süreci sizin için makine ile boğuşma serüveni haline gelir ve bu sırada fotoğraflar uçar, gider.
Makinanıza çok ciddi bir maddi yatırım yaptınız. Şimdi de kendinize küçük bir yatırım yapın ve makinanızla bütünleşmenize yardımcı olacak “Fujifilm X-S20’de Ustalaşmak Video Eğitim Serisini” izleyin. Kendinize yapacağınız bu küçük yatırımın, makinanıza yaptığınız o büyük yatırımı nasıl değerli kıldığını göreceksiniz.
Toplamda 81 ders, 7,5 saati aşan eğitimi kapsayan “X-S20’de Ustalaşmak Video Eğitim Serisi”nde, çok yetenekli ve üstün özelliklere sahip olan makinanızı, doğru tanımanız ve ona hakim olmanız için en ufak detaydan en karmaşık konulara kadar hemen her şeyi vermeye çalıştım.
Bu eğitimi bitirdiğinizde bir kenara bırakmayacak, takıldığınız her şeyde tekrar tekrar gelip izleyeceksiniz. Gerekiyorsa baştan sona tekrar izlemelisiniz. Ne zaman ki makinanız sizin eliniz, gözünüz oldu o zaman gönül rahatlığı ile bir kenara bırakabilirsiniz.
Ee haydi o zaman, ilk derste buluşalım…
target_audience: Fujifilm X sistem kullanıcıları, Fujifilm X-S20 kullanıcıları veya satın almayı düşünenler

courses.title: Photo Editing using Adobe Lightroom CC
courses.bio: Learn how to use Adobe Lightroom features, effects and functions to make pictures look amazing.
objectives: The course will provide practical and theoretical techniques and examples of how to edit and manipulate raw images and a group of images simultaneously.
The course will help the learners to understand the workflow and interface of the program with much ease and simpler lessons provided in the training.
this training will help the learners and students learn the skills required to edit images on the program with a lot of examples and methods.
the users will learn skills required for image editings such as face corrections, color corrections, Human skin corrections, workspace and interface of program
requirements: The user must know how to use either Windows or Mac Operating System. A 2GB RAM Operating system will be enough to work on Adobe Lightroom. A passion to learn the software is also required to master the program Creative imagination and ideas are also required to get a good understand of the program. Basic knowledge about the image editing tools and basic functions may prove beneficial to the learners. Image editing requires a lot of patience and hard work. So, the user is expected to have all the traits to learn the program quickly and easily.
courses.description:
The training starts with the introduction chapter in which the users are introduced to the interface and work area of the program. The chapter focuses on the panel groups, toolbar, identity plate, and the top panel menu. The chapter also tells us the special feature of batch photo editing in Lightroom. We get to know how to edit Raw images and images that are shot continuously but with a different background. We learn, the baby Image editing, Scenery Corrections that helps the user to learn how to edit backgrounds and foregrounds. Then, we learn about color casting and using the filter gallery. Finally, we have a few examples based on the hard sunlight filters and effects and how to control the sunlight in the photos. Users to learn the various aspects of Human face editing such as skin coloring, color-enhancing, and others. We will learn how to reduce blemishes on the face and enhance the overall look of the photograph. At the end of the chapter, we also learn how to clear the fog and water images with the help of Adobe Lightroom.
Adobe Lightroom CC is an image organizer and image manipulation software developed and created by Adobe Company. The program can be operated on Windows, MAC, iOS, Android, and tvOS Operating Systems. The program is used for a large number of images required to be edited at one point in time. The program is more focused on beginner editing rather than focusing on complex editing with advanced features. Adobe Lightroom is Non-destructive software in nature. This special feature of the program helps the user to play and edit the images with an unlimited number of times. The original images are left untouched and the editing is done only on the backup files. Lightroom has a feature of storing the backup files and the data is stored as XMP files. Adobe Lightroom focuses on the editing of the RAW images and helps the user to control adjustments such as brightness and contrast, exposure, hue/saturation, and other properties on the Raw files itself. Lightroom is a global program that works on the editing of the whole of the image while Photoshop is different software that works on the pixels and minimal details of the image. Lightroom has many advanced presets installed that can perform many functions based on editing and manipulation images but it cannot perform complex editing that Photoshop can perform.
This Lightroom CC Course is designed for every image editor and photographer whether beginner or an experienced. The course will provide practical and theoretical techniques and examples of how to edit and manipulate raw images and a group of images simultaneously. The course will help the learners to understand the workflow and interface of the program with much ease and simpler lessons provided in the training.
Editing and manipulating images on Adobe Lightroom is not easy work to perform for beginners as Lightroom may be a beginner program but still, it has so many functions and tools that make the program huge. So, this training will help the learners and students learn the skills required to edit images on the program with a lot of examples and methods.
With this training in hand, the users will learn skills required for image editings such as face corrections, color corrections, Human skin corrections, workspace and interface of the program, and many more similar skills.
target_audience: Beginners and professionals both can take up this training to help them get the basic knowledge about the program. Students who are interested to go for graphic designing courses may take up this training. Photographers who are keen to learn the basics of image editing such as color corrections or tools that help in adjusting the photos may take up this Lightroom CC Training.

requirements: No experience required
courses.description:
Master Social Media Video Editing: From Beginner to Pro with Premiere Pro, After Effects & Canva
Become a social media video editing powerhouse with this comprehensive course!
In today's social media landscape, captivating video content is key to grabbing attention and growing your audience. This course equips you with the skills to create professional-looking videos for all your favorite platforms, using a powerful combination of industry-standard tools and a user-friendly design platform.
Here's what you'll learn:
Adobe Premiere Pro: Master the fundamentals of video editing in Premiere Pro. Learn to import, edit, trim, and arrange clips, add transitions, and create polished sequences.
Adobe After Effects: Take your videos to the next level with After Effects. Explore motion graphics, animation, and visual effects to add stunning visuals and intros to your content.
Canva: Unlock the powerful video editing features of Canva. Learn to create social media-specific video formats, add text overlays, graphics, and music, and easily export your videos for various platforms.
This course is perfect for:
Anyone who wants to create engaging social media content
By the end of this course, you'll be able to:
Edit and create professional-looking social media videos
Utilize After Effects to add captivating motion graphics and visual effects
Design stunning visuals and text overlays using Canva
Export your videos in the perfect format for each social media platform
The course includes:
Step-by-step tutorials for each software
Practical demonstrations to solidify your learning
Real-world examples to inspire your creativity
No prior experience is necessary! With this comprehensive course, you'll have everything you need to become a social media video editing pro. Enroll today and start creating content that gets noticed!
target_audience: Anyone who wants to create engaging social media content

courses.bio: Timelapse Eğitimi
objectives: Timelapse üretim süreçleri
Sahada çekilen fotoğrafların işlenmesi
İş akışı ve iş planı yapma
Hava durumu ve astrolojik takiplere göre timelapse üretebilme
Etkili motion timelapse nasıl yapılır?
Motion Control Sistemi nasıl kullanılır?
Hyperlapse nedir? ve nasıl yapılır?
Astrotimelapse nasıl yapılır?

Saha çalışması videoları: Motion Control Sistemi ile Güneş Takibi
Toplu Dosya İşleme: After Effects ve Timelapse Deflicker Kullanımı

requirements: Temel fotoğrafçılık bilgileri
DSLR yada DSLM kameraya ve Tripod'a sahip olmak
courses.description:
Merhaba! Ben Yücel ÖZEL, 10 yıldan uzun bir süredir video prodüksiyonu ve timelapse içeriği üretimi konusunda çalışmalar yapan bir profesyonelim. Bu süre zarfında, timelapse ve video üretimi alanında kapsamlı bir deneyim edindim. Özellikle, 1.5 yıl boyunca global bir firmada sahada içerik üretici ve beta tester olarak görev aldım. Bu süre zarfında elde ettiğim bilgi birikimini ve pratiği sizlere aktarmak amacıyla bu eğitimi hazırladım.
Bu eğitimde neler öğreneceksiniz?
Planlama: Timelapse projelerinizi etkili bir şekilde planlama stratejileri.
Ekipman Seçimi: Doğru ekipmanın seçimi ve kullanımı.
Kompozisyon: Görsel hikayenizi güçlendirecek kompozisyon teknikleri.
Gece Gündüz Geçişi: Aydınlatma değişimlerine uyumlu çalışma stratejileri.
Astro Timelapse: Yıldızlı gökyüzü altında etkileyici timelapse sahneleri oluşturma.
Motion Control: Hareket kontrolü kullanarak dinamik sahneleri yakalama.
Hyperlapse Nasıl Yapılır?: Hızlı ve etkileyici hyperlapse teknikleri.
İş Akışı: Projelerinizi düzenli ve verimli bir şekilde yönetme stratejileri.
Toplu Dosya İşleme: Birden çok dosyayı aynı anda işleyerek zaman tasarrufu sağlama.
Flicker Giderme: Parlama sorunlarını ortadan kaldırma teknikleri.
Sonuç: Kaliteli timelapse videolar elde etmek için işlemleri tamamlama.
Timelapse üretim süreçlerini ve tekniklerini öğrenirken, bu eğitimde edindiğiniz bilgilerle ham verilerinizi bilgisayarda birleştirip işleyerek nitelikli timelapse videoları üretebileceksiniz. Derslerim sürekli güncellenerek devam edecek, bu nedenle kursu takip etmeye devam edin ve yeni bilgilerden haberdar olun.
Unutmayın, her an yeni bir şey öğrenmeye hazır olun ve birlikte harika timelapse projeleri üretelim!
target_audience: Video işleri ile uğraşırken doğru timelapse tekniklerini kullanmak isteyenler.

Exercise Files and Study Guides are provided! Download the videos for traveling!
courses.description:
Easy workflow and great for those who want to start with Photoshop
All Photoshop work materials are provided & ready for you to download
Full lifetime access to the complete course
All Work Materials are provided & ready for you to download
No Prior Photoshop knowledge needed "Guaranteed"


My approach is:
One thing I have learned through all the years of working with Adobe Photoshop is that knowing and understanding the essentials of adobe photoshop is just as fundamental as the heavier and trickier Photoshop techniques when it comes to honing your craft.
This Photoshop Beginner course is great for Beginners. You do not need any previous knowledge of Photoshop. We start by going through what the photoshop software is and where to start.
A step-by-step guide on photoshop, we'll start by going through what you need to get started. Then we head into the photoshop workspace and how to set it up so that it suits your needs. We'll then head into the essentials of photoshop tools, layers, masks, blend modes, adjustment layers, colour profiles and much more. I've added a small bullet point list down below.
I've also added a bonus lecture towards the end of the course. That focuses on what & how when it comes to using a Wacom tablet combined with your photoshop workflow.


You'll learn
Photoshop Essentials & where to start.
Customize the Photoshop Interface & Workspace.
Setup New Documents With basic settings.
Understand Layers & Blend Modes.
Understand photoshop Masks & How They Work.
Setup Adjustment Layers & How They Work.
Photoshop Tools & What You Really Need.
Use Photoshop Menus & Filters to Archive effects.
Use the Liquify Tool & Shortcuts.
Learn & Master The Pen Tool – FINALLY!
Learn All The Other Tools For Photoshop.
Colour Profiles & Setting Your Photoshop Documents.
Bonus - Setup A Wacom Tablet.


What sets this course apart:
I will teach you how to get into photoshop, so don't worry if you don't have prior experience with photoshop. We start slow and then build our way up.
Receive all work material (Photoshop files) from the start and work along.
Many beginner techniques, photoshop tools, exercises, and work challenges.
The idea is to make photoshop fun and easy! "Great to work along"
Instructor support within 24 Hours. "I do my best to answer every question"
One final note: My goal is to teach you photoshop, so don't stress about not having worked in photoshop before. "I do my best to make it simple & fun"
Thank you!
target_audience: This course is perfect for beginners "Never used photoshop before"

This course is great for understanding masks and how to use them

Working with brush tool, the clone stamp tool & healing brush

courses.description:
Nesse super pacote promocional o aluno irá aprender algumas das ferramentas mais demandadas do mercado: o básico do adobe photoshop, fundamentos do adobe illustrator e orientações do adobe indesign.
Temos cursos completos sobre cada ferramenta de forma isolada e muito mais completa, mas esse pacote promocional é um bom pontapé inicial para quem deseja ter uma visão geral antes de optar por qual plataforma irá se profissionalizar.
Nossos cursos têm base legal constituída pelo Decreto Presidencial nº 5.154 e nossa metodologia segue as normas do MEC através da Resolução CNE nº 04/99
As aulas serão apresentadas por meio de vídeo em alta resolução e o aluno pode estudar no seu próprio tempo, fazer seu próprio horário, o acesso ao curso é vitalício e o aluno pode interagir com os demais alunos no super sistema de fórum desenvolvido pelo Udemy no menu de  perguntas do seu curso.
O aluno conta com a sofisticação da plataforma de ensino a distância mais respeitada do mundo, ao final do curso o aluno ainda ganha certificado. Uma ótima oportunidade para ingressar no mercado de trabalho ou abraçar a iniciativa empreendedora na rede mundial de computadores.
Grande Abraço, puxe uma cadeira, fique a vontade e nos vemos no curso!

courses.title: Lightroom (Classic CC)＆Photoshop講座「プロがお仕事で本当に使ってる」ここまで覚えればOK
courses.bio: 依頼するカメラマンにここまでは覚えてもらいたいことを効率良く学べるように、徹底的に内容を厳選しました。現場で活躍するカメラマンのLightroom作業のワークフローが完全にわかります。悩みが多いLightroom運用についてもズバッと解決
objectives: 主に人物や、イベントなどを撮影しているカメラマンが悩む編集方法について、最新の機能利用を交えてスキルアップさせます
被写体となる人物と背景のイメージを別々に編集し、より撮影者の表現UPにつながる方法を教えます
現像編集の速度をアップにつながる方法について知ることが出来ます
どこまでも編集できるから、どこまで編集すれば良いか悩んでいるカメラマンさんの悩みを解決します
ライブなどの撮影で、人物の顔にいろいろな光が当たり、編集するのが難しいと感じていた写真の編集作業を解決します
ピアノの発表会撮影依頼を受けた後に、写真に開催内容のわかる文字の帯を付けたいと言われた時に簡単に対応できようになります
ダンス発表会撮影などで、プロが実際にやっている編集内容を詳しく知ることが出来ます。
建物の歪みをまっすぐにしたいのにどうして良いかわからなかったカメラマンさんにその方法がわかるようにノウハウを伝授します
Lightroomを長く使ってて、LRファイルが巨大になりすぎて、動作が遅くて困っている状況を解決します
現場で活躍するプロカメラマンがやっていて、意外に知られていない良い方法を知ることができます

講師や講座の紹介から、Lightroomをおすすめする理由、Lightroomを: 講師の紹介や当講座の特徴など、最初にお伝えします
Lightroom Classic CCを特にお勧めするわけ。他の編集ソフトと何が違う？何が良いの？
これがちゃんとしてなきゃ、どんなソフトを選んでもダメ、、、という話
視聴を飛ばさないで！！プロが失敗しないためにやっている、これからLightroo: LRの立ち上げる際の準備と、かなり重要なSDカードからのデータ転送の話
容量がいっぱいになりがちなLR。軽快に作業するためのフォルダの管理の仕方はこれ。
Lightroomの編集から書き出しまでの一連の流れを紹介しながら、要所要所で重: 簡単に編集。一気に書き出すための選別方法
ほとんどの人が理解していない、書き出し設定をここで身につけよう
作業を始めた後に写真を追加したい時や、透かし文字の入れ方
改めて写真の管理（失敗しない写真管理のために）
いろいろ編集しよう。どこまでやればいいかという悩みや、作業スピードを上げるコツも: どんどん編集しよう（基本パネル中心に編集していきます）
編集を進める際のお悩み解決（どこまでやれば良い？もっと速くできない？）
カラーパネルを覚えて、肌の見え方や、室内照明の色被りを調整しよう！
ステージ撮影照明で演者さんの顔にいろいろ光がかかって綺麗に見えない時の対処法
ステージ照明で客席との明暗差が大きい！客席の盛り上がりも見せたい時の編集方法
マスク機能を使えば、もっと表現したい通り表現できます！
マスク機能でスタジオの色被りの悩みを解決します
余計な写り込みなどを消す方法
建物をきれいにカッコよく見せるための編集方法
ダンス撮影のお写真編集その１（依頼する際にお願いしたいポイント）
ダンス撮影のお写真編集その２（実際の編集画面で詳しく解説）
Lightroomの作業を超えた部分はPhotoShopを使いましょう: PhotoShopを使おう！PSの役割と目つぶり対策について
PhotoShopでいろいろ消す作業をしてみよう
新機能を使いこなそう: 安いレンズでもLRのこの機能で思い切りボカせます
よくある会社撮影のPC画面の映り込み処理についても解説します。
「撮影枚数が多くて編集に時間がかかり過ぎる〜」とお悩みの方に解決につながる５つの: LR編集の時短につながるヒント１〜２
LR編集の時短につながるヒント３〜５

requirements: 前提知識は不要です。この動画で、ライトルームを使うメリットを理解し、現像作業必要なことをすべて学習できます。
courses.description:
あまりに多くの事が出来て、情報も溢れているLightroom。あれこれ覚えないとプロになれないのでは？？と感じてませんか？。
プロの世界で長くカメラマン仕事をしている作者が、「これだけ覚えれば充分だよ〜」という部分だけ抽出してお伝えします。




プロカメラマンになりたい、カメラでもっと活躍したいを実現するためのPhotoFanにより監修。
多くの生徒さんのLightroomライトルームでの現像作業での困ったを多く聞いたことにより、実際に現場で出て悩む事柄解決を網羅しています。


内容は初心者から学べて、お仕事撮影編集レベルまで対応します。


＝＝＝＝＝
「Lightroom講座：（PhotoShopも随時追加）短時間でマスターするここまで出来ればお仕事でもOK」の最新版です。
また、編集を効率＆表現も広げるためのLightroomの最新機能なども多く追加しております。
PhotoShopもお仕事撮影でよく使うものを網羅してお伝えします。
＝＝＝＝＝




普通のLigthrooｍ講座と違ってプロの現場でのワークフローが全てわかります。
実際に撮影現場での編集についてはダンス撮影の編集方法をここまで教えるか！ってくらい詳しく教えます
また、イベントで多い写真の帯の入れ方について、超効率作業方法も盛り込みました。






動画の流れは
・なぜ、いろいろな現像ソフトの中でもLightroomライトルームがいいのか
・特に写真を大量に扱う際にこの方法がおすすめの画像管理方法
・多機能で困りそう！？いやいや、これだけ扱えれば大丈夫！
・最新のLightroomライトルームの新機能フル活用
・いろいろなジャンルの写真を実際に編集してみる
・ライトルームでできないところはこうしよう
という感じでお伝えします。




この流れの中で、単にLightroomライトルームを学ぶだけにとどまらず
・どこまで編集すればいいか悩みます〜」
・編集スピードをもっと上げたいのですが、、、」
というお悩み解決はもちろん
・長年使い続けることによって生じる「動作が重い」
・色がおかしいのをなんとかしたい
・PC内でのLightroomの容量が大きくなりすぎてなんとかしたい
・もっとLightroomの編集作業が速くなりたい
・失敗しない、データーの損失を防ぐ方法を知りたい
・LightroomからPhotoShopを連携させて効率良く作業していきたい
などなど、使い続けるとどんどん出てくるお悩みについても解決策をお伝えします。




最新バージョンですので
実際に講師が「最近現場に出て、こういうやり方が求められる」という内容も盛り込んでおりますので
これまでにLightroomライトルームを習ったことのある人も、ぜひおさらい＋最新バージョンにスキルUPを目指し
一緒に学んで行ってくださいね！


また、お仕事ではどうしてもPhotoShopも必要ですので、実際によく使うPhotoShopの役立つ技もお伝えします。
target_audience: Lightroomでより写真表現を広げたいカメラマンさん
編集の作業効率を上げて、もっと撮影のチャンスまでも拡大したいカメラマンさん
すでにLightroomは触ってきたが、最新の編集機能や、現場のプロが便利だと感じて使っているやり方を知りたいカメラマンさん

courses.description:
Bạn là người đam mê nhiếp ảnh. Bạn đang muốn có thể chụp ra những bức ảnh sản phẩm, ảnh phong cảnh, ảnh chân dúng đúng và đẹp. Vậy làm sao để có thể chụp ra được những sản phẩm hình ảnh chất lượng. Tất cả sẽ được giải đáp trong khóa học Nhiếp ảnh cơ bản và chỉnh sửa ảnh với Lightroom Classic. Khóa học sẽ trang bị cho học viên những kiến thức cơ bản về cách setup để chụp ảnh như thế nào, hậu kỳ ảnh ra sao. Bạn sẽ được tiếp cận với những phương pháp học trực tuyến hiện đại mà không kém phần hiệu quả. Bạn sẽ hiểu rõ quy trình sáng tạo một sản phẩm nhiếp ảnh cụ thể. Biết cách setup ánh sáng - bối cảnh khi chụp hình. Đặc biệt người sẽ hướng dẫn các bạn trong khóa học này là thầy Tú Thanh. Anh là Founder của Tú Thanh Media, là Admin của nhiều cộng đồng lớn về phim và đồ họa. Đã có nhiều năm kinh nghiệm trong lĩnh vực truyền thông. Đồng thời, thầy cũng là đối tác của các doanh nghiệp lớn khác
Vậy để có thể sản xuất ra được những sản phẩm hình ảnh chất lượng, hãy đăng ký ngay khóa học Nhiếp ảnh cơ bản và chỉnh sửa ảnh với Lightroom Classic

courses.title: Affinity Photo - Komplettkurs für Einsteiger
courses.bio: Lerne die Funktionen der Bildbearbeitung mit Affinity Photo (inkl. Updates zu Affinity Photo 2)
objectives: Bildbearbeitung mit Affinity Photo
Ebenen, Masken & Schnittmasken
Werkzeuge und deren Funktionen anhand von Beispielen anwenden & verstehen
Personen & Objekte vom Hintergrund freistellen
Bild Effekte erstellen
Foto Kompositionen
Collagen erstellen
Raw Entwicklung
Luts erstellen & anwenden
Ausschneiden, Maskieren & Freistellen
Grundlagen der Bildbearbeitung
Unterschiede zwischen Affinity Photo 1 & 2
HDR Inhalte erstellen mit der Tone Mapping Persona
requirements: Affinity Photo sollte auf deinem PC installiert sein
courses.description:
Der Affinity Photo Kurs.
Wenn du dich für diesen Kurs entscheidest, werden wir in einzelnen Lektionen Schritt für Schritt die Funktionen des Bildbearbeitungsprogramms kennen lernen.
Wir beginnen bei den einfachen Grundlagen und arbeiten uns über die Funktionen der einzelnen Werkzeuge bis hin zu Themen wie den Ebenen und Anpassungen, so dass wir ein Verständnis für die Benutzeroberfläche und dessen Tools entwickeln.
Am besten lernt man natürlich durch das praktische mitmachen, deshalb werden wir sobald wir die Basics durchgegangen sind, gemeinsam einige Bilder von Anfang bis Ende selbst bearbeiten.
Beim bearbeiten der Bilder und erstellen der Effekte, werden sich zum einen die Grundlagen festigen, da sie hierdurch immer wieder praktisch angewendet werden, zum anderen erlernst du hierdurch auch viele neue Funktionen und Arbeitsabläufe die sich bei der Bildbearbeitung oft ähneln.

Du wirst lernen ungewünschte dinge aus Bildern zu entfernen, durch Funktionen wie das Restaurieren oder das Klonen. Nur um ein paar der Lektionen nennen.

Du wirst sehen wie einfach es sein kann, Objekte und Personen aus Bildern auszuschneiden oder einfach vom Hintergrund freizustellen.

Außerdem warten einige besondere Bildeffekte auf dich, die wir gemeinsam Schritt für Schritt erstellen werden, wie unter anderem den Glaskugel Effekt oder das Sky Replacement.

Während der Lektionen werden alle Arbeitsschritte genau erklärt.

Alle Bilder die ich in den Lektionen bearbeite, stehen natürlich auch für dich zum Download zur Verfügung.


In mehr als 60 einzelnen Lektionen werden wir in in folgenden zusammengefassten Kapiteln, alle wichtige Themen zu der Software durchgehen:


Grundlagen
wichtige Grundlagen um mit der Programmoberfläche vertraut zu werden


Werkzeuge
in einzelnen Lektionen alle wichtigen Werkzeuge und deren Anwendung anhand von Beispielen kennenlernen


Ebenen & Masken
die Funktionsweise der Ebenen und der Masken verstehen


Klonen, Restaurieren & Makel entfernen
Bildbereiche Klonen, Schönheitsfehler in z.B. Portraits korrigieren und Makel entfernen


Auswählen & Freistellen
lerne die verschiedenen Möglichkeiten kennen, um Dinge aus Bildern auszuschneiden


Weitere Funktionen
hierbei schauen wir uns vor allem die Farbliche Bearbeitung sowie die Filter an


Bild Effekte erstellen
viele verschiedene Effekte, die wir gemeinsam Schritt für Schritt erstellen werden


Raw Entwicklung
Raw Dateien öffnen und in der Develop Persona mit den verschiedenen Anpassungen bearbeiten


Liquify Persona
die Funktionen zum Verzerren mit der Liquify Persona anhand von Beispielen kennenlernen


Tone Mapping Persona
HDR Kombinationen erstellen und praktische Presets zur Anpassung von Fotos anwenden


LUTs

courses.title: From Photo to DVD - Preserving those Precious Memories
courses.bio: Improving your digital photography techniques, enhancing photos with Photoshop and creating videos with Premiere
requirements: The student will need a moderately powerful laptop or desktop computer.  Either Mac or windows devices are acceptable.
The student will need a digital camera.  dSLR camers are preferred but simple cell phones are certainly acceptable.
Students will be taught within the course how to download and install a free trial version of Adobe's Photoshop and Premiere Elements V14.
Students should come fully equipped with signficant intellectual curiousty as Rick will challenge you every step of the way!
courses.description:
“From Photo to DVD – Preserving Those Precious Memories” covers three primary topics.  First, we’ll explore some techniques and strategies for taking better digital photos.  We’ll take a moderately deep dive into portrait and landscape photography and an overview look at sports, low-light and underwater photography.  Next, we’ll explore the editing of photos using Adobe’s Photoshop Elements.  We begin simply with things like cropping, light and color adjustments.  By the time we’re finished we’ll have explored photo merges, panoramas, special effects and even creating your own images from scratch.  We conclude the course with a look at creating high quality videos and DVDs with Adobe’s Premiere Elements.  Again we start simply with things like single-threaded timelines, music, narration and transitions.  By the time we conclude you will be creating photo montages, utilizing multiple, simultaneous timelines and creating your own menus.  It should all be great fun.
The course is best suited for individuals familiar with digital photography, but seeking to improve their skills.  No prior knowledge of photo or video editing is required.  Similarly, Adobe’s Photoshop and Premiere Elements are not required.  The download and installation of the free trial versions of each of these products is described within the course.
Rick Phillips, Ph.D., the instructor for this course, describes himself as “someone who doesn’t always color within the lines.”  He is energetic and entertaining, but will likely challenge you within every section to expand your understanding and explore the world around you.  As Rick is known to say, “have some fun out there, but Keep On Learning!”
target_audience: This course is intended for anyone wishing to improve their photography skills and then enhance those photos using Photoshop Elements.  This course is very well suited for anyone wishing to create high quality videos and DVDs using Adobe's Premiere Elements.
This course is not well intended for professional photographers or videographers as it too elementary in nature.

courses.description:
LIGHTROOM esse curso tem como objetivo a organização e tratamento de imagens de forma profissional.


O foco do curso é fazer com que você aprenda técnicas profissionais de tratamento de imagem e fazer melhor, com mais qualidade e agilidade, gastando menos tempo. Você vai entender como que funciona o fluxo de trabalho profissional dentro do Lightroom, um programa que é mais do que um simples programa de edição de fotografias.


Você aprenderá desde a importação e classificação de imagens, passando pelos diversos tipos de tratamento de paisagens, retratos, etc, até a criação de foto livros, slide shows e sua própria galeria online para divulgação de seu portfólio e a forma correta de fazer a impressão e backup dos seus arquivos.


Muitas pessoas acreditam que os fotógrafos profissionais utilizam o Photoshop para tratar suas fotografias, mas isso não é a realidade do mercado. O Photoshop é um programa de composição e não de tratamento de imagens.


O programa mais utilizado por profissionais de fotografia é o Lightroom, pois ele oferece ferramentas e um fluxo de trabalho mais otimizado para a gestão das suas fotos, principalmente para aqueles que fotografam em grandes quantidades como fotógrafos de eventos, produtos, etc.


Se você deseja ter maior agilidade no tratamento e catalogação das suas fotografias, esse é com certeza o melhor e mais utilizado software do mercado. Economize tempo e ganhe mais dinheiro sabendo operar da maneira correta esse programa essencial para qualquer fotógrafo, seja ele amador ou profissional.
target_audience: Fotógrafos amadores ou com pretensões profissionais que querem elevar o nível das suas fotografias

courses.description:
Welcome to the ultimate Photoshop compositing journey - "Masterclass Adobe Photoshop - 20 Compositing Projects in Photoshop!" ?
Are you ready to embark on a transformative adventure from an absolute beginner to a Photoshop virtuoso? Look no further! This course is carefully crafted to take you from zero to hero in the mesmerizing world of digital compositing.
Whether you're an aspiring graphic designer, a passionate photographer, or simply an enthusiast seeking to unleash your creative potential, this course is designed to be accessible to everyone. No prior experience is required; all you need is your imagination and a willingness to learn!
Throughout these 20 captivating projects, you'll be guided by a seasoned Photoshop expert who will walk you through each step with patience and clarity. The course delves into a myriad of exciting topics, such as Light Matching techniques, Perspective manipulation, and expertly selecting subjects and adding intricate details like hair seamlessly.
You'll become well-versed in essential tools such as MIN MAX Selection, LASSO, and the mighty PEN tool, empowering you to conquer any compositing challenge that comes your way. Advanced techniques using Channels and the Blend If method will elevate your skills to new heights, while mastering the art of precise masking with Color Range will make your compositions truly awe-inspiring.
But that's not all! We'll cover the secrets of creating shortcuts to streamline your workflow, as well as delve into the intricacies of Depth matching composition, Lighting and Shadow adjustments, and Color Grading to ensure your final composite is nothing short of breathtaking.
Our journey together will encompass a diverse range of projects that will both challenge and delight you. From placing a Photo frame on the wall to crafting ethereal scenes like "Up in the air House floating composition," and creating captivating character composites like "Ballerina and Snake Compositing," you'll find each project to be a thrilling revelation.
Ever wondered how to achieve the iconic "Batman Lighting Effect"? Fear not, as we'll unravel the mystery behind it and enable you to create stunning compositions with it.
And just when you think you've seen it all, we save the grand finale for last - the "Tomb Raider Master Project." With this masterpiece, you'll demonstrate your newfound mastery of Photoshop compositing, showcasing the skills and techniques you've acquired throughout the course.
So, if you're ready to unlock your creative potential and mesmerize the world with your digital artistry, join us in "Masterclass Adobe Photoshop - 20 Compositing Projects in Photoshop." Enroll now, and let's embark on an unforgettable journey together! Your masterpiece awaits. ?‍??‍?
target_audience: If you are new to Photoshop and have little to no experience with compositing, fear not! This course starts from the very basics, providing a gentle and comprehensive introduction to the tools and techniques necessary for successful compositing. Step-by-step guidance ensures that even those who have never touched Photoshop before can follow along and feel confident in their progress.

For intermediate Photoshop users, this course will take your skills to new heights, introducing advanced compositing techniques and helping you build a solid foundation for more intricate projects. Learn the nuances of light matching, perspective manipulation, and precise masking to elevate your compositions to a professional level.

Experienced Photoshop users will find this course to be a valuable resource for expanding their creative horizons. Delve into complex topics like Channels, Blend If method, and depth matching to add an extra layer of finesse to your work. The projects presented in this course will challenge even seasoned artists, providing an opportunity to push your boundaries and explore the limits of your imagination.

No matter your background or goals, this course is for anyone seeking to create jaw-dropping composites that leave a lasting impact. Whether you aspire to craft stunning visual art, enhance your photography, or simply want to express your creativity through digital manipulation, "Masterclass Adobe Photoshop - 20 Compositing Projects in Photoshop" welcomes you with open arms.

So, if you're eager to embark on a transformative journey and unlock your full creative potential, join us in this exciting course and let your imagination soar to new heights with the captivating world of Photoshop compositing. Enroll now and let's embark on this awe-inspiring adventure together!

courses.description:
In this tutorial, you’ll discover how to edit pictures on your iPhone using the built-in Photos app, and using Adobe Lightroom App, you will learn how to turn your ordinary photos into stunning edits!


Adjust Color, Brightness & Sharpness
Knowing how to edit photos on iPhone allows you to turn an average image into an amazing one!


Auto Enhance
The Auto tool automatically adjusts the colors and brightness levels in your photo.


Brilliance
The Brilliance tool is great for bringing out details and making your photo look richer and more vibrant.


Highlights
The Highlights tool adjusts the brightness of only the bright areas in your photo.


Shadows
The Shadows tool adjusts the brightness of only the dark areas in your photo.


Contrast
The Contrast tool adjusts the contrast between the dark and bright tones in your photo.


Brightness
The Brightness tool brightens or darkens your photo. But it does it in a slightly different (and usually better) way from the Exposure tool.


Black Point
The Black Point tool affects the brightness of only the darkest tones in your photo.


Saturation
The Saturation tool makes the colors more vibrant or less vibrant.


Vibrance
The Vibrance tool makes muted colors more vibrant without affecting skin tones or saturated colors too much


Warmth
The Warmth tool makes the colors in your photo warmer or cooler.


Sharpness
The Sharpness tool sharpens detail in your photo by making edges crisper and more defined.


Definition
The Definition tool adjusts contrast to improve the clarity of detail in your photo.


Noise Reduction
The Noise Reduction tool reduces “digital noise” – such as grain caused by shooting in low light. You can also get grain in your photos when editing, e.g., if you brighten the shadows too much.
target_audience: Anyone who wants to turn ordinary photos into stunning edits

Il corso è stato realizzato per la versione italiana del software. Le ultimissime versioni di darkable NON riportano la lingua italiana, poiché le traduzioni sono incomplete.
Per scaricare l'ultima versione in lingua italiana (v4.2.1), vi consigliamo di visitare l'articolo sul corso di darktable sul nostro blog, dove sono presenti i link per il download delle versioni per Windows e Mac in italiano (Udemy non ci permette di inserire link in questa descrizione).
Anche se la cosa non dipende da noi, ci stiamo attivando per contribuire ad una soluzione rapida del problema. L'ultima versione del software è disponibile comunque in lingua inglese.
Il corso spiega l'uso di darktable, un software gratuito e libero multipiattaforma per la postproduzione fotografica. Parleremo prima di tutto di come si preparano i propri strumenti digitali per la postproduzione fotografica, addentrandoci poi nelle funzionalità specifiche del programma e dei suoi vari moduli. Vedremo poi tanti esempi e flussi di postproduzione completi.
Come fare a rendere più belli i colori? Come raddrizzare una foto storta o con una eccessiva distorsione prospettica? Come lavorare in bianco e nero? Come rendere una foto più nitida o correggere piccole imperfezioni?
Il corso è pensato per chi non ha il budget per acquistare una licenza di software commerciali, o ritiene comunque che non sia necessario adottare una soluzione a pagamento che vincola contrattualmente l'utente a dover usare per sempre un sistema chiuso. darktable, viceversa, è un software libero che funziona su tutti i PC (Windows, Mac, Linux) e che pur preservando molte funzioni di qualità, non presenta costi; per questo motivo si è affermato come valida alternativa a Lightroom e ad altri strumenti.
Il corso analizza i vari aspetti della postproduzione, per cui è adatto per chi non ha mai approfondito l'argomento o chi vuole ritrovare le funzionalità che già conosce in darktable, imparando un flusso di lavoro un po' diverso.
Il corso è aggiornato alla versione 4.0.1.
target_audience: Il corso si rivolge a fotografi principianti che desiderano imparare ad usare un software di postproduzione che non abbia costi di licenza / abbonamenti ma che al termpo stesso offra risultati professionali.

courses.title: Photoshop for Beginners: Photography Editing Techniques
courses.bio: Photoshop for Beginners - Your Step by Step Guide to Creating Professional looking Photographs in Photoshop
objectives: Use Adobe Bridge to categorise and organise your photography
Be confident to do basic Photoshop edits like exposure, white balance, straightening the horizon and cropping
Use techniques to correct perspectives from wide angle lenses
Create stunning sunsets with Photoshop's graduated filter tool
Retouch skin, teeth and eyes to make their photography more flattering
Extend studio backgrounds in less than a minute
Remove unwanted elements from a scene using the clone tool
Swap heads in a photo so that everyone's eyes are open in family portraits
Use Photoshop to change skies and backgrounds
Set up Photoshop to automatically watermark and resize your photography for blogs and Facebook

Introduction and Organising Your Images: Using Adobe Bridge to categorise and organise your photography

Essential Edits using Adobe Camera Raw: Photoshop Camera Raw - Basic Edits - Exposure, White Balance, Vibrance

Top Toolbar - crop and straighten tools
Top Toolbar - transform tool - correct perspective on buildings

Easy skin retouching using layer masks and spot healing brush
Clone Stamp Tool - Remove Elements from a Photo

requirements: This course is especially for photographers - aspiring, amateur or semi professional
You can shoot your photography in RAW or jpeg format for this course
You will need access to Photoshop
You should have no or very little experience with Photoshop
courses.description:
Photoshop made easy!

"This is the third course I've completed that Rosie has done. I really enjoy the courses, they are well made, easy to follow, and Rosie is very friendly and responds to questions very quickly. They are good value for money and I recommend her and her courses to my friends and family who also have an interest in photography. Keep up the good work Rosie, I can't wait for the next course. Thanks for passing on all your knowledge, I've learnt so much from you." - Zoe Newbery

If you want to take your photography to the next level with Photoshop editing techniques but have been unsure or overwhelmed with how to use Photoshop, then this is the right course for you!
Made especially for total beginners to Photoshop, this short course is packed with quick and easy Photoshop tutorials that assume no knowledge and guide you right from the beginning.
I’ll walk you step by step through Photoshop, highlighting all the most important Photoshop tools for photographers and then show you how to bring Photoshop's tools together to do head swaps, achieve amazing skies, how to give your images added drama and intensity and quick and easy retouching techniques that your clients and friends will love!
Get confident with Photoshop by learning the secrets to:
Organising your photos in Adobe Bridge so you can easily find the best ones to edit
How to do basic Photoshop edits like exposure, white balance, straightening the horizon and cropping
How to use Photoshop to correct perspective on buildings and people when using a wide angle lens
Use Photoshop’s graduated filter to create stunning sunset photography
Quickly extend studio backgrounds with one simple technique that takes less than a minute!
Retouch clients, friends, and family to give your photos a professional finish
Discover how to remove unwanted elements from an image using Photoshop’s clone tool
Learn how to blend two photos together in Photoshop so that you can swap heads and make sure everyone is smiling in your photo!
Use Photoshop to change skies and backgrounds
Set up Photoshop to do automatic watermarking for your images and quick resizing for blogs and Facebook


******************
And all of this comes with my personal help and input too - if you’re struggling with any of the steps I lay out in Photoshop I am always here to help you.
I include access to my original photography so that you can edit along with me in Photoshop throughout the course, and you can also download PDFs of the steps we need to take so that you don’t have to take copious amounts of notes but can easily follow along in Photoshop.


*****************
This Photoshop course is for total beginners, so you will never feel out of your depth but you'll leave feeling encouraged and inspired with a huge number of new Photoshop techniques to really improve your photography! Plus don't forget that Udemy offer a 30 Day 100% money back guarantee if you decide the course isn't for you, so you've nothing to lose by giving it a try!
*****************


Once you enroll in my Photoshop for Beginners class you’ll also be invited to be part of the class Photoshop Facebook group where you can share your photography and ask for additional Photoshop help both from myself and the other students.
Photoshop is a huge program, and it’s hard to know where to start when you’re a total beginner. If you’ve tried just opening it up and hoping it will be intuitive, you’ve probably already found yourself overwhelmed and missing out the huge array of amazing features Photoshop has.
*******************
You can make such a difference to your photography by knowing the key tools and techniques Photoshop has to offer. In this class we assume no knowledge, so it's perfect for the total beginner. We'll look at everything from the layout of the Photoshop screen and how to customise it especially for photographers, to sorting and categorising our photos with Adobe Bridge so that they are easy to find and edit. We'll also discover the quickest and easiest techniques for adding drama to our photography and creating stunning skies and landscapes.
Can you imagine how great it will feel to go and take a photo of a landscape and really make the colours pop and the sky filled with drama, and be so proud of the art you've created?! I'm so excited to help you discover and learn the techniques to do this in Photoshop!
Or if you take a series of images where one person's eye is shut, you'll be able to swap the heads around without anyone realising and create the perfect family portrait?
And when photographing newborn babies, you'll be able to cope with retouching rough skin and give the parents photos to really treasure!
*******************

Whether you're an amateur just looking to improve your photography or an aspiring professional - when you follow my Photoshop class for beginners, I will give you the exact steps you need to achieve amazing results with your photos that will take them to another level and make them extra special.
Being good with your camera is only half the challenge, great editing can transform a photo from just "nice" to "incredible!". So let’s make sure you bring out the best in your images by enrolling in my Photoshop class today!
Click on enrol and look forward to seeing you inside soon! :)
